hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic stay
desc: We had a fantastic stay here. Staff were all very friendly. Breakfast was definitely a highlight every day and I’m missing it already. The kids loved the pool and it was never busy. The gym and change rooms were also very handy. My daughter hurt herself one night at the pool and when I rang for some Band-Aids they sent someone up to check on her, cleaned her foot and gave us some extra supplies for later. It was very appreciated. A few times we were only given three towels instead of four but they alway sent an extra up when asked. We did somehow lose a swimsuit. We think perhaps it was scooped up with the towels as it was in the bathroom. Not a huge issue though. Our fault it was left there.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Location location location
desc: What a great hotel, walking distance to shops, a lot of shops! Surrounded by wonderful food outlets, restaurants and bars. Situated between two stops on the MRT only a short walk either way. Easy access to taxis and the bus. Well informed staff at the front desk and concierge. Friendly and courteous staff eager to assist with your needs. Buffet breakfast has great selection of hot and cold foods to start your day. Has a rating of 4 stars but it feels like 5. Rooms are spacious clean and modern. We had most enjoyable stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Struggle to fault
desc: Have stayed here on more than one occasion and if I had to describe it in one word I would say "predictable", in a good way (actual stay was Nov, 2015)! The check-in staff are always friendly and process straightforward. Rooms have always been clean and are well-sized by Singapore standards. Breakfast spread is not bad - it's not the broadest selection you'll ever find, but you won't go wanting. The Executive Lounge is fairly low-key, but was great for us with young children for their afternoon snack. After a morning of entertainment and running around, ducking in here around 3-4 pm and filling the kids up with a few sandwiches / pastries kept them going until dinner time (and us too!). If you're looking for a comfortable place with good facilities, well located, and well

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Cosy and Right at the centre
desc: The room was excellent. The service ambivalent. However located right in a neighborhood where one can find the shades of singapore. Good Breakfast, Clean and crispy linen, Slightly noisy from a busy road nearby.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: enjoyed my stay
desc: people with down syndrome worked in housekeeping. i like that very much. a clean and tidy place. centrally located for food and shopping. easy access to all you need. friendly and courteous staff. delicious 24 hour street food a minute away.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Little gem!!
desc: We were stay for 2 night in occasion for my birthday. So holiday Inn is a little gem! As soon as we got upgraded the room by Mr.Rajai he is a chief concierge manager and I would like to say wow thank you so much for your kindly help Rajai. You're a nice person first we arrival he greeting as well as he gave more information to us too. Wish you visit phuket Thailand again. The staff is very helpful and with warm service special Mr.Tai Onn for preparing the delicious birthday cake and 1box of chocolate for my bd. You guys provide such an excellent service. The room quite nice and pretty huge bed for twin bed. The location is very convenient,only few minutes walk to shops,restaurants, massage. -The breakfast have a lot of choice but well that's for exclusive lounge that we were

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Sassy Singapore
desc: Beautiful entrance. We had to wait for our rooms as they weren’t ready! Frustrating as we were late so there was no excuse. Housekeeping very delayed service. Staff not very efficient. I found this surprising as the East has amazing service. I will find other options when visiting Singapore again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family trip
desc: Stayed briefly during a family trip. This is value for money place to stay along Orchard road. Easily accessible being just a few blocks from the main road where shopping and dining are abound. Rooms are fairly large and minimalist in design. I like this place. Get early booking for better rates.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good location
desc: This hotel is in a very good location. The room I was in was clean and everything worked properly. The best thing about the hotel is that it comes with a handy smart phone. U can call other countries for free and there is unlimited data from what I remember.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect location and great hotel
desc: This hotel is a perfect location - a few minutes walk to Orchard Rd and little eateries and massages are just a step out the front door. Very quiet, even though our room faced the busy highway. Breakfast was abundant, but very busy. Hotel was beautiful and staff were wonderfully friendly. A wonderful find and at a great price too.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect location with quiet environment
desc: I always feel like home whenever I stay at this Holiday Inn. Great service, very clean room and it is very quiet at night. As an IHG member we usually get upgrades for our rooms. From the main entrance you just turn left to go straight to Orchard Road. Starbucks is there, Centrepoint shopping mall is there, OG mall is there too, across the street is Orchard Centre.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good stay
desc: we stayed at the hotel in September 2016 and it was pleasant enough. Rooms could have done with upgrades as they seemed tired and the windows in both our rooms did not open. Apart from that staff were great and breakfast was really good. Great location too.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Overpriced for a Holiday Inn
desc: Nice location reasonable rooms but extremely over priced for a Holiday Inn that supposed to be focussed on family market. Pool area good, staff seem protective of business centre felt like I was a criminal for using the business centre without confirming my room number

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location and big rooms
desc: Enjoyed our stay at Holiday Inn Singapore. The pool area was a bit lacking / uninviting however the location, cleanliness and staff service was great and made up for it. We went mostly for a food holiday anyhow. The lobby area had good live music with a singer which was nice to relax an unwind to in the evening.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Perfect location. Every thing was superb. Room size was ok but beds were comfortable. Breakfast was good. Friendly staff and ground people. Wifi was good. Check in and out was pleasant and fast. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Central City Hotel
desc: I have stayed at this hotel many times over the years (Approx 40-50 times) and find the quality of service, the decor in the rooms the location and food services there to be very good. It has easy access to the motorways and if you instruct the cab driver to take the PIE then CTE to Orchard Rd Turn Off you don't get any unwanted tours of the city. Shopping and restaurants are close with a number of food courts close by offer great food at very reasonable prices. I generally stay on the club floor which offers breakfast and supper which is generous enough as dinner if you are tied and need sleep. All in All this is a great hotel in my opinion and that's why I keep going back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel!
desc: Booked this hotel for a few days while in Singapore. Location is fantastic behind orchard road at cuppage. Easy walking access up orchard, to raffles, bugs and for walkers to gardens by the bay and China town. Close walk to dhoby ghastly mrt station. Beautifully decorated hotel, stylish lobby. We were 3 adults in a double room. The double beds are small (they are doubles) but room accommodated us very comfortably. The bathroom is new and very clean. Great amenities. We were in a club room which included breakfast at either the club lounge or main restaurant - fabulous smoked salmon. You could order freshly made omelettes, pancakes, French toast. Great selection of fruit, veggies, hot food (Indian / Asian/ international), great bread selection. Afternoon tea was also included

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing experience
desc: I was lucky enough to stay for 5 nights as part of the Executive Club and cannot praise highly enough. Special mention for particular good customer service to Sofia and Kathleen but everyone contributed to a great stay. Gym very well maintained with modern equipment adjacent to a well cared for pool area. Rooms very comfortable and plenty of food options both at the hotel and within 5 minutes walk.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location and Excellent Service
desc: I booked an Executive King Room, which provided access to the lounge, offering excellent evening drinks and snacks, breakfast and afternoon refreshments. Well worth paying the extra. Service from all the staff couldn't be faulted, very friendly and helpful. The location was ideal, just off Orchard Road. The hotel also had a reasonably equipped gym, with cardio and weights equipment, ideal when travelling.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: I can't stop telling everyone how fantastic this hotel is. From the moment we arrived, were looked after. All the staff had a smile on their face & did everything they could to make us feel welcome. My 9 year old daughter & I stayed in the deluxe suite for 10 nights with my husband joining us 2 days later. As the deluxe suite has a checkout time of 4pm, our room was not ready when we arrived. Sophie from reception kindly organised a temporary room for us which was greatly appreciated. Breakfast in the executive lounge was great, there was a variety of food to suit both Asian & Western taste. Once again the staff (special mention to Kathleen, Linh & Henry - they were all fantastic, just didn't get all their names) were polite, professional & friendly. When Linh found out my

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Super central base
desc: With Holiday Inn you know what to expect. Clean rooms, excellent facilities and friendly staff. This was a great base for a brief stopover in Singapore. The breakfast choice particularly was amazing. Whatever your cultural background, there was something here for you.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: weekend stay
desc: glad to have chosen this when i brought the family to Singapore. the location was great since Orchard Road is just behind. there were several malls and food shops/stalls within a few minutes walk. my Mom stayed the whole time inside the hotel and she had a good 3 days rest while we went out to explore the place. room was big even with the king size bed, there's still a lot of space to walk around, and the pillows, not so soft, not so hard, just right. but i should've requested a room nearer the elevator, our room was 1355, so that's about 20 doors ahead of us before we reached ours! breakfast buffet is also good, though i found the menu a little to ordinary. nothing to say bad about the employees, they were all pleasant and accommodating, down to the housekeeping staff. did I

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: No Step-Free access for strollers/wheelchairs to leave the hotel to reach Orchard Road/anywhere
desc: Stayed at this hotel for the first time. This hotel had many big positive points BUT we had to mark it down as it did not have the most important thing that we NEEDED which was STEP-FREE access to get to Orchard Road as I have a heavy double stroller. Not good as we didn’t know when we booked this hotel. Positives: 1. We liked the pillow menu. 2. Nice big room - very comfortable - has everything - good lighting - even a retractable clothes line in the bathroom.....they seem to have thought of everything that is needed. Excellent. 3. Had the choice to choose a king size bed OR two double beds - this was very important for us! 4. Excellent housekeeping / clean / lots of complimentary stuff. Gave us a lot of bottled water. 5. We went to the hotel bar downstairs for drinks only -

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Always happy to return!
desc: Best thing is the hotel room, good size beds and very clean. Breakfast on the first day rather disappointing because we were given other function hall rather than the usual breakfast place maybe because it was very busy morning and we are family with small children

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn in the heart of fantastic shopping and close to the MRT
desc: A very lovely Holiday Inn - fabulous large reception area, great service from the concierge team and everyone as soon as you step through the door. Bedrooms - very lovely, nice decor, all the facilities you'd want. Hotel has a pool too - looked good but we didn't find the time to use it. Location - very good. We used to short cut through the bar and then you're straight out onto Cuppage Road - a pedestrian cut through to Orchard Road shopping centres. It's just 5mins from the hotel to being in and underground walking to the MRT - closest stop is Somerset. Transfer to/from the airport - reasonable price. Plenty of taxis waiting close to hotel for airport or transfers around the city. A lovely hotel, close to all the very best shopping centres and public transport links that'll

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Couldn't really fault it
desc: Once we arrived, we were made very welcome by the young lady on reception. Our room was really nice and we were so pleased we had paid a bit more to gain access to the Lounge...great value for money....superb staff. A couple of mornings we ate breakfast in the restaurant which was very nice...again, great staff. Great location near the "underground" station. A really nice hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Our room was clean and had all facilities needed. The reception staff were very helpful and efficient. The location was great. Big shopping centers and outlets for food at our doorstep. As we had to wait for checkin (2pm) they gave us a free drinks voucher from the bar.and said they would notify housekeeping to see if our room would be available earlier. We arrived at 11am and got our room at 1.40pm. In the meantime us girls went across the road and explored the shops while the men veged

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday 2018.
desc: We stayed at Holiday in in the Executive room and we were not disappointed with great service great food and cold beer. Well worth the money and the rooms were very clean and large with plenty of room. Would highly recommend this hotel when visiting Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Gracious welcoming staff; good location
desc: The best thing about our stay was the ability to check-in after an early morning arrival. All employees , from front desk to doormen were gracious, knowledgeable and helpful. Taxis available at all times of day. Very attractive pool which we never got to use. Mediocre breakfast...wouldn’t bother even though it means heading a block or 2 over to orchard road for something from the mall restaurants.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: I would have given the hotel 5 stars if not for some less than perfect moments. I booked a suite room and I was upgraded to the Parkview Suite, something quite unexpected as the Parkview Suite was the best room in this hotel. However, we had to wait until 6 pm before we checked into our room. In the meantime, they gave us a club room, quite decent in itself to rest. The lounge was excellent and its staff very friendly and efficient. However, calling the guest service hotline is less efficient and one particular request was totally forgotten. Fortunately, it was nothing major. We liked the suite room a lot and might consider coming back when we have an occasion to celebrate.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Business trip
desc: as always very nice. I tried this time the executive lounge, which was very good. Good food in nice atmosphere , drinks and everything is served. It is an exclusive alternative to the restaurant - especially breakfast.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Sunny Singapore
desc: We were on our way home to Australia after a month in Britain and Europe when we decided to break our travel in Singapore. We're there 2 days. The hotel was a welcome respite. On arrival, we were there about 10am. As I was a member of IHG rewards we asked for an early check-in. Even if we weren't members, the staff member, Timothy, went out of his way to help us. We were able to get in our room plus we were able to have a late checkout the next day. Just a beautiful way to end our holiday. As we didn't have time to do any sightseeing, we took a walk along Orchard Road for a couple of hours but came back to the hotel to cool off in the hotel rooftop pool. Wonderful, pool service where you can get a drink or meal. The room was wonderful. A great size and all amenities. We had

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful weekend
desc: It was awesome being there for two days. Location superb. Staff was humble & polite. No regrets.its the best place to stay in singapore with family and friends. The executive lounge was awesome, a memorable weekend

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic Location
desc: Great location, within easy walking distance to Orchard Ave. Fabulous array of restaurants just outside the hotel. Had a little trouble when checking in, booked and paid for concierge club, however this was not offered when checking in. When asked about it staff insisted we had not paid the extra, had to show our bookings and emails, which at 3am in the morning after a long flight, return guests and IHG members was not a good start to our holiday. Overall the stay was good, haves stayed at this hotel before when in Singapore, might try somewhere different next time though.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location
desc: This hotel is located just off Orchard Rd with the nearest MRT station 10 minutes way on foot. Outside the hotel you will find Cuppage Rd which hosts a number of restaurants. The hotel itself offered fast and friendly check in. Our room had 2 fair sized double beds ideal for a young family. Breakfast was included. The room is quite small and gets very busy. Expect to wait in line for a table after 9.30am. Food is varied and caters for vegetarians and meat lovers alike. The gym is small but the swimming pool is a good size for swimmers with a smaller pool for children. Service overall was what you would expect. A mobile phone is available in the hotel room for customer use. Check out was also straight forward and with the taxi ordered by the hotel on time, we left for home.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location, Excellent Service
desc: I spent one night prior to departing on a cruise. The staff was very accommodating. The room was large and was equipped with everything needed. Breakfast buffet had a large assortment to satisfy different cultures.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good hotel. Enjoyed it very much
desc: Great breakfast, Fitness room and Swimming pool are the added values of this hotel. Just behind Orchard road close to all main shopping malls. Good restaurants just behind the hotel (1 minute walk !!!)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Highly recommended
desc: Located in close proximity to Orchard Rd and multiple eateries and shops - bliss for those looking for retail therapy or satisfying those large appetites! The large well appointed fourth floor room with two comfortable double beds was a relaxing oasis for the three of us to reside in. Had a view of a “highway” and some of the city skyline. Nice bathroom and high pressure shower. The TV had several channels with fuzzy pictures - maintenance guy told me it was due to an external antenna which was “out of the hotel’s control” ? Buffet breakfast was tasty and had a selection of foods to suit international tastes. Tried the gym but unfortunately did not jump into the inviting swimming pool... I found the staff were courteous and helpful. One disappointment was that we were told that

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice Hotel
desc: The Hotel keeps a high international standard. Staff is courteous and the rooms are spacious and clean. Breakfast buffé not world class but ok. Nice restaurants. Situated close to one of Singapores major shopping streets.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable stay..!
desc: Had a comfortable Stay for 45 days with wonderful breakfast in the morning. Courteous staff responding to queries very quickly. Rooms are well maintained. Laundry is very expensive and it's difficult for people who stay for long duration. An alternative option should be provided by hotel for laundry for people who stay long.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Enjoyed our stay
desc: had a great time, great customer service. staff was courteous and polite. Family friendly and very clean rooms. Just a couple of minutes away from Singapore’s shopping Mecca the orchard street. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good room size. Nice breakfast options.
desc: Two adults and two kids. Good room for a family. Buffet breakfast had really good options but it could be amazingly busy in the restaurant during peak hours. Restaurant staff were wonderful and courteous. Truly appreciate how they accommodate everyone nicely despite the busy set-up. During the busiest days, we were re-directed to the Executive Lounge where we had our breakfast quietly. My kids were impressed by the hotel staff's gesture. Near Orchard Road - it was good walking distance to restaurants and the shops. Although we were happy to have the access to the pool, I realised that when visiting Singapore, it's not really necessary to have this extra perk.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great gym
desc: Very comfortable bed, Good pillows. Quiet. Good gym with free weights, treadmills, spin bikes, etc. Conveniently located just be sure to state correct address as taxi driver dropped us at the Holiday Inn Express which was an 8 minute walk away!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: EXCELLENT, WELL LOCATED GEM OF A HOTEL
desc: I cannot say enough about the location, ambiance, staff and overall quality of this hotel. We had a beyond expectation stay at this hotel. We arrived in Singapore for the U.S. very early and the great front desk (cannot remember his name:( was so great in checking us in around 5 am. The hotel lobby was magnificent and our 2 double bed room fit the 4 of us (2 boys and 2 adults) comfortably and the room was a standard size. The breakfast was excellent with choices of Western and Asian dishes and yes there were choices for Vegans. The pool was nice and the gym was equipped with what you needed to have a nice workout. There is a smaller pool for the little ones as well. The hotel is very well situated next to a really nice mall (in addition to all the shopping on orchard)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A very pleasant stay
desc: Our recent stay at the Holiday Inn Orchid City was very pleasant. Staff are lovely and helpful in particular the team at the bar and in the executive lounge. Floveinnia, AisuLuu, Jason (to name a few) and the whisky specialist at the bar all provided a warm welcome and were providing an above and beyond service to ensure we had all we needed.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very nice property
desc: Everything was great except the hotel information indicated that there was a airport shuttle. When we arrived ask about the shuttle to the airport we were told they didn’t have a shuttle. It was a shuttle that they set up for guests for a fee. The fee was only $8.00 but I t doesn’t run all the time. It wasn’t available the time and day we needed. They arranged a really nice van service for us but it cost $55.00 Singapore dollars. It was very misleading at best. Other than that the property and service was outstanding! 2-18-2018 Rich & Dena USA

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A Very nice hotel
desc: We stayed at Holiday Inn for 5 nights and we enjoyed the stay. The rooms are nice and as shown in pictures. Staff are extremely friendly and helpful. The breakfast included in our package was well managed. Similarly the check in and check out process was smooth. The only suggestion that I have is to expand or rotate the breakfast options particularly Indian and vegetarian food. Also some kid friendly zones in the hotel with their games/activities would really help families visiting with children.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Hotel
desc: Hotel is very nice & in a great location only a few mins walk to Orchard Rd & near restaurants/bars. Rooms are comfortable with great pillow selection. Bathroom is great & included a bath which you don’t often get. Didn’t use any restaurants but lobby bar looked nice & the pool/spa area is also great. Staff were friendly & appreciated being able to store luggage on our last day.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel for Family vacation
desc: Great locality and world class hospitality, the staff were friendly and helpful. It is centrally located near to all the shopping malls and centers. I would positively recommend this hotel for family stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place, food and atmosphere
desc: I enjoyed my stay, the location is perfect right close to Orchard Road and easy access to the Metro. Breakfast is awesome. Sightly disappointed by the fact that there was nothing substantial offered to a loyal Gold Elite club member...makes the entire membership seem pointless

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent standard and good location!
desc: Nice, good size rooms with all the amenities.Friendly staff and very nice rooftop pool! Location close to Orchard road with all shopping/restaurants that you could wish for and also well located for MRT with the proximity to the Dhoby Ghaut station in particular where three different subway lines connect. Only downside was the noisy breakfast room!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: First impression
desc: This is the first time my sister, my daughter and I have been to Singapore. Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre gave us an excellent first impression of Singapore. We were very impressed with the customer service of staff from entering the hotel's doors right up to entering our hotel room. Everyone was so warm and friendly. I would definitely recommend this hotel!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Still an excellent value
desc: Holiday Inn Orchard has stopped providing Platinum members with free club privileges in accordance with IHG policy, but we still feel that it is a good deal in Singapore because of the convenient rooms, professionalism/friendliness of its staff, and its strategic location near Cuppage Terrace and the Centrepoint/313 Somerset/MRT area. On our recent visit we were upgraded to a junior suite, room 723, with lots of horizontal spaces for packing, on a corner overlooking the Cuppage terrace restaurants (some are poor, but a few are outstanding). We really don't need a room that is any quieter, cleaner, bigger or more beautiful. The room had two air conditioning outlets/controls and three windows with night lights both by the bed and in the bathroom and convenient outlets at both

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Home away from Home.
desc: Have been staying in this hotel for at least a quarter of century. The name of the hotel has changed. One laments some of the old staff have gone. A few still remain and that still makes a difference to the hotel. They make you feel welcome and at home. Notably, the "old guards" at the bell counter/conceirce. The new staff see you as any other strangers. Likewise, I see them as strangers. But the old boys are the ones who make me stay at this hotel for so many donkey years

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: I have been visiting this hotel for more than a decade and it is a great place in Singapore to stay. Excellent location , hospitable staff and value for money. It is always like homecoming to me. I will recommend this hotel anyday.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice Hotel, great location
desc: Nice room, good breakfast, and fantastic location. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Room was spacious and clean. Hotel very central to shops and Orchard Road, and close to all the best transport links.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful hotel - couldn't fault it!
desc: We enjoyed a week of luxury here. It was faultless. Excellent location for transport links and shopping. Executive Lounge is worth taking up. The staff were so welcoming right from the start. Those staff who really stood out, in no particular order were Kathleen, Linh, Sofia, Wu Qing (Nicole) and the breakfast chef - all in the Executive Lounge. We also were delighted to see that the hotel employs young and older staff and also those with Down's Syndrome. We would not hesitate to return and cannot speak highly enough about it.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable stay
desc: The hotel provided me with a comfortable stay complete with all the additional amenities making it a great stay !! Excellent location too and good service.... I’d consider recommending this property to prospective travellers..!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Hotel and great staff
desc: This is the second time I have stayed here, 11 nights for business. The location could not be better; you are not 5 minutes from Orchard Rd shopping, less than 10 minutes from either Somerset or Dhoby Ghaut MRT stations and literally surrounded by restaurants, bars & eateries of all kinds. I had a room facing out towards Cavenagh Rd, which also overlooks the trees etc on the other side of the main road. The facilities in the room are excellent and the room itself is very clean and well maintained. You will find the staff are very hospitable and helpful, with Sofia and Nicole in the lounge on the third floor being particularly welcoming and professional. I am looking forward to my next stay here, but a word of advice - if you are in a room on the northern side of the hotel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Short trip to Singapore
desc: Nice hotel centrally located, family friendly and has all amenities. Rooms are spacious and all staff very helpful. Close to Orchard shopping malls and many dining facilities for all tastes. Would return if back in Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Average
desc: The service is excellent. The reception desk is very friendly and helps you a lot. The breakfast can definitely be better. The location is ideal and lot of buzz around the hotel. Comfortable and clean beds

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn
desc: What to say? Very good location (MRT less than 5min walk, hundreds of restaurants around...) clean spacious room, excellent breakfast (western, chinese, indian), nice swimming pool on the roof and superbly professional service. Late check-in, very early checkout (at 5am and they even prepare for us a breakfast!). Next time again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Location Hotel for Orchard Street Shopping
desc: The location is great for accessing the shopping district. Orchard Street is around the corner, walking distance. The public transportation system (MRT) is about 5 minutes walk. The tourist info office is also around the corner for additional information. The hotel staff is very professional and genuinely courteous with all guests. We stayed here for one week. The kids pool was a hit with our daughter. The breakfast buffet could use more variety.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Two Stays at the Singapore Holiday Inn in Feb, 2018"
desc: Very good hospitality and staff dealings. Central location and close proximity to the Orchard Road district; ideal for shopping, restaurants and tourist activity. However, the room tariffs are priced in accordance with its central location. If possible grab the executive room as a booking and the executive privileges that go with it. I did this second time round while two weeks earlier I had selected a regular room, for which after a long flight, I found the room not to be ready; endured an extended waiting period, and then found ourselves double booked in another room. An emotional drain and very tiring experience. Breakfast servings and quality good without being outstanding. Would however, recommend another try for those interested.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: 3 days stopover
desc: Old hotell that is need of renovations, that said the staff was very nice and polite. Breakfest place was very small and que to get inn, when seated it was so small place you felt like people walking into your table all the time, and when walking to get food it was not possible to walk more then one person between tables. food was ok and good varity of foods , indian, chinese, and europen foods. Other food tips behind the hotell there is a resturant called Ali Ming stay away from that one, very bad service and bad food. (turist trap) if you want good sea food and best crab in singapore go to Jumbo seafood never had anything better then that.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: From Stephen Sidney Williamson
desc: Wonderful stay and super room. The bed and the pillows and furniture are very comfortable. Bathroom Desk TV and associated items all handily placed..The room temperature setting is just right.and the room is well lit and receiving ambient daylight.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service- excellent staff
desc: From the very first moment we felt welcome! Excellent location- Orchard road with bigger Malls is just behind the building in walking distance. On your way you would pass a row of small restaurant where you could go for dinner or drinks. Staff at reception, bar crew, service men at entrance are very well trained and help you with everything. What we found best: having a late flight back home we had been offered complementary switch of check- out time from 12 to 2pm plus luggage storage plus shower amenities. Room was excellent too, very good comfort for the price. Front door crew is very helpful with direction and the taxi drivers too! Excellent stay- will come back!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: perfect place to bring your kids
desc: everything is perfect and spend 5 nights with my wife and 2 kids (9 &11), breakfast is good with many variety, room/toilet is in good size, pool is clean, short walk to Orchard Rd or MRT, you can easily find many restaurants, food courts, shopping malls, convenience stores. Nice to spend some time at the executive lounge in the afternoon. Don't expect nice view from the room, I have one room facing the highway and the other room facing the back side of the mall. All staffs are very helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel for family with young kids
desc: Absolutely kids friendly 😊 ! my daughters were given pack of stickers and colours at checkin time so that I can do formalities with ease. The buffet spread is awesome from Indian to continental. The staff is helpful and ever smiling . Nice pool and quick checking check outs.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Not so satisfactory with the service
desc: I am IHG Spire Membership, I did not receive 500 welcome points until now. The other thing not good enough is that this Holiday Inn does not provide welcome fruits as most other HI hotels did.This is the most arrogant IHG hotel ever.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Big sized room in the midst of bustling Orchard Road.
desc: Love the size of the room and the spacious bathroom. Stayed here for two nights with my two kids in 2 double size bed deluxe room. Really enjoyed the facilities and the welcome drink. However, the housekeeping was not up to standard. The toiletries were not replenished. Even the coffee and tea bags were not there the next day. I had to call housekeeping several times to replenish them. If only the housekeeping did their job according to the hotel standard quality, it could have been an outstanding staycation for us. Hopefully the management could review their housekeeping performance to better deliver a memorable and great stay for the guests.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good stay at Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre, Singapore
desc: Staff was very helpful, courteous and very welcoming. Room was very nice and clean. Staff were kind enough to allow me to check in early by 11am since I reached by an early morning flight. Beds were very comfortable. Breakfast was good, although they were very few Indian food items. Roti, paratha & potato curry was excellent...very tasty, overall enjoyed the stay. Free hotel internet had good speed and connectivity. The hotel did not have a laundromat room like most Holiday Inn hotels that I have previously stayed in. However, the staff was very helpful and guided me to a coin operated laundromat in the adjoining building. Had a really good stay. Will come back again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location and helpful staff
desc: We stayed for two nights before joining a cruise. The hotel smells lovely when you walk in and is elegant and comfortable. The staff are very helpful. The room was lovely with two double beds. They have a happy hour in the bar between 5 and 7pm. We found it a great situation as it was near the MRT which is so convenient for getting around. Just outside the entrance is Cuppage Plaza which is a Japanese oriented bar/restaurant parade. The bars are open till 4 am so you can always get a late night drink on the way back to the hotel. Not cheap though. The Holiday Inn were kind enough to store our luggage for a whole day a week later when we had an 8am ship embarkation and an 11.15 pm flight. This meant we had the day free to sightsee around Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent
desc: Excellent, very cooperative and cordial team , all the working people are polite and they provide with the solutions for the problem we face . Very understanding people . This property location is also very good

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A great place so central
desc: This is a great place close to train station shopping centres short cab to all the good places and friendly what more can you ask there is porters room maids that clean well bars for a quiet drink and food is great

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant stay
desc: We arrived on the 29th march 2018 morning at around 10 and we were checked in our room promptly although the check in time was 1400 hrs. For a family of three the king size room was adequate and throughout our stay we found the staff and the facilities excellent. Breakfast buffet was scrumptious with a wide variety of choice. Location of the hotel is also very good. Stayed for around 8 nights would rate it as a very comfortable and pleasant stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Grat Location in Singapore
desc: Very convenient to everything and public transportation - just steps to the subway or the bus. Great outdoor market/dining even closer where you can eat and drink almost any type of food. Good accommodations and nice pool on top floor.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Friendly to kid
desc: Kid below 12 staay and eat free. Nice hotel for family traveler. Breakfast almost same everyday. 711 is near hotel. But quiet far to walk to Takasimaya. Needs 10minutes walk. Near Dondondonki japanese supermarket.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfectly located!
desc: Conveniently located hotel at the Orchard Road. Nice & comfortable rooms, did not explore much of F&B but the breakfast experience was good. One can explore from multiple F&B options next door. There are at least 50 of them. Overall a good hotel to stay at!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good
desc: If you're looking for a place to be entertained, stay on Sentosa. If you're looking for a clean, quiet, accessible location with kind staff, Holiday Inn is perfect. I prefer Holiday Inn as a base of operations where I can visit all the attractions of Singapore(and you don't have to pay the Sentosa island taxi fee). Their breakfast was good. Their staff were always very kind. The room was very quiet. Housekeeping was always around. They even let me use the roll out bed for 5 days, free of charge(save 200 singapore). I recommend staying here.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Central Location
desc: Stayed with husband and children for a few nights while on a medical visit to Singapore. Great location easy walk to Orchard Road, the breakfast was reasonable and catered well for our gluten free companion. Rooms clean and tidy with bath and shower. Good option for a stay in Singapore. The pool area was clean and quiet

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: My March stay
desc: I stayed twice in March - the first time for three nights and then overnight. It’s my Singapore home. I feel very comfortable and looked after here. I think, I have stayed at this property at least ten times, if not more, over the last few years. Some parts of it needs renovation though. Certain rooms, like 322. Great location for Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: vacation trip
desc: overall, staying in this hotel was good due to good location in Orchard road which is full of shopping malls, shops and restaurants. I stayed 8 nights and not got enough time to enjoy whole activities in Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: City Break
desc: Great location, walking distance to Orchard road and hop on hop off bus station. Club room is worth every penny (breakfast, afternoon snack, evening drink /snack) beds are comfy, room quiet with two good size beds that are difficult to find in Singapore. Highly recommended for family of three/ four. Handy (mobile) available in room gives great discounts for many attractions.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortably stat
desc: Stayed 1 night here with my fiancé. Check in was fast and front desk staff, Ms Camellia is very friendly. Our room was a premiere room that comes with a bathtub. Room was spacious and clean. Bed was very comfortable & room is decently dimmed that allows me to have a good night sleep. They even provided a choice for your pillow preference. Asked for additional pillow and water and was promptly sent up by the Housekeeping team. Only downside I can think of is that breakfast is average. Thank you Holiday Inn for a good stay!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent
desc: Nice hotel in a good central position friendly and extremely helpful staff I would definitely recommend staying here.happy hour drinks in the evening gives you two drinks for the price of one.if your interested in singapore history I would recommend a visit to battlebox fort canning whichthyosis is nearby.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Enjoyable stay in hotel
desc: Had a most enjoyable stay in a very comfortable executive room with two double beds. This was the criteria for our booking as we found only a few hotels providing two double beds. Room was very well fitted out, very, very clean, air conditioning excellent and the staff sooooo friendly. From the concierge out front to the staff in the executive lounge nothing was too much for them. Never stayed in a Holiday Inn before, but would again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good locality. Good room with facilities.
desc: Good locality. Good room with facilities. Hospitality is nice. Many options for food and near by eatery joints. Got local phone from the hotel 'handy'(complimentary ;)) which indeed is very handy for the first 2 days to be in touch with the family.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent service, the personnel is very kind, the installations are super comfortable, everything completes a place to stay with all the characteristics to enjoy and feel satisfied. I will return for sure

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Clean room
desc: The room was always clean. No smell of cigarette smoke. It was better if tissue paper is put in the room (it was put only in bath room). I had to bring several times a day. I felt it was a little bit expensive.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Overall very good experience
desc: This was very good experience to stay in holiday inn Singapore. Only one thing we missed there that was halal food section as Muslim we recommend there should be a section for halal food should be there as well.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect holiday in Singapore
desc: Our short stay in Singapore was quite a special one. And this was augmented by our stay at holiday inn where the hotel and staff was just above my expectations. The staff was very accommodating . Our needs were met with warmth and just service excellence. I highly recommend this to any traveller going to Singapore . And the location is just perfect

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic! Good value
desc: Its really hard to find good value accommodation in Singapore that is close to Orchard Rd.. well i have found such a place! The Holiday Inn is just around the corner from Orchard Rd.. so yes you can walk there! There are also numerous restaurants and bars just outside your door step. Accommodation was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was good too. I requested Soya Milk prior to my arrival as i dont drink milk and they went out of their way to help me. There are also vegetarian options which is great to see..! We didnt eat at there restaurants however they do offer 20% off the bill. Happy hour was great too. All staff were great and friendly. Highly recommended this hotel. Will definitely be back ...Thanks for everything

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Review
desc: As always, our stay was very good. The staff are some of the best we have seen and we travel all over Asia and stay in many different countries. The housekeeping are very friendly and accomodating as well..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good and effective hotel
desc: In the center of the city. With lots of spacious rooms and nice facilities. The only drawback is that hours of business lounge and cocktail is somewhat limited (until 2000) and that the gym is closed between 2300 to 0600. Beside that a great and comfortable stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Deteriorating Standards—scant sensitivity to customer & service excellence
desc: Been a regular guest at the Holiday Inn Orchard City Center for the past over 10 years. Off late have been disappointed at the consistently degenerating maintenance , service & delivery standards at this property. Over the past 3 stays undertaken in 3 months I have had consistent delays in “Check in” and “Check out” process at the hotel. Despite providing feedback in each occasion , I see no improvement in delivery and service standards. The Reception desk is more often than not understaffed or manned by junior in-experienced associates who seem to take ages to close a transaction. In most cases the hardware/printer or system software is blamed for the delay. Hotel upkeep and Room standards have also been deteriorating with some rooms having a rather foul smell. Revenue

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel and location
desc: Modern and well located hotel. Excellent breakfast buffet and very modern rooms. Great gym, good business center. Next to the Orchard Mall, with many restaurants and movie theaters around. Check in and check out were fast. Great place to stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Hidden Treasure
desc: Great location for shops, restaurants, entertainment places - we walked everywhere or took the public transport. Bus and mass transit stations are less than 10 mins’ walk away. Everything was great at this hotel - housekeeping, laundry, front desk, concierge, lounge, breakfast as well as the size and comfort of the room.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Well located in Singapore
desc: A really nice hotel located just off Orchard Road (2 minute walk) with lots of restaurants right next to the hotel and a descent selection in the hotel itself. My room was spacious with a really nice bed. The internet is not super fast but good enough for anything you want to do and I like the fact that there is a proper desk and chair if you need to do some work. The easy chair to relax in is also a nice feature. I had access to the executive lounge which is well worth the premium you pay. Good selection of food, snacks and drinks plus a very attentive staff. The reception staff are really friendly and helpful. All in all a good stay and I would definitely return if I need to be in Singapore again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Holiday Inn
desc: This Holiday Inn is just better than any other Holiday Inn I ever stayed at. Been coming here for many years and will continue to do so. Simply outstanding. I recommend to pay the little extra for the executive club room. The food and service are outstanding.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family stay
desc: Great service - arrived on an overnight flight with 2 kids (11 & 7 y.o.) - we were offered water during hotel check-in process and a kids pack. Most importantly, we were offered early access to our room so we could all have a rest.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Clean, Great Location, Nice property
desc: Very clean property. Friendly staff, they were able to give us an early check in with no charge which was nice as we had just come from 32 hours of flying. Really good location, easy to walk to MRT, restaurants and shops.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good enough!
desc: The room was comfortable and clean, and all of your staffs were very nice. The location is very good. I could go anywhere easily. I really had a good time there. It will be perfect if the toilet is functional with washlet.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Marvellous Service
desc: I had booked a room for myself here as my company had an event in it's ballroom. The service was top notch, I felt very welcomed. The amenities in the room were that of a five star property. Clean sheets, pillow menu, 24 hour room service, sparking bathroom and complimentary water. Service at the event was fantastic. The team was headed by Mr.Baharom and Mr.Henry. These 2 gentlemen went above and beyond for all the guests and everyone had a splendid night. Keep it up guys, I loved being at this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: EXCELLENT HOPITALITY
desc: It was very great pleasure with you in Singapore and excellent treated from Holiday Inn. Also very good housekeeping and faculties having in the hotel. I hope to visit very soon with you with my family.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The place to stay in Singapore
desc: I have been visiting Singapore for 20 years, always staying at the Holiday Inn Holiday Orchard City Centre . Although Singapore may have changed in that time, the warm welcome, efficient and friendly service from Reception, Clubroom, Restaurant and Housekeeping staff at the Hotel has most certainly not. The place to stay in Singapore and enjoy the splendid mango curry in the Tandoori Restaurant.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel! Great services, brilliant location
desc: Very nice hotel - people very friendly and helpfull! Room very nice and clean - beds comfortable and nicely spaced out. Good location in terms of bars and restaurants and shops. Plenty of little things in the bathroom - like toothbrushes combs etc... Breakfast good - they have curry for breakfast as an option but also fresh waffles and pancakes.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location and stay
desc: The staff are amazing, friendly, professional and efficient. Extremely comfortable bed. Breakfasts are great with a wide variety of excellent food. 7 elevens and shopping centres in close proximity to hotel. Orchard Street a block away. MRT stations about very closeby. The pool was also very welcome and we enjoyed it every day. Great loungers, chairs, sauna, shower facilities and clean towels readily available. Will definitely stay here again when next in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A trip to remember
desc: We can only speak highly of the staff and the accommodation at the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre.Nothing was a problem for the Hotel. I spent my Birthday there and they surprised me with Cake and fruit and chocolates!! The beds are comfortable and the pool is a great place to relax after a hard day.The breakfast was wonderful and so was the staff. A late check out was arranged as we had a late flight.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay and great location!
desc: Stayed here for a week and it was a very positive stay. The room was very nice, the air-conditioning was very quiet which was great, and the bed was also very comfy. The hotel is in a excellent location, lots of local shops and restaurants nearby too which was very good. The breakfast was also great- loads of choice and gluten free bread available too- omelettes on request too. Occasionally, breakfast was very busy and this wasn't the best- but overall breakfast was very positive. The executive lounge was good, however, it was quite basic and wasn't in a good place in the hotel. Overall, the stay was very good and i would come again!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel,
desc: I stay at this hotel about 30 nights per year, so I am often offered an upgrade which is wonderful.I am always treated the best. Staff is excellent; rooms are very nice. The location is good for shopping and the nearby restaurants are good. good value for the money. stay here

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Exceeded expectations
desc: For a few nights stay over, this was more than I had expected - welcoming, friendly and extremely helpful staff, love clean room and a delicious breakfast! I’d highly recommend to anyone and everyone - I’ll be choosing this hotel if and when I’m next in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One night
desc: Very good hotel in a Good location. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Everything you need for a pit stop. Showed the English Premier League match in the bar as well. Close to Orchard Road if you need retail therapy

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: What you can expect from a good hotel.
desc: Nice rooms, good beds. Overall breakfast is good , continental breakfast could be a bit better with some more choices. Swimming pool is nice. Staff is friendly and always at your disposal. Good experience overall.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Convenient location on Orchard Road
desc: The hotel is nice and clean. Close to the famous Orchard Road, a lot of restaurants, bars and malls. Have stayed at this hotel for several times. The breakfast was excellent and the staff are friendly. Will stay again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Very close to shops and restaurants. It is an old hotel and the rooms are starting to show their age. Not the cheapest either. However, the location makes up for these deficiencies. I was here on business and found the hotel to be quite and functional.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Decent option but price value can be lacking
desc: I am a frequent business traveler to Singapore and stayed multiple times at many of the ihg hotels, holiday inn express claque quay and orchard road, holiday inn atrium, intercontinental and this one. This hotel is solid, caters to business travelers (meaning cheaper rates on fri and sat than sun through Thur) and has a good location. It is a bit old and it can show in the rooms but overall you will get better beds and roomier accommodations than you would at the express hotels. The breakfast is a bit lacking and I actually think the express hotels do a better job in this regard albeit with slightly less selection. But many of the holiday inn center city breakfast selections do not taste fresh like the fruit and salmon. One nice advantage this hotel is a lobby bar that

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Centrally located and functional facility
desc: Located smack bang in the middle of Singapore city, adjacent to Clark quay. Holiday Inn proved in forte in addressing a eco-friendly facility with a location to boot. Breakfast is in-house and very business like, no.frills and no thrills to it, but addresses all palates, no elaborate spread this. The room are purely functional.enter t by e room and use the bed kind of space only, a.study desk provides welcome reprieve, the toilet is extremely tight space and the tall.and the rotund may find it a bit stuffy, Caveat vapor: clostrophobes beware

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Over rated
desc: This is not a bad hotel but it certainly does not warrant 4.5 out of 5. What works: price, location, cleanliness, pool, reception area What doesn't: damp musty smell througout, breakfast room is dire, sound proofing non existent I would not stay again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good size rooms for families
desc: Finding a large room for a family in Singapore can be difficult. The Holiday In Orchard City Centre has large 32sqm rooms with 2 large queen beds to fit a family of 4 easily. The hotel is modern and ammenities are quality. It is only a short walk to Orchard road shopping. There is a block of restaurants out the back, plus shopping centres with food courts and an MRT station within a short walk. As we were only staying one night and leaving early in the morning, we did not book breakfast. Service was prompt and friendly.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family holiday
desc: the restaurant service and choice of food was excellent as was the exclusive lounge on the 3rd floor. I would recommend this hotel for its location and service. We were also given an early check in which was very welcome.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The front office and lobby and breakfast
desc: I am very appriciated as a guest when I and my family arrived. And all the officers is very welcome. Breakfast menu available is very varied and very testy and a lot of choice. My family and I very keen on it and the waiter and ther service are very pleasant.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Twice a year
desc: Was a little dissapointed this year. I had a corner room this time on 6th floor. Was a lot smaller than usual rooms and miles away from lounge. General house keeping, staff and stay excellent as usual.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: No kids break
desc: This was a excellent choice very central to all shops and restaurants the hotel it's self was clean and very impressive for the price. Staff were very helpful and friendly nothing was too much trouble from booking restraunts and trips. Will definitely be back to stay again and the Hendricks gin and tonics in the bar were excellent. Just remember happy hour between 4 and 7pm saves you alot of money

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Satisfied customers
desc: We appreciated the complimentary early check in on arrival. Very friendly and helpful staff - very willing to assist wherever possible. Excellent service. Definitely recommend staying here. Handy location to Orchard Road.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: AWESOME HOTEL STAY IN SINGAPORE
desc: There were 8 of us arriving prior to a cruise and our stay at this hotel was perfect. From the time we checked in, we were greeted like family at the reservation desk. We had booked the Executive Club Rooms, which are well worth it, especially with all of the extras you get. This includes access to the lounge area, which is where we had breakfast each morning. And throughout the day, there was food and drink available, which we took advantage of. And the evening happy hour was a bonus, so we really had no expense for food while there. We also utilized the cell phone provided for both local and international calls. And we had a few pieces of laundry cleaned during the 3 days we were there. The rooms at the hotel are very nice, and I really like the no-smoking policy. Hotel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Would be happy to stay again
desc: Great clean and comfortable hotel. Absolutely fabulous breakfast (tea was boiling 👏) great service from staff, kids loved the pool. Hot tub and sauna available but we didn't have time to use. Mixture of family and business guest. 2 double beds in room allows us as a family of four to just have one room and stay comfortably. Children eat free at breakfast so worked out a good deal for family of 4. Surrounding area has 7/11 to get little snacks, Laundty in next building very reasonably priced and a massive choice of restaurants opposite that are used by local office workers. All attractions are a cheap taxi ride away so good location too. Hotel organised transfers for us from airport and to cruise terminal. Can't fault anything in hotel but be prepared Singapore is a

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Better then Best
desc: I am very happy with all the services provided during my stay.Indian Tandor restaurant food was excellent. Rooms were very clean and maintained.It's very near to all the good locations in SINGAPORE. Excellent service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome location
desc: Holiday Inn @ Orchard is a awesome hotel at a awesome location. Food is good. Rooms are very nice. Have a lot of resturants near by. Hotel also provides a complimentary handy phone. We can make free phone calls

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday
desc: Very nice big rooms, professional staff and super location. We stayed at this property for 5 days and it was amazing. All staff very professional and could not do more to make our stay more special. Thank you to all in the hotel. You rock!!!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Stayed at the hotel for 5 days, great hotel. Good size rooms - believe me i did a lot of research before going to Singapore as i was told that hotel rooms are pretty small. Nice lobby and bar area. Staff are great, especially their club room staff. Don't expect a nice view, as this hotel is in the middle of a built up area. If you don't want to eat at the hotel, there is a door by their bar area which leads to this row of eateries and bars. Found a great massage place in the same lane which stays open till 4am! clean and has a great ginger tea to offer after a relaxing massage.( believe me you will need it after all the walking). They have a nice pool upstairs and sauna in the bathrooms. Would be great if they had a bar upstairs serving cocktails by the pool as well, however

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good property
desc: very good location, breakfast should be improved and some more vegetarian dishes should be added. check in was good but can be improved. very close to orchard road big malls,overall nice property and location.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Hotel & friendly Staff
desc: 'Holiday Inn' knows how to manage hotels. i was really impressed by there top notch service quality. Rooms are clean & neat to the perfection.They are little small compare to other star hotels. We order some in room dinning Indian food and it was really yummy..felt like i am having it in India. Breakfast Spread is decent and there management at pick breakfast hours is excellent. Only one weird thing i found was regarding water bottle in the room..Those are kept in Washroom..is this SOP done across all Holiday inn's??...overall a Great Experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect for a couple of nights in Singapore
desc: Hotel was recommended by a friend and we were very impressed with how friendly and helpful the staff were, the location is absolutely perfect being on Orchard Road and close to all other big attractions in Singapore. So easy to get around Singapore - it’s great! The room was clean and well maintained. Lots of little luxuries in the room which included soap, shampoo alongside the option of fluffy or firm pillows. Simple but clean and comfortable room. Lobby is fantastic with a nice bar situated by the entrance. Entrance has a luxurious feel with a high chandelier. All in all, very impressed with the quality for the price and would stay again/recommend to friends.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: excellent service
desc: Best hotel in Singapore, rooms lovely and generous size, service excellent. Thank you to all the lovely helpful people looking after me in the exec lounge. Back again in July to have another enjoyable stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Well located, excellent service
desc: Comfortable hotel with great facilities. All staff were welcoming and very helpful. Buffet breakfast had a wide selection of food to cater for all tastes. The hotel was well located to Orchard Road and MRT as well as a wide variety of restaurants and bars in Cuppage Place. Would definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel at a central location
desc: Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre is a very, very nice hotel near Orchard Road. We stayed for 6 days in this hotel last week during our trip to Singapore. The location of the hotel is right next to Orchard Road and the Cuppage Plaza with a ton of shopping and eating options. The check-in was super smooth and even though we arrived early we were checked into our rooms. Being an IHG member we were extended all the courtesy. The room was very nice, chic and elegant. It had a wonderful window which overlooked the highway next to the hotel. I would just sit in a couch and laze around the window. The bathroom was great with a nice tub and great toiletries. There is a very good swimming pool on the terrace with a warm jacuzzi. Everyday after our day trips we would go to the pool /

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Executive Club Room excellence
desc: From check in to check the staff looked out for us and ensured that we had a nice relaxing time. We had to move rooms as room 523 was right above Cuppage Lane and very noisy - I advised the Ais on the Friday evening of the problem and Saturday morning Kathleen advised that room 550 was available for us to move to - not a suite - which the staff apologised for - but still a nice quiet comfy King bedded room. The club room breakfast and evening drinks and canapes are always really good and I must say that the catering on the evening canapes has quite improved with the excellent desserts. Many thanks to Mia and the staff in the club room. We like to spend time up at the pool and were sorry that we missed out on catching up with Gibson on this visit. A really nice relaxing time.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Long weekend after a cruise
desc: The hotel is situated in a prime location for Orchard Road, the staff were very helpfull we stay in a club a room which was worth the extra cost, the rooftop pool was great. When we needed a taxi it was always available.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Son wedding function@Holiday Inn - Orchard rd
desc: On behalf, son has had held his wedding lunch reception here on April 14, 2018 (Sat). Special thanks to Holiday Inn catering staffs for promptly organising timely, early reception before main course. Always go the extra miles and customer service is excellence. Thank for the prompt services. Banquet main hall were well decorated too, especially for wedding events. Hotel reception counter also provided prompt services too when checking-into, for room services. Executive suite (a king size bed room with toilet attached and another additional living room space and with another toilet attached) room have two ctv too, were also well kept and clean though things may look abit old. Suggest - Room should have freshest smell and or re-fresh up and get decorate for wedding couple.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable and clean.
desc: My family of four (2 young kids) was comfortably accommodated for 3 days. Great breakfast. Nice pool. Friendly staff. Definitely recommended. It’s about a 10 minutes walk to the nearest MRT. I’d recommend using the taxi if you have young children, however.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Our visit to singapore
desc: Food was good and service was excellent. And help received from staff when our son was sick is much appreciated. The hotel is also well situated (walking distance from orchard road and dhoby ghaut / sommerset mrt).We will be back!! 5 stars!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: wedding and 2 days stay
desc: food was disappointing during the banquet. breakfast buffet was average but the indian food in room service menu was excellent. In general, the staff are service centric and eager to provide any assistance.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Cruise to Singapore 2018
desc: Recently did a cruise from Melbourne to Singapore withe a few ports to enjoy on the way Adelaide, Margaret River cancelled due to cyclone, Port Lincoln, Fremantle, Malaysia, Indonesia and then Singapore. We were welcome professionally by the staff and had great service day in and day out, the Hotel was beautiful as was Singapore itself. The roof top pool area was outstanding and set out well and with great thought and planning. Unfortunately the Spa was being renovated while we were there. Definitely recommend this Hotel and will be back for sure.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Convenient Location
desc: Hi, The hotel is well located and I would recommend it. The staff is very polite and attentive, the room is big enough with good WiFi signal. They have a concierge who can assist you to know about the city however, note that if they say that something is close by, it is better to add some extra margin because I realized that the places are not very close as they usually say if you walk. I book a taxi very early morning and it was there on time. This booking was requested the night before. The hotel has a good beach also. The staff at the Restorant do a good job to accommodate the guests since the size of the same is not big. If you want to buy ok a hotel mainly to have a good rest so this is a good place since it has no many things to do during the daytime. The check out

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very convenient location
desc: Staff very pleasant, excellent location,really enjoyed my visit. I would return again for location, room size and friendly helpful staff. TV was very good, so was wifi access, good breakfast. Yes overall very good

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect stay
desc: I was there also 2 and a half years ago for consecutive 6 weeks, it was a very good period. Now I came here again and I had no doubt on chosing the hotel! It looked to be improved on some details, now it is almost perfect! Moreover they upgraded me to an Executive room: fantastic!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Stay but horrible Executive Lounge Access
desc: I always stay at this hotel. The staff and the hotel is made really well and also I had no issues with the room except “ the aircondition” is always a issue. I do advice the manager and team to please check the airconditions before guests check in to avoid the hassel for customers. Rooms- Excellent beds and etc. I disliked the attitude of the staff at executive lounge. I find the lounge staff to not be friendly and I also felt the food was very cold from breakfast to snacks. ( variety needs to be improved). Egg Station- takes for ever to get your food( for breakfast) despite thinking its Singapore you would expect better service). Evening snacks- is so oily and oil is dripping all over. The variety is very bad compare to Hong Kong and Bangkok. Overall - as mentioned above

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hospitality Mr Sufian
desc: Mr Sufian and his team from the banquet has made our meeting a most memorable one. His charismatic attitude and attentiveness made all of the delegates so comfortable to all of our needs. Thank you for your warm and exceptional hospitality!! Looking forward to be back in Singapore and of course this hotel soon..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice location on orchard road
desc: Stayed 4 nights here for our city touring. Pros: Location on orchard road. Nice service. Swimming pool on top floor. Small gymnasium Good breakfast Near other malls in the same area. Cons: Bathroom small

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One night stopover
desc: I booked this hotel for a one night stopover on route from China to Melbourne, Australia. I arrived very early morning at 0630am but my request for an early check in was met with a very warm return greeting accompanied by ,my room being ready for use, at no extra charge plus an upgrade ! What more could one ask from a hotel. I got to my room, my case also arrived immediately and then went for breakfast, which was up to the usual standard. Back to my room left a do not disturb light on and was not disturbed. Also made use of the free 2 pieces of laundry. Check out the next day was seamless with a taxi already waiting for me. The whole stay was absolutely perfect and all credit to the hotel management and staff .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Attention to customer feedback and willingness to improve
desc: I initially was not impressed with the service WHEN I checked into the hotel. NO information provided and provided that input on Trip advisor. I am suitably impressed with the prompt RESPONSE from tne management team. I was contacted to enquire about my comment and what could be done to improve the situation and that of thr hotel. This was during my stay. Appreciated that.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable family inn
desc: Stayed for 3 nights in a comfortable and clean room. Bit noisy of a night from people in the corridors. Breakfast OK. Prices for room service overbthe top. Paid $52SG for a beef burger and one beeer. Staff friendly and helpful. Not the best location and can do better in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: My first visit to Singapore and needed to stay somewhere close to transport. This hotel very well situated to bus routes and MRT. Good access to retail stores and plenty of restaurant options in the area. My room had all the qualities expected from this hotel group. Enjoyed my stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Relaxing stay
desc: Very relaxing and enjoyable stay. I felt like I was being very well taken care of. The room was clean and comfortable and very spacious. I loved the Executive Lounge. The food and drinks were on point and the service was impeccable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable stay at Singapore
desc: I stayed there for 2 days, it was my first business trip to Singapore. I had a good experience with holiday inn. Nice and comfortable room and well trained staff is the USP of the hotel. Hotel location is also very good, well connected and centrally located at main city.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Will come back again
desc: Excellent location near Orchard Road and easy access to restaurants, MRT. Room spacious and clean and breakfast with good choice of food. Comfortable bed and office desk allows one to work in the room. Ideal for business traveller

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best of both worlds
desc: Rooms are nice and quiet, no issues with internet. Step outside and you have many different restaurants within 1 block of the hotel. All of the staff was friendly both at the restaurants and at the front desk.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Conveniently located near Orchard Rd
desc: Great location near Orchard Rd, not to mention and few pubs and restaurants on its doorstep. A big pool to relax in.
