Staff went above and beyond for granting us Club Lounge access for a reduced fee. The buffet breakfast had a surprisingly large number of tasty selections to choose from. Also can't fault the cleanliness or state of the rooms. A great stay!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Memorable Stay
desc: Getting to Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre got off to a slow start due to a miscommunication. My email requesting for a maxi cab did not reach the Concierge, so we waited at the airport and ended up getting a public cab. Check in was swift but the staff (James) seemed fairly new, quoted me incorrect room rates and had to call me to authorise additional charges. These weren't problems for me having stayed at Holiday Inn Kandooma and Intercontinental Bali. It is a brand I still trust and have confidence. The connecting rooms were fantastic. We were also provided with welcome fruits, chocolates and kids' amenities. Hotel location was good - walking distances to Somerset MRT and close to shops and eateries in Orchard Central, Orchard Gateway and a nearby 24hour laundry.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable with a good location.
desc: The hotel main area could do with some updating, but cleaning of the furniture and carpet would help in the mean time. The rooms are small but comfortable and the beds were the right firmness so you slept the night the night away. There are satay places and restaurants within walking distance, as well an a 7 eleven if you need snacks and additional water. The hotel is also not very far from the main attractions such as the Botanical Gardens, Zoo etc about 30 minutes to either by taxi. For first time travelers to Singapore note the hotel does not really call a taxi for you , you have to queue outside where they will direct the taxis. If you don't want to wait I suggest you call a taxi yourself as the lines can get pretty long, also you can get a private vehicle to any

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent as always!
desc: I've been staying at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre now for many years on a regular basis. It's absolutely convenient, very comfortable and has become my home in Singapore and the services standards are excellent and have been consistent throughout the years. Will not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore : Wonderful Hotel in walking distance to Orchard Road
desc: Modern and elegant hotel, a few streets away form one of the main shopping streets of Singapore. The staff were always very polite, obliging and friendly. My room was large, well equipped and in impeccable condition. An excellent breakfast is also served every morning. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel and staff services. Highly recommended.
desc: Excellent hotel facilities, amenities and affordable accomodation. And most of all great staff services kind, friendly, helpfull and easy to approach any inquiries. Awesome stay holiday in Holiday Inn Orchard Sngapore.... from Melbourne Australia.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic hotel right in the heart of the city
desc: A great place with spacious and clean rooms offering a very good option in the heart of the city and shopping places. Easily accessible by car and MRT too. The check in process was simple and straight forward and we got what was booked earlier with no fuss.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: 2 hours waiting check in
desc: We arrived at 13:00 than they asked us to wait until 14:00 that is ok but when we arrived at 14:00 they told us that we must wait until 15:00, so we are still in the lobby with 4 kids and 1 baby, very uncomfortable, they offer us just 2 free drinks for 4 adults and 5 children. This is my last time on Holiday Inn.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place to stay
desc: Our 3 night stay was a great way to end our holiday after a cruise from Australia. Looks less impressive than other major hotels from the outside but inside we couldn't fault anything - friendly and helpful staff, quality room, nice outdoor pool at the top and just a few minutes walk to restaurants and Orchard Road. Recommend the Executive Club if you stay here - it's worth the extra

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One night stay
desc: The room was very clean and everything you needed was provided. I only stayed one night and really appreciated the fact my cases were held for me after check out. I was also allowed to use the shower at the pool after a day sightseeing and then flying out in the evening.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Disappointed and not impressed
desc: Sorry but this Holiday Inn falls short of all the Holiday Inns and other IHG hotels we've stayed at worldwide. As an Spire elite member, we are more than disappointed. We booked and paid for and requested a room close to the elevator. Point in fact we couldn't have had a room FURTHER away from the elevator! I'm not joking, our room was as far away from the elevator as the hotel could give us! We also requested a walk in shower for my elderly spouse. No joy as they gave us a bath tub with a step over into the tub shower. Worse, every night for the 4 nights we stayed at this hotel, there was VERY LOUD music booming ALL night until 5:45am from the many bars and discos right outside the hotel windows. Yes you read that correct until a quarter to 6am in the morning every night and

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service great location
desc: The hotel had renovated since the last I visited, the service remain excellent, personalize with great smiling. Thank you to Saori-san whom I noticed even busy she still very helpful to assist me during check in. Great job.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel, excellent service
desc: This hotel is excellent in terms of rooms and service. it is also very convenient because it us very close to MRT and very many shopping malls. there is also a big number of restaurants and bars right next to it. The staff are very friendly and the rooms are very clean.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: wonderful, perfect felling at home
desc: breakfast should not miss, bed & pillows are just great. also bathrooms always clean, staff is always helpful, smiling on the whole very accommodating. This isw one of the best places to stay in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Hotel with a Wonderful location.
desc: We spent 7 days here. The Hotel is very clean and has all the amenities. We were 2 adults with 2 kids. The beds are nice and large roomy for all 4 of us. The room was nice. The air-conditioning was good and could control it well. Usually most Hotel rooms have problems with their air-conditioning levels. They gave us an extended checkout as our flight was in the evening. The location is wonderful. A few minutes away from the main shopping and eating areas on Orchard Street. Also the MRT is just a 7 minute walk away. A Plus 5 for the location only. Will stay here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Always the first option
desc: It is always nice to come back to the familiar fragrance of the hotel and the convenience of the location. We got a room with a bathtub this time, a wonderful surprise. There's complimentary parking for in-house guest, bars, 7-eleven, massage centres and shopping mall. Will look forward for my next visit soon.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Stay , Great location
desc: As a family of 7 for a week long vacation in Singapore this was ideal, although Breakfast was a little rush, it was our fault also to turn up in the last hour. House keeping, is excellent along with very courteous staff.Altogether a memorable one .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel in a great location
desc: Very frindly staff, nice and clean hotel. Perfect location - close to Orchard road. Nice pool area with plenty of sun lounges. The breakfast had a great variety of food. The check in and check out was very easy.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Hotel comfortable and close to Orchard Road
desc: Hotel is similar to others in Singapore, no issue with room etc. You need to be careful with which credit card you offer on check in as they reserve an estimated amount upfront. For a two night stay, they reserved $950. (and this was not clearly communicated, as I would have used my normal credit card if known) On check out they charge actual costs of $850 for room, which is fine, but the reserved amount locked our travel card out of our remaining Singapore dollars for rest of our trip. Food and drink prices excessive / silly (a beer approx. $20 Sing plus plus,although this appears to be typical in Singapore these days.)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Custome Service
desc: Staff at the front desk are friendly and very helpful. Hotel is very clean and conveniently located on Orchard Road. Breakfast is great and caters for both Western and local cuisine. Rooms are vey clean and large.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic Stay in a Wonderful Hotel
desc: Stayed as a family for 5 nights in May. Every element of our stay was wonderful. From the moment we stepped out of the Taxi from the airport, bags were taken and sent to our room while we checked in. Check in was a swift and pain free process with one of the friendliest male staff we have ever encountered. On getting to the room we were presented with a lovely Birthday Cake for our daughter with the compliments of the hotel who had picked up on the fact it had been her Birthday two days earlier - along with a plate of fruit in the shape of a smiley face :-) Room was exceptionally clean and comfortable - we were on the 7th Floor with a Park View. Two double beds and a bathroom full of amenities served us well. Breakfast each morning was a sumptuous spread with everything you

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Decent Hotel in the heart of city centre
desc: I was there to attend conference and not really enjoying any facilities by the hotel. Two nights stay and we are most of the time out of the room. Room is spacious and amenities are decent. Access by walking to 313 shopping mall

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Hotel for Family
desc: Stayed 2 nights here, good for family with little kids since they have 2 double bed. Breakfast was excellent, also free for kids. My kids love and enjoy the breakfast. Near to orchard rd, just a walking distance. It will be woderful if the shower is without or not in the bathtub, since we have to climb in and out during bath time, quite risky and difficult especially for kids. Overall is a good hotel to stay. The pillows are superb.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: The location of the hotel is very good! Near by Shopping Malls, BUS stations and other conveniences. The Lounge offered an amazing variety of food and drinks that made our stay even better. Definitely recommend this hotel you are looking for an pleasant and easy stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: welcome back
desc: Always nice to be welcomed back by friendly and efficient staff. The room was ready early and as usual clean and smoke free as there are no more smoking rooms or smoke smell in the corridor.The location of the hotel is great for shopping and restaurants.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel, good service.
desc: I have been on 2 business trips to Singapore and Holiday Inn has been a good choice. Good price for 2 nights, good food but quite slow room service for people on a tight schedule. I had a late lunch Wagyu burger with truffle fries and I must say it was good and rightly priced.5 minutes walking distance to the city centre. Very good concierge. Would definitely come back. Thank you

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: 3 days in Singapore
desc: Beautiful hotel, great location, close to the centre & eateries. Taxis outside the door that are super cheap. We used taxis to get everywhere, China Town, Sentosa, Gardens by the Bay, Aquarium, Singapore Zoo. The hotel staff provided excellent service & were all extremely helpful & friendly at all times. We had never been to Singapore before so the Concierge was our best friend. We would highly recommend a stay at this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good room facilities and delicious breakfast menu
desc: The layout and other facilities were very good. The very wide bed surely attract you to jumpin and swim through your sleep. The view through the window was amazing. The bathroom is very net and well furnished. All most all required items were available. But I did not find any bathrobe and sleeper. I would love to stay in this hotel in my next visit.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Experience
desc: We stayed for 4 nights. Checkin was smooth and fast, room was nice and clean, they keep a handy (phone) in the room which is a great option for travelers, breakfast was nice with great choices, location is nice and near to Orchard Road. The only problem I found was that lifts are located in the center on every floor and my room was far away from the lift and therefore for every small thing I was required to walk really long, please ask for the room near to lift. Overall i loved the place and will strongly recommend

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing breakfast!
desc: Clean and spacious rooms with a whole pillow menu which I love (being allergic to feathers!) with clean bathrooms and toiletries provided. The breakfast is 5.30-10.30 and has EVERYTHING you could think of, great for vegetarians, vegans and halal options. We were given late checkout for free and free bottled water and fruit.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Yet again the best!
desc: This was my second stay at the hotel..Warmth, room service, indian menu are excellent. Rooms are classy and nice breakfast spread..Buzzing location with eating joints, shops and easily connected to all major locations.. Highly recommendable..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location
desc: I was taking a few days holiday with my wife and daughter after a Trade Show in the Marina Bay Sands....and wanted to stay somewhere close to the action. As a location, it is second to none.....being a 3 minute walk to Orchard Road and all the Shopping Centres. The staff are unfaliingly courteous and the room was clean and up to date. The hotel is located right beside Cuppage Road where there is a great covered area hosting many restaurants and bars. The downside is that, when you eventually want to get to sleep, you still hear noise from the place where, earlier, you were enjoying all the action. I would very much recommned it as a great base from which to shop and dine. Also within 5 minutes of the MTR.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best hotel stay ever!
desc: I was sceptical about travelling with our 5 year old and our 5 month old baby! Nobody can beat the hospitality holiday inn city centre,orchard road has to offer. We had made a multitude of requests during the tenure of our stay.starting from early check in,late check out.microwave fr heating up baby's food.all our requests were met without any delay. The rooms are very spacious proven by the fact that we had a baby cot(courtesy hotel!),baby pram and a lot of luggage.the house seeing folks took care to keep our fridge on (baby food) And replace used toiletry. The rooms are equipped with lovely lighting. Must mention the "oh so gorgeus" pillows!!the bed could house all four of us if needed.wide screen tv,mini fridge,mirrors,....hmmmm the list is endless.Must mention the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Stay
desc: We stayed here for 6 nights and the standard is very good. We were greeted on arrival and welcomed back like friends. We have stayed here before and the staff are very friendly and helpful right from the Gentleman who met the taxis to the staff in the Executive Club. The rooms are very clean and the beds are very comfortable and also there pillow menu is great can recommend the water pillow and the magnetic pillow especially after a long flight. Would like to mention the following staff who looked after us in the Executive Club Ais, Kathleen, Jason Marjo and Sofia also the rest of the staff in the Club who I don't remember their names. You all helped to make our staff very pleasant. It was no problem for the staff to book a table for us for dinner and both the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great staff, great stay
desc: Overall experience was good. Big rooms and big beds we didn’t need extra beds. Food is good. Thanks to Irwan for taking care of our needs. It was hassle-free for our family specially for our grandmother. We had a great stay. Thank you!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: It was a pleasant stay. Hotel is in prime location
desc: We had stayed in the Hotel for 4 days. The property is in prime location with access to MRT/Bus station. Cabs are available all time. The room was clean and facilities (Swimming pool and WiFi) were good. Please note that reception would charge 50 Singapore dollars per day as deposit which will be only refunded after check-out. So if you are planning for a week, please be prepared for this additional expense.There was no complimentary breakfast provided even for a single day but the Hotel had provided early check-in facility which helped to get ample rest after the flight journey.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good place to stay
desc: The place is very near to bar, mall and almost any thing you need, very convinient. The room is clean and quite, you will have a good sleep here. The breadfast is of many different kinds of good also and you will 100% enjoy the food here.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place to stay - Excellent location & Staff
desc: We stayed at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre for a week. Had originally booked for 5 nights, but quickly cancelled the stay in another hotel for a couple nights, and booked afresh with HI. The hotel has a great set of staff that's really focused on keeping the customers happy. The breakfast options are good for Indian vegetarians. While they seemed a bit repetitive, given we stayed for 7 nights, nevertheless, it took out a key worry. The hotel offers unlimited bottles of water, and a "Handy" phone that's indeed quite handy for international calls. Head to Cuppage Plaza which is right behind the hotel for a a 7-11, and a very good Indian restaurant as well and lots of other eating options. Taxi and Grab connectivity is really good. The big malls of Orchard Road are a

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Orchard City Center Singapore
desc: Staff friendly, particularly in the executive lounge. Beverages very expensive due to high government taxes. Location very good, just off Orchard Road, with a multitude of restaurants and bars in close proximity.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel with a friendly staff
desc: Every time I visit Singapore this is my hotel of choice. The rooms are comfortable, the staff friendly and the location convenient. I would recommend for business or personal stays. I would recommend lounge access to enhance your staying experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Preferred Hotel in Singapore
desc: Whenever I am in Singapore with my family, I stay at the Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Center. It is so conveniently located at Orchard Road and next to 313 Somerset. I love this area for all kinds of food. And you can easily hop on the MRT to go to another place. Beds are comfortable and rooms always smell nice. Friendly staff.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Bed room key system!!
desc: Bed room key system, staff came slowly and it took long time to get in room. Apologized and offered you did not need. Good location for shopping and food, but was not quiet cause bar area.. Good swimming pool,

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Outstanding service and thoughtful attention to detail
desc: We were a group of four staying in two rooms at the hotel. I wouldn’t generally write a review until after our stay but in this case Prepared this one whist still at the hotel I safely conclude that this Holiday Inn sored to the top of the league for its brand width and my expectations. We are IHG members and stay in many InterContnental group hotels around the world and all now have stayed at all the hotels within that group in Singapore. The building is only 7 or 8 floors, it is one of the older but lovingly cared for, the lobby is grand and spacious, the rooms are large for Singapore and refreshed to a high standard and far less corporate than usual but it’s the staff obviously led by a very proactive and thoughtful management, who respond to requests and any problems

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A Great Find
desc: Perfect location, very comfortable beds in well refurbished room, clean and good service, friendly helpful staff, the Club package a great deal, plethora of restaurants, cafes, shops close by, would definitely stay again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: It truly is an experience....
desc: Holiday Inn Singapore ensures that every guest who checks in is special and taken care of with utmost care. From check in, housekeeping, dining to check out......every single person involved were excellent and hospitable. The team at the executive lounge made sure that every part of your stay at the hotel was cared for. Starting with Jason, Ais, Nicole & Jay.....were truly hospitable all the way through. Thank you guys for making my stay a memorable one. The hotel is at the center of singapore with complete access to the shopping centers, eateries (there is like a line of eatery joints behind) and accessible cab service to all locations. Truly an experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Family Vacation in Singapore's City Centre
desc: Excellent customer service all the way from the receptionists, concierge, and bellboys. Room was spacious and free buffet breakfast is served daily. Hotel is also conveniently located near malls and shopping centres!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Staff. Great location
desc: I arrived rather earlier than the check in time. Seeing my children and how tired we were the staff gave us an early check in without any problem. It was a great relief. I am glad I chose this hotel as it was close to the prime part of the city.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best hgotel Near Orchard road
desc: Rooms are big when compared to other hotels in Singapore, all the staff are really good. vegetarian option in breakfast are less. location close to shopping centers. health faucet are their in bathrooms.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Close and Handy
desc: It was our first visit to Singapore and we did some homework to do before the booking. Holiday Inn Orchards City was our choice and it proved, it was a good choice. We arrived in the morning, and surprisingly the room was ready. Considering our midnight flight to Sydney, we arranged a=the late booking for a reasonable fee and everything went well. Closeness to the Orchard Road shops, buses in a cossy relatively small hotel (in Singapore terms) was a great choice. The pool at the top floor (8th floor) was convenient and well maintained. During the departure I left my laptop charger and the hotel concierge courier it promptly charging just the posting costs. Another nice surprise.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore - Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre
desc: Excellent Hotel. The front office and executive lounge staff is very good. Must give credit to the House keeping team as they are doing a very good job. Room is kept very clean. Highly recommend. Good location.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: enjoyed a return visit
desc: The hotel is well located with restaurants, shopping and transport close by. It is a comfortable, clean and quiet place with lovely staff who always have a ready smile. We have stayed here before and were pleased that standards are still high, staff are helpful and breakfasts offer a good variety of dishes. ' Handy' phones in the rooms are a welcome addition. Look forward to going back again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Family Location
desc: Make sure to upgrade to include breakfast if you have little ones, as it will not disappoint. This hotel is located about 2 blocks from Somerset MRT. The hotel was clean, and the beds were normal American size Double beds. The only thing bad we experienced was both beds in our room were in desperate need of new mattresses. There were dips on both sides that caused us to roll to inside which made our backs hurt.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Hotel with good location
desc: Good sized rooms for a family, good food and very cooperative staff. Overall a very good hotel at a good location near by to Orchard road shopping malls. Location is close to other well known places and MRT station.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel, well located
desc: The hotel is very good, clean, great service and well located, next to different shopping centers and restaurants. Singapore is very expensive, specially hotels, so anywhere you go will be expensive. Holiday Inn is a safe choice and good value for money.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good experience
desc: Ambience and Hospitality was excellent , Its located in the center walk able distance to shopping centers and reachable to any place in teh city within 10-15 minutes. Hotel staff excellent tour guides to visit in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location and kind staff
desc: Kind staff and great location in city center of Singapore Noise insulation is not that good, especially in 3rd floor because the hall is at 2nd floor and might have wedding and party in midnight convenient to find restaurant and shops, just 100 metres far

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Disappointed by the room service
desc: Ordered sgd20 satay menu at late night. Chicken satays tasted weird and we realized they have gone bad. Called room service and without sorry or anything she just replaced us with new chicken satays. This was quite disappointing especially when its not just random hotel but 4 stars holiday inn hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing experience
desc: The breakfast layout is great , the pool is great , the staff is very warm and always smiling. The hotel is clean . The location is walking distance from some pubs , 7 11 and food joints as well as some plazas and small massage places. The room is always cleaned out nicely smells great - taxis are always available . Highly recommend to stay here if on vacation !

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellant and convenient
desc: Great place to stay overall. Top shelf in all aspects of our stay. Friendly staff that always smile and have a very good professional work ethic. The location to Orchard road with a short walk through the food street is such a good tease for your appetite. There are some good local restaurants just behind this food street with better value menus.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service and location!
desc: the property is very centrally located - within 2-3 minutes walking to Orchard Road. The staff is extremely friendly & helpful. Breakfast spread is very good - really liked the noodle soup (chicken). We took a family room and the two twin beds were sufficient for our family - 2 adults and 2 kids. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for a property with good services and central location. Even MRT is close by though we did not use it.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The hotel room has luxurious space
desc: If you love breakfast, Holiday Inn Orchard is best hotel to live in. However, there are also facilities like gym and spa which you may like to try out. Reward for going green is a good initiative the hotel has taken as it has multiple benefit both for guest and the hotel staff.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Family trip
desc: My family had a ball of time at the hotel. The staff was extremely courteous, always welcoming with a warm smile, be it at check-in, housekeeping, even the Concierge (they have arranged for a big taxi considering the luggage we had). I would definitely prefer to stay at the same place for my next vacation.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: First time in Singapore
desc: A hotel with friendly staff, where nothing is too much trouble. Perfectly situated within walking distance of shops, bars & trains, there is something for everyone. As a local said Singapore is clean, green and safe.. Certainly a return visit is a must

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful hotel
desc: The hotel is quite close to orchard road just a two minute walk from it, the approach road to it is also full of bars and restaurants. The hotel staff was very helpful right from check in to providing information . The food served in the restaurants is good. I felt it was largely preferred by families.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Could have been different...
desc: Had to do a quick 1 day layover before my next flight and decided to hang around Orchard Road for convenience. Holiday Inn was decently priced and i was impressed with the service and room upon checking in. However the worst happened overnight when I woke up the next morning to a bathroom floor of literally 'toilet waste' caused by a back-flow from failed/blocked piping. I was in a rush to get to the airport so had to scramble around that to take a shower and checked out. However the little saving grace of this horrible experience was that the front desk reception and night manager's take on the issue upon checking out. A free taxi ride to the airport was offered and another apologetic email follow up later.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Bad hotel
desc: Hotel manager wanted to charge for paid stay without checking the details of booking. I have paid them extra for 1 night. And after checking he was not sorry and rude. It is 3 star hotel behaving to 4 or 5 star. I have stayed to many holiday inn hotels with better staff and services. My stay was from 17th June to 22nd June. Will try another hotel next time

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice service
desc: This is second time we are here. The breakfast food range is not so variety and the space is limited. The room is convenience and I really appreciate the service there. I forgot my Sony camera in the dining room, the staff of list and found emailed me lucky i’m Back in time to get it before I fly.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good location. clean n nice
desc: stayed here for 5nites with the kids (3y.o and 4m.o) room size was average, we got the room with 2twinbed and requested a baby crib for our little one. service was great, hotel room was clean though hotel is abit old. it got all the aminities we needed. hotel was located close to orchard road (near 313 somerset). behind the hotel, there were 7-11, food center, bars and restos (cuppage road). we stayed here during the world cup period and you can hear a bit of the noise during weekend. but the kids were fine with it. so we are not complaining at all.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic location and decent hotel
desc: The hotel's location is great. It is just off Orchard road, and a 3 minute walk will take you to many malls that you can choose to visit, be for shopping or food. The hotel rooms are nice - fairly large and well appointed with all the amenities that you would like at such prices. The gym is smallish but okay, the pool is fairly large considering the space available but what surprised me is that there were no life guard or even an attendant. Not expected for such a hotel chain and if they have a pool they should have someone around. Also, the pool needs to be more cleaner and the floating plastic divider was very dirty and potentially could cause diseases as there were moss and also it was not rounded so could hurt people, especially the kids. I complained to the hotel staff on

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A must stay
desc: The stff was fantastic... the service was amazing... they went out if their way to fulfill the small basic needs that you dont think about... the kids especially loved it and the location was fantastic

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Loved my stay. Would come back.
desc: Orchard Road is walking. MRT is walking. Friendly staff, Good breakfast, 24/7 convenience store next door, check-in was a breeze. They take a deposit which I felt was not necessary so I have given 4 stars.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect hotel to stay with family
desc: Hi to all my traveler friends. Holiday Inn at 11 Cavenagh Road SIngapore is one of the best hotel you can stay with your family. Prices are very reasonable and even after that they give you discount on food and other services. When you enter the hotel you will get a warm welcome at reception and you will be given your room keys within minutes. Hotel is very neat and clean same the rooms are. Rooms are very beautiful and spacious with a nice washroom. All toiletries provided by hotel are good in quality. Staff is very friendly,very nice and very much helpful. Buffet Breakfast offered is really very nice in taste. We stayed for 4 nights and we eat all our meals in hotel. They had a good chef in their restaurant TANDOOR who is very much concern about the taste and presentation of

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Stay and Superb Location!
desc: Apart from the hotel being centrally located and easily accessible to all major attractions, what made our stay most comfortable was the staff. Thiru at Concierge desk was always available to assist with a smile, reception staff was amazing (Vignes) the staff at the Executive Lounge served you with a smile and very accommodating(Nicole in particular) My kids loved the hotel and we would love come back again to this lovely hotel! Keep up the good work.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Thank you HI for a memorable stay
desc: I cannot speak of this hotel highly enough. This was the second stay for us and it was a great experience from start to finish. Location, comforts, breakfast, service. Will definitely recommend and stay there again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family Hotel
desc: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Center is a good hotel. Near MRT Station Sommerset. 2 Double bed has a big room and 2 double bed. Suitable for family with 2 children. Near the hotel a lot of restaurant. Good service. Check out very fast.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel, good location
desc: nice hotel, good Environment, nice location, not the best in the city but a good hotel. good internet speed. I cannot complain about the hotel. The price for the money is not the best, but everything is really expensive in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: I have been coming back to this Hotel again and again over the last several years and have always had a pleasant and comfortable stay and a superior level of service which makes you happy. My last stay was in June 2018 and it was no different. Always prefer the Executive Club Rooms which comes with additional privileges and is VFM.at a little extra cost.Being a Gold Elite IHG Member gives you certain other privileges like early check in/ extended check out, complimentary internet etc. which makes your stay so much more nicer, especially if you have arrived at the Hotel on an overnight flight. The Hotel has always been kind enough to allow me to have complimentary breakfast on arrival( though they are not obliged to on the date of arrival). Really shows how they value their

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday inn good central location
desc: Ideal location, right in shopping, eating area of Orchard. Sentosa, gardens in the bay, both short taxi ride away. Good, clean, spacious hotel. Friendly staff. All amenities as you would expect. Buffett gets very busy at breakfast so best to go early.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Debiting credit card
desc: To start, the rooms were well appointed and very clean. However. Your policy regarding debiting a patrons credit card leaves a rather bad impression on my stay. I was a little confused upon check out, when the girl at the front desk explained that it may take up to 1-2 weeks for the money to be re-debited into my account when it only took an hour to be debited the day before. I understand the idea of securing a card to protect the hotel from any unforeseen expenses.however, I’m sure an imprint of the card would of been suffice and not removing an amount, particularly when I didn’t use any additional services provided by the hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lovely stay
desc: Lovely hotel with a big, beautiful room ... right on orchard road. Cudnt get better. Staff and service are very efficient. Cannot comment on breakfast as that was not included. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Going on holiday at Holiday
desc: This is my 2nd time to stay at this hotel. I like it because of its convenient location.The rooms are a good size. Beds and pillows are comfortable. Bathrooms nice and clean. The staff warm and helpful. The beds were made everyday. Just one thing that did not sit well with us is this - my husband left his sleeping clothes on the bed as he habitually does. He was surprised to find it on top of the luggage when we got back at the end of the day. Perhaps Housekeeping should be told to leave the items where they are found after they make the beds. Overall, the stay was good but it was significantly more expensive than what I spent during my previous stay just 2 years earlier and breakfast was not even part of the package this time. Nonetheless I would still recommend this hotel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: First trip to Singapur, love the hotel
desc: On my first trip to Singapore needed a well located hotel. I selected Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard and was the best we did. Close to everything and with public transport stopping at the door. The Concierge told as where to buy the transport ticket and was great. The hotel is wonderful and has a piano bar in the first floor. We took the option of staying in a Club access floor and he lived the experience of great service from the staff and great food and drinks provided and some adittional benefits. Great stay!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel at great location
desc: Conveniently located close to Singapore shopping paradise_ Orchard Road, MRT stations are just around the corner and also surrounded by various types of restaurants & bars. Most of the staff are friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore Break
desc: Stayed at this Holiday Inn for a couple of days returning from a U K Holiday! Found the staff to be outstanding in all aspects. My Husband became ill while there they arranged for him to see a Dr Promptly As for Locality Great! walk to all the shopping

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Four Day stay in Singapore
desc: The hotel easily met all our expectations and needs commencing with the friendly and competent booking in with James on Thursday afternoon to the early morning departure on Tuesday for the airport. Very comfortable, spacious and quiet room, nice outlook and very handy to the MRT and buses on Somerset and Orchard and a host of eateries. A brilliant mini holiday made all the better by a great hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Worth it
desc: The hotel is centrally located, 500mtr away from hussling busling orchard street, shoppers hub, with good food options around the hotel Great location, great rooms, good buffet breakfast. Value for money.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: An Average Experience at Holiday Inn Orchard Centre and IHG group of hotels.
desc: There was no special treatment or welcome knowing that we have come for the holidays and accompanying a kid . No welcome drink was offered. No fruit basket or chocolate /cookies in the room. This is a usual practice to pamper the guest by other same category hotels. Inspite of the special occasion which was intimated by our travel agent , there was no offer of a small cake or even a pastry from the Hotel side. I paid for three person and the room after making an extra bed arrangement there was no space left in the room. Breakfast was a mess. 80% customers were Indians while we were dining at the restaurant for B'fast . Most of the Indian food items were finishing and the staff could not cope up with the requirements. The Indian food quality and taste must be improved. Hotel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best family holiday venue + Awesome staff
desc: Been a while that i found a venue that can compliantly house the family and we could relax and enjoy the venue backed up with incredible staff and friendly environment. When was the last time you were offered coffee while checking in. Defiantly be back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable
desc: The hotel is centrally located , walking distance from the orchard street which is a happening place and lined by shopping malls. The hotel room is fairly big and comfortable. The staff is very helpful. Good housekeeping service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Staycation
desc: I stayed at holiday inn orchard city centre from 8 June to 10 June 2018 for a staycation. Location was excellent as it is in the orchard shopping belt. The staff was friendly and professional right from the check-in counter to the concierge. The breakfast spread was good and the staff attentive. Room was in good condition and facilities well maintained.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location.
desc: Walking distance to Orchard Road shopping district. Staff are fantastic. I had a parent in a Medical emergency and staff were fantastic in assisting me with anything I needed including assisting me in the business centre when I needed to send things to insurance companies. Five star staff in a five star hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Our home from home when in Singapore
desc: This hotel is comfortable and convenient for shops, food and MRT. We’ve stayed at this hotel many times over the last few years. Staff are extremely pleasant and helpful. We look forward to many future visits.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very Good and Recommended
desc: Service overall is excellent and courteous. The bathroom initially had a strange smell but after repeated flushing and airing was fine. The executive lounge, as always, was excellent in terms of service, quality, and variety of food and drinks, just wished they served a good single malt whisky during evening cocktails. Concierge excellent as usual. Front desk were very good as they were not harried.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel
desc: The room is quite big..they provide mobile phone with unlimited internet...great locations near shopping malls, many affordable food around hotels, near bus station too...easy to find cabs too...the staffs very helpful

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Going downhill
desc: I have stayed here many time and always enjoyed it and considered it nothing but 5 stars for Review. This time, it is clear that management is slipping badly. I wanted to conduct small meetings while I was there 2 people at a time. Their quote was ridiculously high....I ended up getting Regus services nearby. When I complained about why you cant give me a small meeting room at a decent rate, they blew me off. I wrote to the General manager, and received ZERO response....that tells you something right there. When I left, I left my ereader in my room. I discovered that about noon, and called the hotel immediately..I was going back at 4 pm to pick up my luggage so my hope was to get my reader. She said call back in an hour and we will let you know if we find it. I did

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: My preferred choice in Singapore
desc: We stayed 3 nights and This is not our first stay in this property. Before arriving,I did request some items and all well prepared,Thank you for that. Pros ; Excellent service all round (thank you to Megan for accomodating my requests) Room got a bathtub Location 3 minutes from Centrepoint Orchard Pool on rooftop (it was much cleaner this time compared to my last stay) Many restaurants around Minor Cons : On 05 July,my room was serviced very late in the afternoon. We came back at 3 in the afternoon and the room was being cleaned although I hanged 'Please service my room' tag on the door On last night 06 July (room 629) , we encountered strange noise during midnight however we got compensation as a nice gesture from the duty manager. This is my preferred hotel in Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Central location
desc: Just stay for 1N after spent 4N in another Hotel in different area. Central location just behind the centre point. Room is comfy with 2double beds. Room size is adequate and clean. Will be back for sure for the next trip.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location, nice staff and great facilities.
desc: Have loved our stay in Singapore. This hotel is in a fantastic location, the staff have been very helpful and friendly and the facilities are exactly what a family holiday requires (pool). With the added bonus of being a reasonably priced. Loved it!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Mixed Reviews, Poor Service, Mis-Managed Property
desc: Well !! I have completely mixed reviews about my recent stay at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre (30/05/18 - 4/06/18) I am rather confused as to how should I be rating my experience. So, let me start off with my check in ! I was greeted by Chaw at the front desk. Very kind and gentle. While she was checking me in, I politely asked her if there is a possibility and feasibility for a complimentary upgrade to which she replied yes offcourse I am upgrading you to the executive room instead of the premium room you had booked. Happy and excited I said thank you, took the keys and went to the room. As we walked inside the room, we found it to be an extremely small room and not upto our expectations, so I decided to call the front desk to check if this was the uograded room.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fabulous hotel. Amazing staff
desc: Stayed here for a few days prior to a cruise. Check in was a breeze. Rooms are spacious, clean and tidy and have everything you need. Handy phone an added bonus as is the multi connector power points. Delicious breakfasts. Cuppage plaza is downstairs and had an awesome selection of restaurants for dinner. Central to everything which made it so easy to get around. An extra special mention to all of the fabulous staff. They are all so super friendly and helpful. Thank you for a great start to our holiday.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Singapore
desc: I was here for business for 3 weeks and this hotel is in walking distance to many rest, bars and shopping not to mention botanical gardens. If you like to get out and walk and see different things, this is the place. Very clean and really friendly staff

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Home away from home for business purposes
desc: Consistently excellent and friendly service, handy and central location, home away from home for business purposes. I have returned to this hotel many times and always enjoy my visits. Nothing is too much trouble.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable, central to most food outlets and shopping venues. Accessible to most places of interest by public transport
desc: The bed was firm, extra large, superb pillows - great for people with bad backs. The hotel itself is central and near to most food and shopping outlets - great location. The room itself is comfortable and very clean.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Quite good hotel
desc: It’s not packet with people like many other hotels in Singapore. It’s a good quality hotel. Very friendly staff and good selection of breakfast. The WiFi stinks though. It’s only okay. But streaming and FaceTiming was impossible. Maybe it will be improved someday The location of the hotel is spot on. Great neighborhood with good affordable restaurants. Overall I was pleased with the stay at holiday inn city centre hote

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent staff fabulous location
desc: I have stayed here many times the staff are always fabulous and the location is great. My only downside this trip was the bed was a bit firm and starting to show its age with a bit of sag There are many restaurants outside the door (the cuppage) and only 150m from orchard road

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location and amazing service
desc: Hotel property location is ideal for tourists. Within the heart of town centre, close to main shopping street. Food options limited for vegetarians. Pricing is normal, although some food items were slightly on a higher side. Overall, enjoyed the stay with family. Recommended for first time visitors to Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Singapore City Center
desc: The hotel has very good location, next to Orchard Str. with many shops and restaurants. Overall very naci and clean. Stuff very friendly and kind. The room spacious but a little renovation will be necessary. Good breakfast with many choices from local, Indian and international cuisine.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Times
desc: The service from start to finish was excellent. After a 14 hours flight checking in late, I have to say a big thank you to (Elaine front desk check in) apologies if I spelt your name wrong for checking us smoothly and letting us go ahead to get a bit to eat at the lounge before closing time as it was a great help .Thank you to the hostess in the executive club lounge, excellent customer service and nothing was too much trouble. I have to say the rooms were clean and the little fruit gift tray was a bonus. Thank you very much for my daughters birthday cake which wasn’t expected but a lovely gesture. I cannot fault with the service or have any negative comments as my experience was superb. I will be back at the end of June and will definitely be staying here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great value, central location
desc: Spotlessly clean, very friendly staff. We were able to check in early. Kids loved the rooftop pools and spa. Mobile phone in room for local use. Nearby restaurants, bars, lots of shopping centres. Several restaurants in the hotel itself.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Beautiful Property
desc: Excellent place, spacious rooms, very clean and looks new, close to major attractions and offices. Food was also good, lovely spread of breakfast, nice Indian food also. Check-in and check-out was smooth. Cab availability was also very good. Overall excellent place to stay while in Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location and comfortable property
desc: I was there on a business trip and stayed there only for a night. Location is excellent and has a lot of choices in terms of restaurants nearby. In case you do not want to go out, you can enjoy an excellent North Indian food at 'Tandoor', which is location in basement. I find food preparation was very good. It is not very far off from Metro station also, might be 5 minutes walk and getting taxi also was not difficult. It is right in the middle of city and moving around was also very convenient. Rooms were spacious, staff was friendly, lobby was nice, breakfast spread was comprehensive. I found everything to be quite good here.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A memorable anniversary celebration.
desc: Booked a one night stay over the weekend to celebrate my 7th anniversary with my wife. Check in was smooth and we were given a room on level 8 which was the same level as the pool and gym(a great convenience for me). The room was well appointed and clean. Although the hotel is situated beside a busy expressway, you hardly hear any noise from the road. What stood out for me during my stay was the warm reception and the quality of the buffet breakfast. I would like to commend James for the hospitality shown during both check in and check out. He recognize that I was here to celebrate my anniversary with my wife and promptly highligted it when I checked it. The complimentary bottle of wine really made for a pleasant surprise as we opened the room door. First impressions matter

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: World Cup foot ball everywhere and Holiday Inn is sleeping
desc: While the world cup fever is everywhere , Holiday Inn is forcing the guests to be in lobby only to watch matches .. Not sure if SIngapore is best suited to watch all matches from lobby. The call to guest services resulted in a polite excuse that some guest want to see in lobby with drinks.. But what about rest if the guests.. cheer up Holiday Inn. getting subscription to football will only make your guests happy.. Hope they fix it for future guests..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Super friendly and helpful staff
desc: The staff seem to be falling over themselves to help you from the moment that you walk through the door. The lad who runs the swimming pool particularly stands out here. Rooms are first rate as is the location . Will definitely come back here next year.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Hotel service and food quality
desc: My spouse and I visited this hotel for a staycation and celebration of our wedding anniversary. Immediately greeted warmly by counter staff who introduced himself and thanked us very sincerely for choosing this hotel for the first time. When room matters were settled, went into the room to find a nice bottle of wine and greeting card. Very pleasantly impressed by such a surprise. Nice scent, clean, well equipped. Staff were friendly at the swimming pool and gym. Nice cozy pool, jacuzzi was wonderful too. A couple of points to note that they allow kids into the gym even though there were signs displayed outside the gym that kids below 16 were not allowed. Some oversight there as these machines could pose danger to children. Also, there is a beside telephone that is

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Thumbs up
desc: Pros: Good location. Easy to get cabs to and from the hotel. Courteous staff. Comfortable rooms-- larger than most in Singapore. Plenty of eateries and pubs right outside the hotel. The hotel houses one of the best Indian restaurants in SP. Con: The hotel breakfast buffet wasn't very good. Overall, very satisfactory.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: It is just great
desc: The location of the hotel is great. It is quiet, will stay again in the future. The breakfast is good, but the service of the staff could be improved. A bit of smile will be great. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A Great Hotel In Singapore
desc: Such a great hotel in the central of Singapore. It is my first time in Singapore & I have to say I was impressed. If you have the option get the executive lounge as then you will be covered for breakfast, lunch, dinner & drinks which is such a bargain !! Will look at holiday inn whatever country I visit.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great choice
desc: Friendly and cooperative staff, clean and comfortable rooms, centrally located, lavish breakfast, pool and spa facilities, overall an excellent choice to stay in Singapore. It was well connected to MRT and taxis. Located on Orchard road which makes shopping very easy. Amazing property!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice room
desc: Nice room, good service, just that breakfast less steamed rice while we are used to eating it. Near public transportasion like MRT and near affordable restaurant. Special thanks fo Mr Zainal that explain the easiest route to our trip

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One day staycation when friends from abroad came visiting
desc: When a Friend and her family came over recently, my kids and I booked ourselves into holiday inn cavenagh road for a night! We were automatically enrolled into holiday inn’s IHG membership and got to enjoy the perks ah oh came along with the membership immediately. Our deluxe room reservation let’s us enjoy access to the executive lounge which serves snacks thruout most of the day. For breakfast, rather than join in the Long queue in the restaurant, try getting yours at the lounge. It has everything in the buffet spread other than a hot cooked station. Rest assure, the egg station is still available 😊 The hotel is also convenient. Just a few steps out, and you will find yourselves right smack in Cuppage road with access to Somerset 313, Orchard Centre to just name a few!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good place to stay at prime location
desc: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard, is on Orchard road and it is uptown, prime location in Singapore. Its service is great and the staff is also very warm and accommodating. MRT station is also nearby. Also, it is close to orchard center and shopping malls, that is also amazing. One thing missing was a swimming pool. Breakfast was great, it had a lot of variety. I would recommend this hotel to stay in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Incompetent Staff
desc: The property itself is fine and clean, but the staff is completely incompetent. Understanding English was a big problem. Too many people need to get involved to solve issues like if we were covered for the breakfast, which was already paid in advance. Having these kinds of issues when traveling with kids could caused lots of grief.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Beautiful hotel
desc: The shandelior of the hotel is so beautiful. The staff is full of hospitality and humble.Rooms are spacious and the outside view is so clear as they have one full wall of mirror clear view. And it is near the orchids street.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel for families
desc: Excellent hotel for families. In heart of city and close to most of the market / tourist places . go for executive option , it brings great flexibilities and vip facilities and services - really njoyed

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Weekend stay
desc: First trip to Singapore. Holiday inn Orchard was well located with plenty of shops and restaurants near by within short walking distance. Our room window was located close to an outdoor bar area so was not quiet at night. Otherwise nice pool and clean room. Staff were very helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel in a good location
desc: This is my second time in this hotel this year. I book it because it is convenient to the office, but especially because of the pool. A 20m lap pool, over 2m deep makes it great for my morning laps. Most hotels are shallow and not long or odd shaped, so this made me happy. In addition, the staff at the executive club are great. Super friendly and very helpful. Will definitely return for my next trip.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: On Night Stay
desc: I have stayed in this hotel many times and I really like the location. It is very close to Orchard Road and also easy to get too from/to the airport. The hotel rooms overall are good, however I would recommend going for an Executive Club Room as this will give you access to the Club Lounge.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Hotel for Families
desc: Holiday Inn Orchard City Center is located at the Orchard Street the branded shopping street of Singapore. Hardly 2 minutes walk to the Street and 7 minutes walk to the nearest Tube Station (Somercet). A family oriented Hotel, Holiday Inn itself is very comfortable with good size rooms and comfortable beds and pillows. The bathrooms are well designed and also have bidet showers. The staff is extremely friendly and will help you out with anything you want. The best part of this hotel is that the meat is halal. My friend was celebrating his anniversary during our stay at the hotel and the management arranged for a suprise in their room, which is very much appreciated and can never be forgotten. They also have a decent sized swimming pool, a jacuzi and a gym. Excellent hotel to

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn
desc: Hotel was lovely. It’s in a great area surrounded by lots of shops, bars and restaurants. I felt it was ideal for a family in a family room, as easy to access supermarkets, has a pool and room sizes are fine for family of 4. I did feel the breakfast could really be improved upon. The supposedly hot food was luke warm and a bit dull. I’ve travelled a lot and stayed in many good hotels and it wasn’t particularly good. However, the hotel is close to Milk and Honey and this restaurant does an amazing brekkie/ brunch! Overall and despite the breakfast, we had a fantastic stay. Hotel service is wonderful!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Many staff members are rude.
desc: Food served at breakfast is terrible. Staff behaviour towards brown skins is shameful. Hotel room are well equipped though my bathroom used to get a funny smell every morning, from the drains. The hotel isvery well located. The hotel concierge has limited knowledge. Try the tourism office on orchard street, very close to the hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lovely hotel
desc: It was our first in Singapore and in a holiday inn hotel - stayed for 5 nights...the first impression was very good! We were warmly welcomed and totally enjoyed our stay. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the room always tidy. Breakfast starts early in the morning (which was convenient on our departure day) and the buffet was ok. Didn’t try the bar though... experience which we will definitely indulge in during our next trip! Looking forward for our next visit to this beautiful and lovely country and hotel!!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Short Stay
desc: Great location to shopping centres, short walk to metro line. Nice pool and facilities and everyone was super nice and polite at the hotel- great for kids and breakfast was good -would definitely recommend

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: great location
desc: Location is excellent and no doubt with shop n eat options in the area.I have stayed across the globe with several IHG hotels and surprisingly in this hotel, my room preferences were completely ignored. Totally i stayed for 4 nights but first night was troublesome with noise.They were supposed to change my room when i was away on work but that didn’t happen even after i returned in the evening.In fact i had to wait for 2 hours for room change. Breakfast has average taste and i did not see much variety.Staff were excellent except on my 3rd day of stay i experienced rude behaviour from one of the staff members.She was particularly rude with all asian guests and treating others very well..It was shocking. IHG has a standard so this hotel shouldn’t disappoint it’s loyal members.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great customer service
desc: Stayed here in July 2018 with my husband and two children (3 and 7) for 10 nights. The room was of a good size with two large queen beds which was perfect for the wee ones to share. The room was pretty standard for Holiday Inn but what really set the place apart was the customer service. We ate breakfast at the hotel every morning and the buffet was excellent - good selection of continental and cooked choices, including eggs made to order. The kids were offered a hot chocolate every morning, which was a nice touch. The staff were cheerful and attentive even during busy periods. The rooftop pool was a great addition and it meant we could take a break from galavanting round the city on some afternoons. There was a large pool, with plenty loungers, and a little paddling pool

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Dated facilities
desc: I strayed in this hotel eight years ago and found the location was good and facilities rather new. So eight years later I stayed there again. Yet this time I saw dated facilities and the maintenance was poorly done. For instance, the caulking of the bathroom tiles were terribly done with almost no craftsmanship and the house keeping was far beyond the norm.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Hotel. Fantastic food.
desc: The Hotel is great. At a prime location in the city, the beach is just a short walk away. The rooms are a little small, but very cosy and we'll equipped. The breakfast buffet is vast and sumptuous so is the confectionary counter! :)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Quiet hotel close to Orchard Road
desc: Very comfortable and quiet hotel in the heart of Singapore. Hotel staff very efficient and helpful will do its utmost to assist you. Besides excecutir rooms grant access to the executive area where outstanding breakfasts, cocktails and foods are being provided.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent location
desc: The hotel is in an excellent location just off Orchard Road and next to the Cuppage Terrace bar and restaurant area. We stayed for two nights and could easily have found somewhere different, and nice, every night, to eat if we had stayed for a month. We were given a room upgrade for our anniversary which we were told about by email before we arrived. The upgrade room was great. Unfortunately, we didn't get the other benefits with the upgrade such as breakfast in the club lounge (even though I am a Spire Elite level member and other IHG properties have included this with the upgrade), but this didn't bother me, as we weren't expecting this anyway We even got a card, wine and chocolates for our anniversary which was a nice touch

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore
desc: Great Hotel. Great location. We stayed in a Exec Club Room and would recommend it to all. You pay a little more, but you it is really worth it, especially the beverages, which as you may know don't come cheap in Singapore. Could not fault the staff. Clean spacious rooms. Our second trip to this hotel and would definitely stay again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Almost 5 star... almost
desc: Nice hotel, clearly fits the profile of a mid/budget hotel in the more expensive Orchard Road area. I enjoyed the stay here. Some key areas to consider. Location is a real winner, it is slightly off the main Orchard Road is a less busy area, however it is perched just above/next to Cuppage Plaza which has alot of bars and eateries, so if your room is above this area, it may get noisy on weekend nights. Service is top notch, staff are all friendly and very helpful (but this is almost an expected requirement for any hotels 3 star or above). They noticed we were a family of 4 with two older kids and (without asking) brought an extra bed for the room for my oldest child to sleep, knowing the large king size bed may have been a squeeze. Well done Holiday Inn. Facilities in the room

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable Stay
desc: Thanks to the Hotel authorities as they allowed both early check in and late check out. This support was really helpful as I stayed with young kids. The rooms are specious and Housekeeping was up to the mark. The Executive Lounge facility is also worth mentioning.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good property but needs lots of improvements
desc: check in/out was fast, room was spacious but bit funny smell, thought to would disappear after 1-2 days after being stayed-in, but it turned out it didn't disappear throughout my stay.amenities were limited, which I didn't expect from a hotel of this kind.room temperature was difficult to control, once too cold, adjusted then it became warm, re-adjusted then freezing.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant & Comfortable Stay ...
desc: Was pleasantly surprised to find fruits and chocolates in my room, and all the facilities and amenities in good order as always ...., the lighting was adjustable, Good tv and radio channels and the coffee and tea making facilities were an added advantage. enjoyed my stay !!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Outstanding location and value
desc: Our family of 4 recently spent nearly a week staying here. The room was well suited and configured for a family. The breakfast was good and service was excellent. The location was ideal for shopping as everything was a short walk away. For the kids the hotel pool was fantastic with lots of chair lounges for the parents. We will definitely be back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Everything wrong from beginning till the end
desc: I am embarassed by my local hotel. My reservation has changed my room type prior to my check-in date & we thought there was an free upgrade to executive club room. But no, they explained that they will block the higher room type for me as a gold member & until the day of check-in to see if that was availble. I think it was an excuse, because they did not know what triggered this. When check-out, i asked about welcome bonus points was not offered during check-in. She said i should get 300 points & was offered 500-600 points instead since i told her about the issue when checked-in. She offered me extra 1000points for the hotel stay. But in the end, i still did not get any welcome bonus points & all the extra points for the good-will. So, i think they have alot of problems with

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: People count
desc: This was an excellent visit, and as usual it’s the people who make it special, from Erick on the lobby reception desk to Kathleen, Ais and Nicole in the Executive Lounge to the cheerful, friendly and helpful housekeeping staff. Well done to all....you turned something that can be ordinary into a memorable experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Disappointed
desc: Standard has dropped although a pen might not be an important item it was a very cheap looking one not one I expected of a hotel of this calibre. Bar staff are very rude and cater only to their known ones

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome service!
desc: Really enjoyed our stay here. Location was good and the service was great. All the staff were really friendly. We had access to the executive lounge which was great for breakfast and the added bonus of afternoon tea.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: family hotels
desc: hotel is good, staffs are courteous,helpful and prompt in helping, they even provided thermometer in real time when needed. complementary breakfast is sumptuous. however room Tv did not show FIFA matches. fruit basket was not filled regularily. overall pleasant experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: excellent breakfast and friendly staff
desc: We enjoyed an excellent breakfast. The staff was very friendly. I remember mr Irwan assisting us to find out what to do at Singapore. The location was very convenient because several Malls are in walking distance. But the two person beds were quite small.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Recommended stay when travelling to Singapore
desc: The hotel really has a good services from check in to check out process. The room has sufficient space and well equipped. I loved the mobile handy that used for free. It's true really handy and help us a lot during travelling in Singapore. Breakfast with many choices of menus, my kids loved it. Over all we are really happy to stay in this hotel and we will come back again in the future.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: great location, big room
desc: The hotel is close to MRT Sommerset station with several big shopping malls nearby, all kinds of shops and restaurants can be reached in few minutes. Spacious room and helpful staff. The facilities in the gym and swimming pool are good maintenance. Nice food from the executive lounge.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A great hotel for a first visit to Singapore
desc: It was our first holiday and Singapore, and Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre ticked all the boxes! A warm welcome when we checked in, friendly service and a quick checkout, made the experience all the more enjoyable. The room was clean, with all the amenities one expects -a special surprise was the bathrobes and slippers. We were warmly greeted at breakfast each morning and when we returned to the hotel after a day sightseeing - everyone at the hotel made us feel welcome and were happy to provide information when requested. Conveniently located to MRT stations, Cultural sites, Orchard Road, Restaurants and convenience stores, it made access so easy. We will definitely return to Holiday Inn,next time we are in Singapore!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Review of stay in Holiday Inn Orchard city centre, Singapore
desc: Excellent location, very near to orchard road shopping. Very cozy room with nice view. Dinning at Tandoor restaurant was expensive but good Indian food.Very clean hotel with good hospitality. Only one Indian channel on TV.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A quick one night stay.
desc: Booked at the very last minutes as had to change travel plans due to volcanic ash in Bali. Never the less had a good stay and was great to use the pool to wind down. Check in and check out all went well. Was in the hotel for just less than 12 hours and still got upgraded.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: check in service
desc: We encountered a very impolite, unprofessional, argumentative receptionist. We (my son and I ) both platinum member of IHG but she did not care we are and shown not interest of our membership. Not a IHG hotel that we will support on our next visit to Singapore. Check in impression given;VERY BAD/ POOR. Porter services, excellent!! Return visit UNLIKELY.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family holiday
desc: We recently stayed at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre. I highly recommend staying here. Rooms are spacious with 2 Adults & 2 children (although 2 twin beds are small) Breakfast was delicious and quite a choice too. Staff are very friendly and helpful. We found this hotel was very central to the bus we caught each day. We will definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very positive
desc: Pro: friendly staff, location - close to orchard, clean and nice rooms, rooftop pool (no view), nice club lounge Con: only minor...recommendation for the environment: laundry is always returned in lots of plastic wrapping Had various long term stays. Would recommend club lounge access...well worth. Team there deserves recommendation.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family Vacation 2018 in SG
desc: If you are travelling with kids... like us who have 3 kids, its better to get an executive room for comfort of the whole family. Our room in Holiday Inn is very convenient as it is near the executive lounge for breakfast. My kids love the pool area. The hotel is near to local areas like groceries, shopping malls and restaurants. Good choice if you are travelling with kids. Thanks KATHY

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location and hidden value
desc: When I was told I was booked at a Holiday Inn for US$ 240 ++ per night I was aghast! I never pay more than 200 $ for a hotel room - EVER! I will spend money on eating out and shopping, and treatments, but a hotel is a place to sleep for the night according to me - and nothing more! But the booking had been made by a friend and I could not cancel. So unhappily off I went. Surprise after surprise awaited me. The location is awesome. It is literally JUST off Orchard Road, but the "OFF" part made sure we had no traffic outside our hotel, and walking anywhere near by, we had the road to ourselves instead of bumping into the thousands of tourists who throng Orchard Road every day. The room was also pretty decent and even with a rollaway bed for my teenage daughter, it wasn't a

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Worst stay in singapore
