desc: So we stayed in singapore for 5 nights. But we shifted hotels to get the new feel of a new place and hotel. Before moving to this hotel,we stayed at mercure and the innotel. The last day we moved to holiday inn... The air con was just not working. The technician came twice to check it, and we tried explaining us that it's working. Room temperature showed 24 degrees. The guy thinks we are stupid.. We could not feel it working at all.. After a lot of request at late night they agreed to shift our rooms. But the other room AC also wasn't working... The other hotels we stayed in singapore had amazing air conditioning but this was just a mistake.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: excellent location and good hotel
desc: We landed at 7.00 am and had a unique requirement of interconnecting room with king bed and two twin beds. Front office staff were very helpful and got us our rooms by 10.30 am till then we had a comfortable place in the ground floor coffee shop/ bar to stretch our legs great location and good service. Ordered room service and the food was good. Glad we choose this property made our holiday that much more enjoyable

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good service
desc: We arrived late from Heathrow. Intitially disappointed that our room was not ready, the staff went out of their way to keep us in good order while we waited. And we were upgraded at no additional cost for waiting. Good food too.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: This hotel overbooks, no guarantee's on getting your reservation
desc: Some hotels now practice overbooking, like airlines, where they sell more rooms than they have. This means they may have more guest reservations than guests, and more guests than rooms! Unfortunately this happened to us. We made reservations 2 months in advance of our stay, for a family of 4 (2 adults, 2 kids). When we arrived they said there were terribly sorry and couldn't give us our booked room. We had to cram into a room with one bed, which was less than ideal. After many complaints, we were given our booked room the following night. I was expecting a discount or something for the first night, but sadly no. I just got frozen smiles and 'so sorry sir'. The hotel otherwise was great, good pool, good breakfast, small but nice rooms. Just don't expect to get what

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Hotel /
desc: One of the best places to stay in Singapore , top shopping mall surrounding the hotel , great breakfast and pool , generous and friendly staff ,very clean surrounded by lush green nature , all malls are just a walking distance

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good family hotel
desc: We stayed there as a family with a 12yo and a 10yo and found it easily met our needs. The pool was good and despite it being July, fairly empty. The breakfast buffet was very good with lots of variety and the food was all fresh. Right outside there is a strip of a dozen eateries that are a bit cheaper than the hotel and within 500m walk there are dozens more hawker eateries that are very cheap ($5 per meal)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Near Orchard shopping district
desc: Nice and friendly straff. Breakfast buffet is good. The swimming polo is clean and quier. We did have a good time staving ar this hotel. The shopping area is near, a few meters. We also tale a wall to botanic garden from the hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family vacation
desc: The room we got was great and the hotel service was excellent. You only have to ask the hotel staff and they are ready to help you with whatever you might need. The kids had a comfortable time and we enjoyed our stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Definite room for improvement
desc: On the positive side, the location of the hotel is amazing being close to the metro, bars, restaurants and shops. The staff were all welcoming and accommodating and were always going out of their way for our comfort. The rooms style, however, is a bit outdated it could be modernizedand the television could include more channels for both kids and adults. The baby sitting service was great but unfortunately not available during the morning and early afternoon., maybe that could be looked at. The nanny my kids had was wonderful and my kids liked her. The breakfast was a nuisance ...having to wait and the over crowded room with the same selection of food and cereals...could be changed or maybe expanded.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: FAMILY DINNER on 21st June 2018
desc: We 8 persons went for a family dinner on 21st June 2018. The Hotel is excellently located on Orchard Road, and easily accessible from any part of the City. The Restaurant was full and the time to serve was long enough, but gave us an opportunity to chat amongst ourselves. The portions served were not matching with the prices charged, we expected a little larger portion. We ordered for Onion Platters and those were served. When we asked for few pieces of extra onions, another full platter (on chargeable basis) was served. This may be the norm here, but not in many places around the world.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice suite, good location
desc: I booked 4 rooms for 5 nights. 1 deluxe suite for my husband and I, and 3 premier king bed rooms for our teenage kids. Suite was lovely, very spacious, clean bathroom, nice place to sleep and relax. Premier rooms were also very nice with decent size bathrooms. All had showers over the bathtub. On the first morning we had the buffet breakfast in the restaurant with our teenage kids. Due to high occupancy and busy breakfast we had to go to the Indian restaurant downstairs and have the buffet there. Unfortunately it was rather underwhelming. Some food cold and stale. Not enough choice. However, our suite came with club lounge access and the food was pretty good. We had breakfast, afternoon tea and evening drinks/snacks each day. The staff were very friendly and remembered our

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Friendly staff, great location, good for families
desc: It's in a really good location, close to shops, train station and food. Good facilities but couldn't get the kids out the pool. Also a great breakfast selection. I would have loved to have seen eco soaps etc (ith no palm oil) and recycling offered (not sure if it's even offered in Singapore though).

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Shopaholic dream location
desc: If you love shopping you are a 1 min walk from the beginning of Orchard Road shopping. A long street of shopping mall after mall with thousands of shops! Rooms are clean and spacious. My girls loved swimming in the pool and breakfast is amazing! Close to lots of restaurants too. I was truly impressed by this stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place to stay
desc: After many stays for business this time for pleasure with family! We loved the quite haven in the heart of Orchard Rd. The roof-top pool at night ( up to 11h) is a great “final” to a day. Great breakfast choices . Fast, friendly and excellent service !!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Quick Stop Over
desc: Fabulous cetral hotel with clean spacious rooms. Very accommodating reception staff who not only check us in at 7am but upgraded our room with an efficiency that was smooth and most grateful following a 14hr flight. Comfortable bed with the all important pillow menu, robes and toiletries. Close to everything with rooftop pool. Very clean.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fab place to stay
desc: Our first visit to Singapore. We were looking for family rooms and came across this last minute! Very comfortable room with 2 good size double beds. We booked an executive suite and got access to the executive lounge for breakfast and afternoon snacks. Well worth the extra cost. Very clean and close to all major attractions! Will consider staying here again if in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Disappointing end
desc: I thought the concierge and reception staff were lovely and very helpful. It was a last minute booking and we arrived late and exhausted having travelled for 18 hours straight from the Banyak Islands in Sumatra. So that was nice to be welcomed like they did. I was however surprised at the cost of the rooms since I'd previously stayed at the Pan Pacific for SG$150 less per night for a similar room! And the disappointing end was we checked out, left our bags and went on a tour. When we came back we got our bags and when we were getting into a taxi we were asked for a phone or battery charger that was missing from my room #526. I had used neither so I was completely confused and a little embarrassed as I felt I was (almost) being accused of a theft. So, as I said, it was a

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A very good hotel
desc: The hotel reception staff were very friendly and very welcoming and we felt welcomed. The rooms were nicely decorated and spacious. The bathroom was good. Didn't have the opportunity to taste their cuisine

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: STAY WAS AMAZING
desc: Location was perfect, Right on the orchard street, easily accessible to metro, taxi , bus service.Overall we had wonderful stay. Surely i will recommend to all my client for family and businesstravelers.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: best location
desc: This is 3rd times we stay at this hotel. One of the best choice for medium budget family due to the very convenience location. We usually buy the executive rooms to grant access to the lounge.which has a cozy evening buffet.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Location
desc: I chose this hotel because of its location. the hotel is at walkable distance to shoppers paradise - Orchard Road. Around the hotel are so many eating joints. We arrived quite early and the staff made sure og helping us with early check-in. Front desk staff is super efficient and pleasant. The only disappointment was breakfast. usually the restaurant is full and staff does not pay much attention. We asked for few things and the never returned back. Overall a nice property with spacious rooms and great location.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Average but pleasant stay
desc: Room feels / smells old, facilities are so so, service is so so as well, would have expected more from a renown 4*..But I must commend the strong and hot shower and good and clean bed.. Overall, an average stay but a pleasant one nevetheless!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Housekeeping need improving
desc: This was the first time at this hotel and unfortunately will be our last. Whilst the front desk and concierge did a good job, housekeeping was below par in my expectations and personal opinion. Furthermore I did not feel that our room was child friendly (3 year old) especially the bathroom. On many occasions there were instances of poor service during our stay. In one of the instance our hair dryer wiring was very loose and saw some sparks when switched. After eventually getting through to housekeeping desk which ran out for awhile a employee came to our room and snatched the hand dryer off me without a single word and proceeded to test outside. Said there is was nothing wrong until I pointed out the sparks and eventually replaced it. Another occasion, we placed a card

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Close to Orchard but with the quietness
desc: The hotel stays a very short distance from Orchard road (main down town road in Singapore). Therefore you can access to the busy but maintain the quietness if you want it. The staffs are very helpful in all requests with good answer. Nice swimming pool and fitness center is on the top of the hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Return vist and still great
desc: Well, I had the change to go back to Singapore again, just a year later and the hotel continued to make my stay a good one. I arrived late and was greeted with a kind hello and eagerness to find a comfortable room and assistance to find things late on a Sunday night. The location is great -- plenty, plenty of food outlets and restaurants and Cold Storage (grocery story) is nearby to help you pick up any quick items.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Hotel, Service and Location
desc: I stayed at the Holiday Inn for work. I had a great two days. Totally hassle free and convenient in terms of location, service and the hotel itself. Friendly and prompt staff. Over all a good experience. Absolutely recommended for everyone.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location
desc: The hotel is located in a good location with easy access to many restaurants and shopping mall. It’s good for family with small children since their twin bed is big and can sleep 1 adult and and 1 child comfortably. However the room is abit tiring and old compare to other 5 star hotels in that area but you get what you paid for. With this price I would go for a bigger room and comfy bed but the interior is not my main concern so I’m happy with what I’ve paid. We didn’t eat much at the hotel except for last day at lobby which we just order snack and drink while waiting for time to depart to airport. Penne arrabiata was good but too bad their indian kitchen open in evening otherwise would love to try Indian food also since they have an Indian restaurant there.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Not new but still comfortable
desc: Singapore is usually a transit stop for recovery as in our case. The hotel is not new by any measure but is kept in very good condition and is very comfortable. Rooms are not big but well appointed and the complementary Wi Fi is fast in comparison with most hotels in Europe and Asia. The bathroom is a little tired and could do with an update but was pretty clean and well lit. The bed was comfortable and the room quiet with no intrusion from traffic noise. Being located just behind Orchard Road, the hotel is handy to bus and MRT and any number of good eating places. For those who do not wish to incur the cost of hotel laundry prices there is a small laundry behind the hotel that will deliver your clean clothes to the concierge desk when completed.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel, close to everything. So much better than our last hotel in Darwin. Staff were brilliant, rooms were clean, modern and everything was modern and looked new. Great rooftop pool and gym. Couldn't ask for more.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location
desc: Hotel staff are very efficient and friendly. Location is ideal. Many local food stalls are located within 5 mins walk from the hotel catering for breakfast and lunch. Walk to Orchard road is only 15mins.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: People, cleanliness and service - excellent.
desc: Notable: Helena and the food staff on floor 2 and Marjo and Ice with the other staff members in the executive lounge - were friendly, attentive and always worked hard. All staff were always friendly and willing to assist. Thank you, Brad Collins

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable and well-equipped. Prime location. Has everything you'll need!
desc: I stayed at this Holiday Inn for one night and the experience exceeded my expectations in every way. This is by far nicer than any other Holiday Inn I've seen in the United States (where I'm from). From the grand lobby to the sparkling lobby bar to the size of the rooms and also the rooftop pool and restaurant, Tandoor. They offer a pillow menu for the sensitive sleepers and many in-room dining options, along with a very satisfying breakfast buffet in the Executive Lounge. If you are looking for a no-frills hotel with great service, and everything you need in a prime location, consider this Holiday Inn.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Will be back
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 4 days. Love the hotel and the service. Check in and out are fast. Convenient to everywhere, in the center. Business lounge is a plus, my kids loved snack time. Swimming pool in the roof top is very nice. Taxi is fastest way and price is okay. Choose Silver .... drivers are friendly. Love our stays at the hotel and time spent in Sentosa.( buy ticket online cheaper and avoid long lines).

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel, great for a stopover
desc: I had a one night stopover here but would have loved to have had longer. I highly recommend this hotel, it's quiet, the rooms are fantastic and the swimming pool area is a definite plus in the hot weather. The hotel is very central just minutes from all the shops and very close to Somerset metro station. The staff are awesome, I will definitely book to come back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Stay!
desc: This was a great stay for my family and I. Being able to check out a bit late was a plus! The hotel was within a great range of the MRT station thus it was very convinient! The workers were also very nice. Thank you for the stay! It was pleasant.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay on Business
desc: I really enjoyed my stay here. Realized they had free coffee, croissants and small rolls near the front desk in the mornings and that was all I needed given all the good food options in the city. I used the treadmill every morning and they opened it early on the mornings I was still adjusting to the time zone and woke up early.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good service
desc: The service is so good from you walk in until you walk out. The staff are friendly to my family... the facilities also good.The property is close to plaza and MRT station. Very strategic and easy to find.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice stay in Singapore
desc: Stayed there with my husband and two small kids. Great location and attention from staff. Good breakfast though the room can get crowded. Nice swimming pool. Standard cleaningless (Some dust hidden under the beds). Children friendly.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Efficient, friendly, modern & clean hotel
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights and got a great rate. I have stayed at this hotel several times now and enjoy the fact it is modern, clean and the staff are friendly. As the hotel claims breakfast is included in the price and is plentiful, they change various foods each day so you never get bored with the same food. I take my hat off to the staff who keep the breakfast stocked and the tables cleared it’s a massive effort with so many people eating. As a tip try and eat outside of the breakfast peak (8-9am). The hotel is in close proximity to lots of places to eat and the MRT with Clarke quay station only being a 5min walk. The roof top pool is fantastic however a few more umbrellas wouldn’t go astray with the sun getting so warm it makes it hard to use in the middle of the day ! Will

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Convenient to Orchard Road
desc: The Holiday Inn is quite hard to find being hidden behind the Cuppage Centre. However, although next to the expressway, it is quiet. Staff are very attentive and the check in process was quick. The room was large and very well serviced. Everything worked and the wifi was adequate. Nothing stood out, however, and all was what you'd expect for the price paid. The bar in the foyer is good and the lunchtime buffet very varied. Handy to have the Cuppage Centre so close so a good choice of bars and restaurants at one's doorstep. Orchard road is a stones throw away but better because of that.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Still has potential
desc: Conveniently located near the Orchard strip and the Somerset MRT. Hotel is not brand new but one could tell that there hs been some improvements/upgrades they have worked on like bathroom seems to be updated bit the room feels rather old. The bathrooms has that wet stinky dog smell though. Cant put my finger on it. We booked 2 rooms and we were on the same floor. Just a few rooms apart, housekeeping standards were different because bottles of water were not beingn replenished, hotel stationery missing from one room, hotel cards (to instruct change of beddings) missing in another room. Staff is very friendly though and helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Professional and efficient services
desc: Staff at front desk and in restaurant all extremely professional. Housekeeping is excellent and efficient. Their staff were able to clean and make good our room within 20 minutes when we went down for breakfast. Location of the hotel is convenient as it is just meters from Orchard Road, the main shopping and sightseeing spot.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Enjoyable
desc: Clean and affordable rooms with friendly staff . excellent breakfast on offer very good restaurant options for dining . Very good location close to the shopping areas of Singapore with easy links to central and Sentosa areas

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable and good location
desc: Located at the heart of the shopping arena of Singapore, it is a very comfortable hotel with excellent service. The housekeeping is very good and so are other staff. It is walking distance from Orchard Road and peacefully located. Only the breakfast was disappointing with almost nothing for vegetarian. During morning rush they open a separate room to accommodate guests which has very poorly managed breakfast option. Otherwise a place for comfortable stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The room is good
desc: The room is good, the location is near the MRT station and many restaurans. but It took so long time to take a taxi in the morning. We were waiting for 25 min to take a taxi at 8:30 AM. Please be careful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Great location. Across the street from a food street with lots of different types of cuisines and nice little outdoor eating areas. Also a short walk to a couple malls and to the metro. The hotel itself is clean and comfortable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent location in Singapore !
desc: A great hotel with excellent location in chaos street Orchard Rd. It is very closed by shopping center, MRT. Staff is one of most lovely point to attract much more guest ! We love the pool as well ! Highly recommend !

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: convenient and friendly
desc: The Hotel is well located for local shopping and for public transport as well as the Hop-on-off buses.The rooms were spacious and well appointed. The facilities are excellent especially the pool and gym.Breakfast is enormous for choice and quality.Best of all - the friendly and very helpful staff.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Not what I expected
desc: On arrival the hotel presents very well however, thats where it ends. The bedrooms are reasonably sized however, whilst they offer a range of pillows to suit your needs they are all very much the same, too soft. Bathrooms are dated, small and shower is in the bath with anti slip mats offered to prevent you slipping over which I found poor for such a high end hotel chain. Breakfast is an experience in itself. The room is too small unless the hotel is more than half empty meaning you can well end up queuing outside for sometime even after 10am. Food spread is average at best with most breads and pastries days old, replenishment of foods slow and area cramped. They also seemed to be understaffed. We arrived on a Tuesday and for the first two days activity was acceptable however, by

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A feeling of being known
desc: I will probably always choose this Holiday Inn. It is comfortable, efficiently run, and the staff are lovely. The rooms are spacious and clean and the lounge is always welcoming. The rooftop pool is calm and a good place to get email done.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location with a friendly staff
desc: Easy access to the hotel from the MRTA. The staff was friendly and helpful. So helpful that in their attempt to put our stored luggage in our room, once it was ready, they put it in someone else’s by accident. It was quickly resolved and a call from the manager to apologize.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel great location
desc: Good Size rooms. Big pool area with lots of shade and sun beds. Staff were really helpful. Free wifi. Water provided daily. Great location close to Orchard Rd, bus stop and train. Close to little India & Clarke Quay. Would stay again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Return visit
desc: We have stayed a number of times at The Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre when returning home from holidays in Europe. It gets us into the correct timezone. The hotel is well located close to the MRT station, tourist information centre a Orchard Rd shops. Rooms have everything needed for a stop over and staff are friendly and helpful. We took advantage of the offer of points in lieu of having our room cleaned for the first day given that we had only checked in late afternoon previously. We first came across this type of offer in Copenhagen as an initiative to save energy and thought it was a good idea. We would definitely return .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Missing Property
desc: Although Singapore is a very safe place, I would strongly recommend that you use the lockbox in the room in THIS hotel!! Please do not leave valuables unattended. I certainly will not stay here again, it’s the worst feeling to know someone has riffled through your belongings! I would also advise that you don’t stay in the left rear of the hotel, there is a night club that runs till 6am, extremely loud.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service and friendly staff
desc: The location of the hotel is good and convenience. The check in process was smooth. The staff are friendly and provide immediate assistance whenever there’s a need. Excellent service and will come back again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Classy & Convenient
desc: From the doorman & parking concierge, to the Club breakfast staff & cleaners, we were provided with useful assistance & courtesy. This was our 3rd stay as Club Room guests, which gives us access to The Club Dining Lounge with extras such as exclusive Club breakfast, Afternoon Teas & Evening Cocktails + Snacks Located just 100mt from Orchard road's shopping megapolis & with views of lovely greenery on the other side (via a 6 lane motorway), all is very convenient & almost luxurious. Being a hot city, we are torn between hot & sweaty of the externals & freezing via the hotel's  airconditioning. The Sleeping temp. took some skill to find a happy medium (maybe the jetlag can also be the culprit to a restless sleep). Our room's features & facilities were also on par, with a huge bed

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A hotel, peaceful and quiet, a place you want to return to after the hussle-bussle of a whole day's work.
desc: I stayed in this hotel for 3 nites. Checking-in was extremely fast as they have all my details printed out already and I don't have to fill in extensive detailed forms, just sign and collect access card and go. I had a good shower and felt hungry. They still have room service at 10pm which is good. My stay was made most pleasant in that the conceirge remember me by name on the second day and was keen to help me with loads of sample I carry in and out of taxis every day for many times. I never expect two conceirge to be already unloading my stuffs whenever I return. Such friendly and warm feeling makes you feel like returning. And once I am back in the hotel there is always the lounge where I can chat with the bartender who is always friendly. I shall stay again at this hotel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Quite lane behind the busy Orchard Road
desc: We're a family of four who drove around when visiting Singapore's attractions. This hotel provided free parking, which one needs to inquire when booking accommodations. It's tugged behind Orchard Road and is easy to find if you have a GPS locator. The location is strategic. Many eateries to choose from - all within walking distance. It's less than 8km away from Sentosa Island, Marina Sands, etc.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Greta Hotel in Central Location
desc: Great hotel, Friendly staff, Excellent location for easy access to Orchard Road for shopping. Rooms were spacious, bathroom had shower over bath, single vanity and toilet. Air conditioning was great. Quiet rooms. Ice machine available on every second floor. Small bard fridge in room. Pool was on the roof, perfect temperature and had plenty of lounges and shaded areas. Small spa also in this area, and access to the gym facilities. Only feedback was that as we were located at the very end of a corridor, our rooms were often not serviced until late in the afternoon.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Review of Holiday inn
desc: Good place. Friendly staff , neat rooms. Convenient for transportation. Need bit of renovation inside the room. Also choice of channels to be improved , previously apples were placed in each floor. That’s need to brought back

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable
desc: Just came back from an eight night stay in this brilliant hotel , what makes this so good are the staff polite always and very helpful , executive room is a must really really good Would recommend to all

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Bad Experience
desc: I took an overnight flight to Singapore and checked in today morning. The check-in was great; the front desk was welcoming and gave me a letter informing me about the perks of my room rate which included executive lounge access as well as 2nd floor Window restaurant breakfast. Went to lounge with a friend (who was staying in the same hotel) but did not purchased lounge access, hoping to able to buy it for the day.I presented my room number to the lounge attendant first and she declined entry. I explained to her that I had purchased access and that the hotel had given me a letter stating so. Rather than confirm with the front desk, she declined to entertain it any further. Rather than argue with her or go back to the room and bring back the letter, we went and had breakfast in

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay for low price
desc: Great location next to all amenities of Orchard Road, comfortable and spacious rooms combined with good service. Just the breakfast lacked the overall positive review. Although definitely a place to stay in Singapore‘s central area for a reasonable amount of money.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great time in Singapore
desc: We travelled to Singapore for the Grand Prix and had 5 nights at the Holiday Inn. I found the holiday Inn an excellent place to stay, well located, staff were very friendly and helpful and the room was excellent. We had breakfast at the hotel every morning and was very satisfied with what the restaurant had to offer. Travelling was easy as there was always taxi's available

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel
desc: Arrived at 10.30 am "fresh" from a long 14 hour flight, for the Singapore Grand Prix, thinking how were we going to manage til 2pm to check in?.....however....fantastic service, room was ready immediately and we were in and fast asleep by 11am! Thank you Holiday inn. Room was lovely, breakfast was a good choice of everything. I suspect the price of the hotel was hiked up for that F1 grand prix weekend, but we enjoyed our stay

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: We have stayed here many times however on our last visit they were renovating and unfortunately we had to move to the Intercontinental, which was arranged by this hotel. I am glad to report this visit was back to the usual excellent experience. We always stay in a club room and due to being an IHG Ambassador were upgraded to a suite. The Club Lounge is excellent as we enjoy the breakfast and evening cocktails, all staff are friendly and willing to help. The lobby lounge bar is a great place to enjoy a nightcap although the service here was a little slow. The location is perfect with many restaurants in Cuppage Plaza and the shopping centres within close distance. We have booked to come back in January with our daughters for New Year. Definatley our go to hotel in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location, clean rooms
desc: Hotel is located in the heart of Singapore, a short walking distance to malls, few minutes by car to Clark Quay. Friendly and helpful staff. Clean, well-appointed rooms. Good breakfast buffet spread but some staff at the restaurant are rattled with the volume of people coming in with different requests. Had to go back to the coffee station several times to remind them about my order. Restaurant is small so it is crammed during breakfast even on a Monday. Toilet ventilation was not working so I informed the front desk about it. Returned a day after but still wasn't working. Had an issue with a magnetized key card. Went to the front desk twice but issue was not resolved. Handy phone was an excellent feature but I wasn't able to use it. Great that they provide 3 key cards for

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice but noisy
desc: Located a bit far from the City Center, room was good, big bed and comfortable space. Unlikely on the 3rd floor, closed to the square, with pubs and restaurants. Too noisy during the night time. I'm not sure I'll book here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Stay As Usual
desc: Firstly, check-in; as usual quick and welcoming by friendly staff. Room was ready by 11am without waiting the moment I arrived the lobby. Love to stay in this hotel as it is quiet, safe, easily access to food and fruits, near to MRT station and walkable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good in overall
desc: Good location, convenience, welcome drink, HP to make free call. 3rd times staying this hotel, staffs are friendly, responsive. The food variety during breakfast already improved, the cleanliness for room also showing improved (quite important for those who have allergy on dust) but the bed, quite surprised me as I meet a bug.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very Good with smal remarks
desc: Restaurant for breakfast is small and sometimes there is a queue and it is normal that the peoples will not take breakfast earlyThe menu should be changed and not the same things every day, not an issue for peoples spending few days but for the ones spending some weeks

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great experience
desc: So convenient and close to good food and shopping. Kids had a ball and slept beautifully in the quiet rooms. Staff are friendly and helpful... when we got tired, just returned to the hotel and had a swim which was nice.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good
desc: Nice place to stay, we stay here every time we travel to Singapore, extremely convenient location and central to most places in Singapore. There is a super street food court just around the corner on cuppage road which is excellent at anytime of day

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Stay at holiday inn orchard city centre
desc: A very well located hotel just off orchard road and in the heart of the shopping district. Close to all the tourist spots as well as the shopping areas. Reception is efficient and helpful. Concierge was pretty helpful with all my queries. Rooms are of good size and well equipped. Housekeeping was prompt. Breakfast spread was pretty lavish. Service is excellent. The food at the Indian restaurant Tandoor is very good with s 20% discount for in-house guests.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Home away from Home
desc: We stayed here for 7 days 6 nights with my 3 children. At firsts I was hesitant as the reservation department made a mistake on my booking. Good thing that they acknowledge what they have offer in the confirmation. Upon arrival, we were greeted by a smiling team members. You have to give a cash deposit of SGD300 or they will block your credit card and make a refund on the check out day. These one should be inform in the confirmation letter. Staff - all the service in the breakfast area were so friendly and accommodating. Breakfast - amazingly good! Room - very clean and well maintained. I cannot thank enough everyone for a very memorable stay. My kids are so in love with HIO (Holiday Inn Orchard) Thank you Flo and Ashley (on the lounge area) for being so nice to my 2 year

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel
desc: Location is great..close to shops n restaurants...five minutes from orchard road...staff is freindly..can improve on breakfast and carpet needs to be changed in rooms..overall good hotel for short stay

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Right in heart of Singapore downtown
desc: Location, hospitality, cleanliness top notch quality. Biggest factor that impressed me was they give a hand phone in which using Holiday Inn app you get discounted tickets of all attractions. What you also get is free unlimited call to 11 countries, 4G internet. On special request the hotelier also provided wheel chair. Room came with complimentary breakfast, vast choice of food.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very pleased with stay at the hotel.
desc: Overall very happy and pleased with our stay at Holiday Inn Orchard. Very good front-office services. Our requests were well met by the time we came back from our city trips. The breakfast spreads were good and especially liked the noodles soup.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Location is good
desc: Location is good at the bottom end of orchard road. Good selection of restaurants and bar behind the hotel in cuppage village. The hotel has one of the best Indian restaurants in Singapore. Rooms are nice and the staff is attentive. Was recognised as a loyal member. This is my second visit to the hotel. The breakfast spread was more lavish during my first visit in 2011.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hospitality
desc: I stayed for 4nights. Always front desk gave me good information. Head to airport at departure, doorman asked taxi quickly and taxi driver was very kind. I will book again.Reasonable hotel around orchard area.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: As usual, spot on
desc: Have stayed here on multiple occasions for holidays. In this instance, I had some business with a nearby company so it was the logical place you stay. After what had been an exhausting lead up, it was nice to be upgraded to a junior suite upon check in. Normally in holiday mode I'm not too fussed, but when under pressure for work, the additional space was remarkably noticeable - one really felt relaxed entering the room. The breakfast spread was more than adequate (although I did miss the mushrooms in this occasion), and I liked the new system with the eggs whereby one fills out a simple order checklist, they drop it off to the egg station, and the eggs find their way to your table. If I need to be at this end of town, it's definitely my first choice. Bang-for-buck wise,

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing staff and service
desc: I had Conference Manager Michelle Lim sort my meeting room and then accomodation and stayed in the Park Suite with Club Lounge access - I arrived early hours of the morning and was speedily checked in by Athiben who was very polite and helpful. Rasheed and the girls in the conference area in the basement floor were as always very helpful and accommodating. I have now been to Singapore on business 3 times and not stayed anywhere else. Well done !

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family holiday
desc: We stayed here for 6 nights, hotel overall was great, pool area was spotless and always had plenty of loungers, rooms were spacious and clean, beds comfortable. Breakfast was the only disappointment, the pastries , waffles etc did not taste fresh , breakfast does get very busy but staff were very organised. Close to restaurants, shopping and MRT

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful Stay
desc: I stayed here while on business for two weeks and I loved it. The gym and spa were great, and the staff was extremely helpful. The buffet breakfast was included in my rate, and was a nice way to start the day, a nice mix of western and Chinese breakfast foods and french pressed coffee. By day three, the waiters new I liked ketchup and Tabasco and would have both waiting for me upon my arrival for breakfast. Kevin from restaurant service was extremely courteous. The rooms were a bit small, but were clean and nicely appointed. I had no trouble at with any of the temperature controls, the AC made the room cold, the heat made the room warm. Definitely I'll recommend this hotel to stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay “Again”
desc: I am happy to report the quality of the room and service remains at an excellent level upon my repeated stay here. Highlights were Eve (friendliness for recalling my last visit) & Angline (bringing me a bottle of water as I waited for a colleague checking in that required more time). I look forward to staying here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Still the best
desc: This was my third visit to Singapore and Chose again Holiday inn Orchard..Warmth, ambience, meals— Remains the best in SG.. Nice small gym. Loads of shops outside just a walk away. Excellent hotel..Looking forward to my next trip and stay at Holiday INN!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great property
desc: Located in the heart of the city. Accessible to the main business area. Great hospitality by the staff. The breakfast layout is lavish and fuels you for the day. The house keeping staff is prompt and efficient.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Its been very nice birthday trip @holiday inn
desc: When i just arrived hotel from stroll around the city, I got the compliment cake and fruits and also chocolate for my birthday.. thankyou.. for the friendly staff,the double beds which is wide we just love it

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay
desc: It has always been a pleasure staying at Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre.From checking in to the house keeping,the concierge,all are very attentive and ever so polite.a great hotel to stay with kids as the double beds room are big enough for four people and kids will get welcoming kits filled and their own tooth brush!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Our preferred hotel in Singapore
desc: Our 2nd visit to this hotel. Early check in granted after long trip from Europe so very grateful. Lovely fruit and chocolates on arrival and quiet room. Staff very polite and helpful. Will be back for sure.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Stay
desc: Had an amazing stay. Location is perfect, rooms are very clean and comfortable. Hotel Staff are friendly and very helpful. I will definitely stay here on my next trip. Thank You Holiday Inn Orchard City Center

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Avoid lunch.
desc: Having stayed here several times i am sad to give such a negative review, particularly as the hotel holds good memories for me. I popped in for lunch, for old times sake as I was staying elsewhere.. The place was empty, I now know why. Ordered a coffee and club sandwich no tomatoes. What could go wrong? Coffee arrived promptly, an hour later club sandwich arrived stone cold fries with tomato. The server kindly offered the sandwich free which was sweet however considering it had tomato and was cold I was less than confident it was fresh so declined the offer. Paid the $9.40 for a coffee and departed back to work hungry.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Ideal location for shopping
desc: Set back from Orchard road. Paid extra for executive room and also Family Fun package which included American breakfast which was good quality with lots of choice. My only issue was lack of milk. Only had cream which did not work for a cup of tea.Executive lounge was great with plenty of snacks to choose from. Staff were attentive and very friendly.Pool was adequate.Room was ok although don’t think it had been used for a while as tv had been switched off at the plug. Technician had to unscrew the mini fridge to switch back on. Can’t complain though as given very early check in. Hotel just 400 yards from SMRT which we used to go to the zoo and safaris.All in all happy with our stay, hotel typical holiday inn offering

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: convenient and friendly
desc: stayed here for a function and found the location very convenient.. it's very close to orchard road and there is a row of pubs and restaurants right next to it.. for those who miss mamak food there is mamak restaurant a stone throw away and also a 7/11.. the manager who unfortunately I forgot his name but remembered he was from klang malaysia was very kind and helpful with directions.. I have stayed many times in Singapore but in terms of convenience and location and also not too expensive I think holiday inn is definitely the top of my pick..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very comfortable hotel with great service
desc: This hotel has surprised me in a positive way. The rooms are large, the beds are firm and one can choose different pillows. Very well caring personnel, everything I have asked for could be arranged. The hotel is located very close to he main shopping street Orchard Road.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location, Great service
desc: This hotel is in a great location literally five minutes from Orchard road and Somerset station. To get to the station you just walk out of the bar area door from main reception and cross over the street and go past the 7-Eleven and bars and cafes. When you get to the end you'll be on Orchard Road and the MRT station is across the road and about 50 metres to the right.To go to Sentosa Island you have to get MRT(train) to Harbour Front. From here we took the cable and were able to do the sites around Sentosa Island. Definitely worth a visit.The rooms at the hotel are very well kept and clean. The staff are great. They even switched the tv on for me in the bar area at 3am in the morning so that I could watch the Mighty Arsenal v Leicester. Little India is also a visit. There are

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Not even noticed as repeater.
desc: Indeed a good old hotel with well maintained property .Location are 5 star rating. Close to anywhere you like to go.Food ,shopping entertainment you bame it. Its there within walking distance.Overall I am enjoying my stay.I am back ones a year I will see you again next year.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good stay
desc: Very cozy rooms with well maintained furnishing and linens changed daily (if you want them to). Breakfast has a variety of cuisines to choose from including english, continental, chinese and indian. Located centrally and close to the MRT, and just 1 stop away from the main shopping hubs like little india and china town, it's ideal for a comfortable stay

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: First time in Singapore
desc: Hotel was nice and clean. Beds very comfortable. Breakfast very good and very international.Conference room very nice but had funny opening hours with theire servings.The smell in the hotel is somewhat on the mold side and that you will find in almost all places in Singapore due to the moist weather. This hotel was not the worts place. Overall a very good hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Convenient, efficient & warm hospitality
desc: A great place to stay. Peaceful, though amidst the super busy Orchard Road. Very convenient as it is just a corner away from the expressway. Warm staff, ever willing to help. They demonstrate care and concern for their guests. The breakfast buffet spread can be better. The best part was a money changer machine right there in the hotel lobby - very convenient!! Way to go !

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Got much more than what we expected.
desc: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre from October 11-17 and had a fabulous experience. Everything from the check-in and check-out process, to room tidiness, to food and staff hospitality, was outstanding, and made us comfortable instantly. We took a double bed room so there was ample space to play around in, which was great because we had a five year old with us. Food options are ample. The breakfast spread had a wide variety everyday that ranged from Indonesian and Singaporean to Indian and Continental. The restaurants are also great for lunch and dinner, and right outside and around the hotel there are tons of bustling eateries that you can choose from. The location is great, very central and one of the upmarket localities in Singapore. Taxis are super

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Generally good but there are a few improvements to be made
desc: The good=======Akshay and Elaine were excellent. Akshay forwarded us on our room ahead of the official check-in time which was much appreciated, Elaine sorted our issue with the air conditioning which was not cooling the room (the special touch was the fact that she remembered us when we walked into the lobby about half a day after the issue was lodged).The improvements==============- Since we were booked with 2 adults and 2 children, we had asked for an additional towel (there were 3 provided in the room) but every day after housekeeping, we were left with 3 towels. It would have been nice to have kept the 4th towel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location, staff, pool, breakfast and beds
desc: This hotel is conveniently near Orchard Road - shopping and MRT. It has a good breakfast but you maybe only want to have it on your first morning when you get your bearings, as there is so much good food in Singapore! The pool was great. Beds were so comfortable. Clean rooms and helpful staff. I would stay here again next time I am in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good services, Very clean faciities, Good Location
desc: Very polite reception, Always ready to service, variety of breakfast, Very clean bed and bathroom, Location is nearby the shopping area, within 5 minutes walk to reach all the big department storesNice surrounding

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights. Couldn’t fault this hotel the staff were all really friendly couldn’t do enough for you. We had an executive room which included using the executive lounge well worth paying the extra. We had a problem with the air conditioning leaking on to the carpet,they sorted out for us straight away. Good location for the shops & restaurants.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location
desc: Great, central location, nice clean and comfortable rooms and excellent internet, which is important these days. There are also good restaurants with good selection of food for breakfast and buffet lunch.There is also a very nice pool, suitable for either lounging around or doing laps. The only negative point I have is the gym, which is also important to me, and is below the quality of the other facilities. In particular, the weights section is tiny and two people made it seem crowded trying to share the one bench. This needs to be expanded and updated.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A good 4 stars hotel
desc: Good location; clean; honest;good beds, but bad pillows; friendly staff at the reception/lobby, not so friendly at the breakfast restaurant; reasonable breakfast; nice swimming pool; poor gym. Overall, good value for money.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Efficient and convenient
desc: Hotel is well managed with good breakfast and housekeeping. Club room facilities are excellent with happy hours, free laundry and business centre usage. Location is convenient though it is situated slightly off Orchard Road. Only disappointment was the stained and shabby carpet near the reception. Please change it.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Would stay again
desc: Great location, very friendly staff, Parkview Restaurant very busy at breakfast. Rooms are spacious and beds very comfortable. Only thing that was a con in my opinion was housekeeping either came early - prior to 9am or late in the afternoon so if you were wanting a day around the hotel this was a problem. Pool does not have panoramic views as stated on their website. It is rooftop but no views.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Business trip October 2018
desc: I was pleased with the room and the en-suite (bathroom), particularly the comfortable bed and the invigorating shower. There was a wide selection of food at breakfast and breakfast was available from 5.30am. The staff were polite, professional and efficient. I would have no problem recommending the hotel to a colleague or a friend. There were places to eat and shopping within a short walking distance. Overall I was delighted ...and I travel a lot.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good stay for a weekend escape
desc: Good hotel at a quiet corner of Orchard. Walking distance to the main street, shopping, restaurants and Somerset MRT. Hotel is clean, staffs very friendly and helpful, good variety breakfast which has great coffee to go with really nice pastries. Very good stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: nice hotel for family
desc: very clean room , enough space room for couple + 2 kids, only 3 minutes walk to to MRT station , close to shopping mall , close to food court and restaurant , bed and pillow type very nice. Staff at hotel are very kind.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant stay
desc: Pros:Smooth check in - Eve at the reception was very cooperative and explained our package quite well.We were two families and she ensured we got two adjacent rooms.Rooms- the two double bed room was spacious and the room had all requisite accessories and bathrooms were good though the fixtures were old and needed repair. The toiletries were up to the mark.The hotel is centrally located and is close to MRT.The housekeeping was again satisfactory.Check out was smooth and we even got a one hour extension.Cons:The breakfast spread was very limited and monotonous- same potato curry and sambhar on all 5 days...needs a huge revamp considering a large Indian clientale.The Indian restaurant Tandoor again a huge let down .There is less space for breakfast buffet considering the number of

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hospitality and stay with family
desc: Staff is extremely courteous. Property is very well maintained and ideal for a business or leisure trip to SG. Buffet breakfast spread caters for Indian, Chinese and European travellers. Located slightly away from the tourist attractions.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore Business Trip
desc: Second stay at hotel, and will not be booking again for my next visit in Mar-19. Disappointed from the moment I checked in. Handed key for my premier room right next to elevator with lots of noise from the housekeeping staff and guests. Prior to check-in my IHG App confirmed I was upgraded to an exec room with access to the lounge, which hotel wouldn't honor. On second morning I decided to cancel breakfast because I was asked to wait outside for 15 mins due to volume of customers whilst I sat and watched customers, who arrived after me, being lead to a vacant table. Used pool one day for three hours and no staff to take food or drinks orders albeit they had menus on the tables. Quality of TV in room has to be one of the worst I've had in any IHG or SPG hotel over past five

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Very nice and comfortable hotel.. Professional staff. Big breakfast, very varied and high quality.. In a perfect strategic position to get to easly any part of the city.. Highly Recommended! Thank you.. rb

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Staycation
desc: Short walk to Orchard road where there are all kind of food, retail, and entertainment options. But the hotel services were disappointing, no one pick up calls at the reception, and long queue for breakfast. If it's a peak period, hotel should open up other options for guests rather than asking us to wait outside the cafe in the morning.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very beautiful hotel!
desc: I went to holiday inn for business trip. Very beautiful accomodation. Very good location (near orchard street). Staff was very nice. Continental breakfast with lots of choise and high quality food.Suggested!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lost passport
desc: Everything - hotel and room, was great. However, I just want to share a really bad experience where my boyfriend's passport went missing. We left our luggage at the hotel reception/lobby, in the custody of their staff, when we checked out and went out for lunch. I think almost everyone does this when its already check out time but its not yet your flight. Besides, every hotel has their "storage area" at the lobby where they keep the guests' luggage - we are frequent travelers, we have always done that and our luggage always returns to us safe and sound. And to think, Holiday Inn is pretty famous so we did not worry a thing leaving our stuff there. After lunch, we returned to the hotel to pick up our bags and went straight to the airport. Arriving at the airport, my boyfriend

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: BIRTHAY CELEBRATIONS
desc: My daughter, grand-daughter and I spend a few days in Singapore to celebrate our 70, 50 and 18 birthdays. The Holiday Inn was only a couple of minutes walk to Somerset station. Our room was clean and had everything we needed. The staff couldn't have been friendlier and what a banquet the breakfast was.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: 14 night break.
desc: Fantastic hotel. Perfect in almost every respect. Best were the staff. They were all very helpful and really went out of their way to please. Special mention to the staff in the Executive Lounge - really superb! Location very good being close to Orchard Road and the centre. I would highly recommend it!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Staff and Accommodation
desc: I have just finished my stay at this superb hotel. The rooms were excellent, the staff were incredibly friendly. I stayed here on a business trip but this hotel is perfect for families also. The staff were one of the best staff iv ever came across, there presentation and genuine friendless is what I’d say sets it apart from other hotels within the area. The rooms were clean, bed was comfortable and bathroom was a nice size. I highly recommend this hotel and with it being very close to the centre it’s perfectly located.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Superb stay
desc: Its excellent Hotel, but should include breakfast in the tariff. Location, cleanliness, ambiance is good. Orchard street is just few minutes away. Staff is warm and helpful. I would recommend it to my relatives and friends.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Beautiful Hotel near Orchard Road
desc: Clean and beautiful hotel near Orchard Rd. About a 5-10 minute walk to Somerset MRT. Very close to Centrepoint and other Orchard Rd shopping centres. Very friendly and helpful staff. Rooms were large enough to cater for a family of four with luggage. The kids also enjoyed the pool, and the free food with any paying adult. Will definately stay here again!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good locatie, average service.
desc: Orchard road only a few steps away.First morning housekeeping put a note under the door at 9am already saying the could not service the room and we should call for service if we still liked the room to be cleaned. Welcome drink was offered as Spire member and cocktail was allowed. When my girlfriend ordered one of the mocktails she was told only a Singapore Sling was allowed. When we insisted on an alcohol free drink the bartender offered to mix two juices for her instead. When she settled for a tea she got a small cup whereas the day before when we had drinks at the bar she got a big pot. Also this time with the voucher no snack was offered which normally is part of the service. All in all although staff is really friendly it seems management is trying to cut some corners to

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel for family
desc: We stayed for 4 nights and overall it was a good experience. The room was clean and the staffs were nice. The most thankful point was the late checkout until 4pm without extra charge which let my kid can have a nap before leaving.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore
desc: Amazing location and great service Helpful staff. The hotel is ideally located at Orchard but away from the hassle of the the street. Very pleasant experience of check in and check out. Will be recommending all.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel at good location
desc: Very fast check in. Friendly staff. A bit old interior but very well maintained. Nice shower, clean towels, bathrobe, and complete amenities. Lobby is nice, with a small cozy bar where you can have beer. Located just around 200 meters from Orchard Road, junction road to Killiney Road where you can visit Killiney Kopitiam (kopitiam=local cafe) to taste the famous traditional Singapore breakfast & lunch. Hotel located only few steps from Cuppage Terrace, a crowded lively place for late night snacks, wine & beer.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: It keeps getting better!
desc: This was our second visit to the Holiday Inn Orchard City Center. It’s a beautiful hotel with a great location just off Orchard Road. That makes it convenient for shopping and it’s very easy to catch the metro. As Spire Elite members, we received an upgrade to a suite; a really nice touch! We booked a Club Room and enjoyed excellent service at the Executive Lounge. We took our breakfast there each morning. There was a delicious buffet with both hot and cold items (including smoked salmon) and cooked-to-order items. In the afternoons after touring and/or shopping, we stopped by for an ice cold soda as well as either a slice of pizza or a sweet. In the evenings beginning at 6:00P there is again a fabulous buffet and evening cocktails. The staff prepare your beverage and

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good & Comfortable Stay
desc: Hotel is at good location main market and restaurants at walking distance. Rooms are quiet spacious and staff is helpful . They have pool and Jacuzzi on roof top to refresh your day.Comfortable place for family.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant family stay
desc: We (four families) stayed in the hotel for 4N. Hotel staff is very professional and considerate. Even though check-in time is 02:00pm, we were provided rooms upon arrival (at ~10:00am). Room service is excellent. Very good buffet breakfast. Certainly worth recommending to others.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Hotel room was spacious. The people on reception were courteous. Its location is great since it is near MRT station and Orchard street so a good choice if you are visiting for tourism. All in all excellent hotel!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel with a great location
desc: We had a double room at the corner of level 8, which was the highest floor of the hotel. We also got a nice view of the city at night that created a relaxed and nice atmosphere. The room was neat and clean and room service was prompt and efficient. Reception and concierge service was very fast and good too. The breakfast experience could be improved as the selection was relatively modest but of decent quality. We would recommend travellers to stay with this hotel due to its reasonable pricing and excellent location. FYI, there are plenty of pubs and bars just across the street from the hotel, which makes it so convenient to just chillout and grab some drinks.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good for business travelling and why not for tourist also.
desc: Just for one night. No problems. Very satisfactory. I had a bath tube in my room but no time for use that. There was nice routes for jogging or walking in tourist map. Use those. Nice to run early in the morning when birds are singing and sun starts to rise. Do not forget original Singapore Slings. Many nice restaurants nearby.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location- and room is comfortable
desc: It was a nice stay and it is near all the shopping centers, food halls, groceries. Staff are courteous and helpful all the time.But will appreciate it much variety in breakfast.’fruits are not of great quality.We will consider not getting a room without breakfast since coffee shops Starbucks are just walking distance

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: book in advance taxi in a rainy day
desc: all went very well, good hotel in prime location. one piece of advise~ you need to book taxi in advance during rush hours or when is raining. long queues as this times some drivers prefer not too drive.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
desc: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre is a nice Hotel with Breakfast option. It is close to MRT and accessible to lot of shops. room service is good. I have stayed here for about 3 weeks and had nice experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A little bit disappointed
desc: 1. Poor facilities and some are not functional; 2. The warm water tub are broken and not repaired, I have photos to prove;3. I was supposed to get upgrade my room with platinum membership if there are rooms available. But I only git it updated when I pay extra. This never happened in other IHG hotels. 4. not suggested next time

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Food selection not good
desc: Stayed in this hotel for a week. The room and location are good. I love their pillow menu. Tried their magnetic pillow on the 2nd night, and I had a good night's rest since I used that. Walking distance to the Orchard road, so you could easily access the shopping area. Only issue is the food selection. I threw up on my 1st and 2nd breakfast. On the 3rd and 4th morning, I only ate breads and fruits to avoid getting my stomach upset. Hope they could improve on their food selection.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location
desc: Location : excellent.Service : very good.Room : average.Facilities : so so.The restaurant for breakfast is very small and uncomfortable. I cannot use hair dryer in my bath room due to the power connector is not fit with.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Generous food
desc: We took the club room. Came with free breakfast, free high tea, free evening cocktail for 3 adults and 1 child. Amazingly generous! Location was also close to shopping along Orchard Road and only 5mins walk to Somerset MRT Station.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location, Clean Rooms, and First class service
desc: The location was great coz its at Orchard area and its near to everything, shopping malls and restaurants. The hotel had clean and spacious rooms. Service was great with accomodating staff. We requested for an early check in but wheb we arrived the room was not yet ready. So they ask to wait awhite and gave us some complimentary drinks! Aha! That made the waiting worthwhile.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good experience
desc: Excellent location in the heart of Orchard, very good standard with spacious rooms in very good conditions even if not very modern. Breakfast is good also, I do recommend scrambled eggs ! Pool is nice and large enough. Personnel is kind and is taking care of you.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Memorable stay at this lovely hotel
desc: I booked the stay directly contacting the hotel. Thanks to Ms. Jo from Reservation department who addressed all my queries and then confirmed the reservation. I had opted for 'Premier Double room' for our family (we both and our 6 year old daughter).Our check-in was smooth and Mr.Akshay at reception handled it well. Our daughter was presented with a kit of a book & colored pencil set, which she liked much. We later got an upgrade to Park view room and Akshay & Era both took care of it. Thanks to them.The room was quite cozy, the 'handy' smartphone provided by hotel had a faster internet and free calling to 10 countries. The King Size bed was spacious enough for us and the bedding was quite comfortable.The room setup was quite nice and the universal ports meant we never had to

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Summer break
desc: Try and book the executive club if you can afford it, it includes a executive room, breakfast, afternoon snacks and evening canoes and drink's for 2 hours 3 on Thursday plus weekend breakfast includes bubbles. The room price is not that much considering what you get. The hotel also offers 500 IHG points a day if you forgo house keeping. This hotel is in walking distance from the Summerset MRT and Orchard Road.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: New Years in SG
desc: Spent the new year season with my family in SG. Although I have stayed in Holiday Inn Orchard City Center before (for business) this was my first time to experience the hotel on a personal level. I also brought my 1 year old son (first time to travel) and the were very accommodating. They even provided a crib for my son as no additional cost. Personnel are very polite and helpful. The only minor bad experience was when my wife who got sick during our trip, I needed to request for a thermometer which took quite sometime (more than 1 hour) however they did apologies for this. Basically my overall experience was still good and I will still use this hotel regardless whether its for business or pleasure. The location is also very ideal.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Like a family!!
desc: I have travelled extensively around the world and for me this hotel ticked all thw boxes I was looking for. Service, room and location are my priority and this hotel met all the criteria. Wonderful friendly staff.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A Great Place To Stay
desc: I love my stay at Holiday Inn Orchard Centre.* The location : only 2 min walk to Orchard Road. Exit from their bar/cafe and you can find 7 eleven, food, bars all in walking distance.* The Room. I stayed in a premier double bedroom. It fits for 4 person. Perfect choice for family with 2 kids. Comfy and clean bed. * The concierge are helpful. It’s easy to get taxi from the hotel. Just ask them to light the taxi sign. If you need to ask for direction to anywhere, they provide you with maps and clear direction. When it rains, just give them your room number and you can borrow their umbrella. * the lobby bar has a nice atmosphere to relax and chill. Love their cocktail & mocktail.Trully recommended.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel with great location
desc: The location is just around the orchard road with many restaurants and shops. The rooms are spacious and clean with good view to the park. The breakfast is great too with many kind of menu. The hotel staff are all good.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Location is good...
desc: The location is convenient however that is the only advantage. The service level is under expectation. As a top member (spire elite) of intercontinental hotel group, frontdesk staff said they can only offer one complimentary drink when checked in. Nothing else can be offered during whole stay.Seems not quite friendly to its members.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place, warm service
desc: Awesome location in city center. Staff are warm & friendly. Room is clean and well equipped. Family friendly facilities was the reason we came. It is for sure a deserving 5-star establishment. Great for family and business traveler.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: My ususal place
desc: nice hotel, festive at Christmas, close to Orchard to walk for dinner, shopping, etc. Very good breakfast and coffee - very helpful servers. Front desk was helpful with trip to malaysa for the day. Easy to get a cab.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service
desc: Accomodative of one-off requests. HI goes the extra mile to look after loyal customers. Maintains high service standards and consistency over the years. Food & Beverage could improve in terms of variety

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect stay
desc: Excellent location. Eateries, health spa and shopping mall are just 5 min walking distance. Sef-service Laudry was around the corner. 10 min walk to MRT station. Room was clean and the customer service are great.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Central location, excellent breakfast buffet and wonderful staff
desc: This has been one of the nicest hotel stays we have ever had. The staff seem genuinely nice and happy, breakfast buffet had a wide variety of foods catering to different tastes, room was generous (we had two twin beds in ours) and my kids loved the toiletries - they smelled lovely! Free WiFi was fast. Location is unbeatable - set back from the main Orchard Road so it feels less noisy but close enough to shops and MRT - all a short walking distance away.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Overall is good
desc: Overall is good for this hotel. When we arrived the hotel lobby while waiting for check in. The staff was given my kids for the colouring book and colour pencil. They love it very much. We like the room very much and good enough for 4 of us. Just walking distance to Orchard Road.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore Sling
desc: We enjoyed our stay at the Holiday Inn Orchard City. The hotel is in need of a little update but otherwise the staff were efficient and friendly and the food was great. It was in an ideal location to see many of the sights and get some shopping done.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good hotel in a super location
desc: Great hotel with friendly staff. Rooms are huge and comfortable and the location is super. There are plenty ofresteraunts behind the hotel catering to all food needs. Orchard road is just a 5 minute walk from the hotel. the breakfast too has a huge spread

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Give a difference depends on the customer
desc: My colleague who stayed with me could get free upgrade but for me had to pay for upgrade and also could not get a receipt.there was a IHG check in counter but nobody at there.Difficult to take a taxi.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable stay and good location
desc: The location of this hotel is central which helps in moving around for activities. I stayed there for five nights with my family. The staff is very courteous and ensures to address all your requirements. The room size is not very big but good enough to meet the requirements. Restaurants are very good. We tried Tandoor which was nice and soothing.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lovely, friendly hotel over the busy seasonal period.
desc: My husband, 12year old daughter and myself stayed at the Holiday Inn for Xmas and the New Year. Is an old hotel, but clean and great staff who went above and beyond to ensure our stay was great. Orchard Road is only around the corner but far away enough so that noise and bustle is not a distraction. We used the MTR system extensively and is only a short walk away. A convenient laundry is just across the road. A varied selection of eateries are close by. We used the outdoor pool every day and is large enough to swim laps. Will definitely stay again in the future.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Stay
desc: We stayed here over the New Year for 3 nights and loved staying here - The service, food and location was excellent! Will book here again next time! Room was clean, service was very quick and efficient .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Location , friendly Staff , good 4 star Hotel
