desc: Pros : 1) Good location , 2 min walk from Orchid Road , 2) Peaceful surrounding , 3) AWesome Staff , Helpful 4) Great view from Window, tree and parks , 5) Indian Restuarent at basement , 6) Pillow Menu is amazing , 7) good breakfast with lots of variety , Cons , 1) Price a bit on higher side , 2) The indian restaurant "Tandoor" is very expensive , add a lot of taxes and service charges

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Location
desc: Easily accessible to dining and shopping placeDelicious breakfast good house keeping,very polite employees,g english speaking The price is rather higher compared to similar hotels,but the visitors could go to the famous Orchard Road ,and shopping without any cost for transportation

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice Hotel near Orchard Road
desc: I traveled with my wife and two kids for vacation, we arrived early like 10am in the morning at the hotel. The concierge was very friendly and we were given early check in since it was available at the time. I choose a room with two double beds and it was very big and comfortable for travelers with kids. The room was very clean, air conditioning is very good and the toilet have a washer something that not every hotel have in Singapore. It was like 3 minutes walk to orchard road so it is very convenient. Did not have breakfast at the hotel since we were planning to have breakfast around the orchard. Definitely will come back here for next visit.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Restaurant should be larger
desc: services of hotel are quite good. what I like best is green of tree inside hotel, beautiful noel tree in the lobby. hotel located in the centre. Staff are friendly. aging people have chance to work in the hotel.the restaurant should be be larger. need hair dryer at room

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent for family with young kids
desc: Excellent hotel for families with young kids. The staff was friendly and warm at all times. The services were excellent. Room were clean, spacious and comfortable, with 2 two double beds. Excellent location, easy to reach by train or bus. Walking distance to Orchard Road, Centrepoint, Somerset 313, Cold Storage Supermarket.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Christmas and New Year Holiday
desc: Excellent hotel to be in.. Very friendly and caring and at the heart of Singapore.. A must stay hotel if you are with family.. The staff is very co-operative and the breakfast is one of the best with various Indian and Miri cuisine options

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Quality at a reasonable price
desc: This hotel is far superior to the holiday inn express down at Clarke Quays. You are welcomed as you get out of the taxi and the nuet time you see your luggage is when it arrives in your room. The beds are comfortable, a good size bath room with complimentary toiletries. There is a comfy chair as well as a desk and chair. Plenty of wardrobe space and drawers and space for two suitcases on the rack. Breakfast can get busy amd noisy but a good selection. Staff do clear the tables quickly but have a habit of usi g the same cloth for multiple tables without using a spray or rinsing cloth Roof top pool is good, plemty of sunbeds and shade. Most people seem to jse it from arou d four as they return after sightseeing. Shops are close by along with mrt. Some great places to eat at the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday in Singapore
desc: Excellent hotel overall. Great location in heart of the city. Great service and wifi. Absolutely nothing to be critical about. Would consider staying again in my next trip. Would recommend anyone willingvto stay in this property.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One Night Stop Over
desc: I normally choice the Holiday Inn Orchard City Center due to the fact that it is close to the main shopping centers. The hotel itself is very as is the staff. Check in and Check out is fast and efficient.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best staycation ever
desc: Started off all wrong as they outsourced their bookings. The guy gave wrong info. Called back and couldn’t locate the person who made my bookings. Called again and you’ll get singapore. Call again and it’s the Philippines. Advisable not to outsource. Finally the day came for my staycation and surprisingly everything went off better than I had expected. Best staff is Jason. Very friendly, welcoming and make me feel very much at home.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Stay, From Check in to Check Out
desc: Check in was a breeze, and from thereon, we had a perfect stay. Kudos to Mia Jaafar, and also Jason from the Executive Lounge. They are an asset to Holiday Inn, they have made our stay so pleasant with excellent customer focus, ensuring we had a wonderful experience. At the end of the day, its these people who make the hotel from great to excellent. And also to the Indian Lady Chef at the exec lounge, she knew what we wanted although we had 3 breakfases there. Hotel is clean, good location and the food is superb. Bell counter does a good job. Pool is clean and well managed. The room is clean and look after well. Mattress slightly soft. Overall is was great, definitely our choice os hotel when next in Singapore. Once again, thanks to Mia Jaafar.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A good place to rest after a long day trip
desc: The room is neat and clean, the bed is big and cozy. Not quite near the mrt station but it's not a big problem because the location here is very quiet. The amenities are all good. The hotel staffs are very polite.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Alain's stay in Holiday Inn Orchard Singapore
desc: Good hotel, great locationGreat staff as well.Unfortunately, I got a room which is close to an animated road, so quite noisy. Otherwise, room is spacious but requires soon some refurbishment.A great thank to the staff

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing well located hotel
desc: Christopher the person at the reception last night when my son hit his head on the glass side table and a lot of blood was coming from my sons head,he himself went to the first aid room and took the situation on his hand and stoped my sons blood and then offered as a cake for him and gifted him wd a soft toy Imagine woooow...!2nd the front desk are always helpful Today is the 2nd day of our 6 day holiday in the hotel It’s a touching hotel Thank u...!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Yet another pleasant stay
desc: Nice to be back in Holiday Inn Singapore it was a very pleasant stay. where the staff is very professional, friendly and service minded. right from you get out of the taxi check in. The rooms are very nice and the cleaning is very exceptional.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: We’ll be back!
desc: Our stay at the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre was great from the start to end. Everyone was friendly and very hospitable. Location is great - a block down from Orchard Road for shopping, food, MRT and restaurants right behind. If are tempted to add the buffet breakfast - I highly recommend it! Enough variety for all.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant place to stay, very close to Orchard
desc: I’ve stayed here several times because i like the location, so close to Orchard rd. Besides, very comfortable pillow, clean room and good wifi connection, that’s all i need and this hotel is just great!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Decent hotel near shopping district
desc: it is about half hour from the airport. The location is good considered the shops and restaurants right next to it, along the famous shopping street called Orchard Road. It is fairly close to many other attractions like Little India, Chinatown, the famous Marina Bay Sands with one of the best rooftop bars, etc. The Rooms are a little old but clean. Pool and Gym is available but a little small. Breakfast was average. Getting taxis in the morning can take long sometimes.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best place to stay in Singapore
desc: hi all,This is the best Place to in Singalore.very good. very polite and make you feel like stay at home.In reception we were welcomed by 2 beautiful ladies.good house keeping staff.Food was good no added colour, no taste maker.it was like home cooked food.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location
desc: I booked a 6 night stay, I would rate our stay as average. Our room was clean, the hotel location was excellent, in close proximity to lots of shops and the Somerset MRT station. The Hotel needs some renovation work. The hotel service was good in patches. There didn't seem to be enough staff. It was my first visit to Singapore and I found it generally very expensive. I have traveled in other parts of Asia and it is much less expensive. For example I requested two small lots of laundry and ironing for our clothes, which cost $200. For some this may not be expensive, but it nearly exceeded the value of the clothes.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Location if you want to Shop!
desc: This hotel is in a good location if you want to shop on Orchard Road. There are good restaurants and local eating places so you have a pretty good choice and range in cost. Hotel foyer is nice and service at breakfast was very attentive. Food was pretty good for a buffet breakfast. Rooms are clean but old and hallways do smell old too. Good for a reasonable cost hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good 4 star in convenient position
desc: One night stay only this trip. Great room, clean, all the usual facilities and large comfortable bed. Rooftop pool is super, with shade if you need it. Breakfast room a bit small and we had to queue at peak times. A bit unusual in a hotel at this level. One of the porters was a bit offhand when we asked for a taxi; others were fine. Have stayed there before and would happily do so again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location, great facilities, excellent hospitality
desc: Located right at the city centre, the service was great. Room is more spacious than expected. Can see the facilities are aged a bit, and there are lots of stains on my window, but thing that's because of the high humidity in Singapore. There is Handy phone in our room, which supposed that we can use it for phone calls and internet, but my room's was not working. Yet, it is a nice hotel with nice staff. Pool is nice, Jacuzzi is also available.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One Night Stay
desc: Hotel is clean with all basic amenities. Cannot write much as we were there only for 1 night . Dinner was not available as were late according to them . They serve only till 10:30 pm . So we had to go outside . Many food options are available outside the hotel .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Beautiful hotel in great location
desc: The nicest Holiday Inn I’ve ever stayed in. Beautiful foyer with amazing chandeliers and rooms were top class. Very handy to Orchard Road, Singapore Visitor Centre and Hop on Hop off bus stop. We had two interconnecting rooms for our family of five. One room with two good size doubles/queens that could easily sleep a family of four.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Hotel has great location especially for shopping. It’s located within 5 min walking distance of famous Orchard road. Hotel is closer to Singapore metro (Somerset MRT) which will take you almost everywhere at cheap prices. Good buffet breakfast but the breakfast venue is extremely small for size of this hotel hence guests would have to wait in line to eat early morning! Rooms are just about ok, they provide free calling to 20 countries. Hotel has friendly concierge service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel, good location
desc: A great location just off Orchard Road making it very convenient. The only issue I had was being woken up one night by the noise of the bars on the road behind my room. Luckily it only happened once but be wary of the rooms backing onto Orchard Road. The rooms were very comfortable and extremely clean - and the cleaning staff were extremely helpful when asking for extra toiletries. The breakfast tasted nice and the staff were extremely friendly. The pool area had lots of space for guests and an almost endless supply of towels. The pool didn’t seem heated but it was refreshing after the heat.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Experience
desc: Excellent location, great pool and spa, the staff could not be more helpful, extending our check out time and bending over backwards to assist us with all our luggage. Breakfast was excellent also. Highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying for business or leisure (with or without families). Wonderful experience! Excellent customer service!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good place to stay; lots of shopping nearby
desc: This hotel is very close to the major shopping areas on Orchard Road. It is about 30 minutes from the airport, and about a 10-15 min cab ride from the “center of town”. Additionally, there is an outdoor promenade of restaurants (that open at night) just behind the hotel. It is located a bit of a distance away from the “center of town”, so the use of a cab or the metro is needed to get to the town sights. We stayed at this hotel for 5 days, making it our base for our visit to Singapore. The hotel is clean, and well appointed. The staff are amazingly kind and friendly. Special thanks go to Mia and Erra of the lobby staff for looking after us, especially when my daughter became ill for a day. The rooms are quiet, despite the hotel being along a major thoroughfare. The only

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome Staff and Nice Cozy Places
desc: We are family with one child 2 years old, finding Holiday Inn by the Agoda Website. The staff very helpfu and quick response , the room clean, nice and cozy. The hotel Near to the Mall and foodcourt. Thank you for awesome experience here :)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice place close to the city
desc: When you like to experience Singapore at the best start from this hotel. I had a nice stay in Singapore. Very close to Coupage food and very close to city center. Although close at high way it is very silent in the hotel. Thanks.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Troublesome experience
desc: My stay at this hotel in the month of September was so great that i had booked this once again for jan-19 stay. I had also informed their guest relationship officer Megan, i have been staying here on a regular basis. Unfortunately the stay this time was troublesome beginning with the check inn process. One of the new employee Akshay kept telling me that debit card is unacceptable, where as i was trying to make full payment in advance instead of having the amount blocked on card, which they generally do. After entering the room i had found that the phone unit in the bathroom came off when i attended the call. I had to push the front office to get fixed. Handy phone was unusable and the IT team had to reconfigure it and they could only return it to me by 11:15 in the night.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable Stay
desc: I am certainly satisfied while i was staying this hotel.the early check in was accepted.and the room was clean, big enough, kind concierge staffs, beautiful swinning pool with kind staff.the breakfast was also very nice.only thing the view was not the super because i stayed at 3rd floor.but everything was good enough for me.I suggest this hotel. absolutely.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place for business trip, comfy bed, and nice bathroom
desc: Stayed for a week for a work trip. Was a nice hotel with good decor. Room was large and spacious with a king-sized bed. shower was also nice with a waterfall shower and a regular shower head. Food could have been better at the morning breakfast with better continental selection

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant Stay with Little Hiccup
desc: Upon check-in, my desired room (twin beds premier room) was booked out. I was a little disappointed at first, but I'd like to give credit to Christopher for making the stay much more pleasant despite the hiccup. A complimentary third bed was arranged for me. Upon returning to the hotel concierge on the second day, a new corner room which was larger in size was ready for me. I also appreciate the hotel for presenting a gesture of champagne making our stay much more wonderful. Please keep this up! I highly recommended this hotel for those looking for a family friendly stay as it comes with large twin beds.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant Hotel
desc: This hotel was lovely and clean. Everything in the executive lounge was free (and delicious). Staff were very nice and helpful. Unfortunately, it took a while to be able to get into our room. The room was really nice though. Pool and gym were provided upstairs and rooms were very quiet. I would recommend coming here on a business trip or with family. It’s very comfortable and welcoming. Laundry was also quick. 4 stars but a very near 5

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A great place to stay
desc: Superb service and very comfortable. Ideal for exploring Orchard Road and Central Singapore. Cuppage Plaza next door is full of good restaurants and a great atmosphere. Have used this hotel many times. Rooftop swimming pool is really nice on a sunny day.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: We had a lovely stay
desc: The hotel could not be in a better location. It was close to Orchar Road and the great eateries at Cuppage Terrace. The rooms were well appointed and very clean. Check in was easy and fast. All staff were helpful and friendly. The executive club was excellent. Food was beautiful and the staff happy to help with any small problems. The cocktail hour was great of an evening and the nibbles tasty and there were plenty of them. Special mention to the concierge staff who organised our return car to the airport with no fuss and load our bags.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing hotel
desc: Right from the food to hospitality it was all great! We had access to executive lounge so it was even better. Just behind the hotel there are some amazing restaurants that offer awesome nightlife. Overall a great experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable and convenient
desc: It’s in the center of shopping locations and very close to all the visitors attractions. The staffs are very helpful and cooperative. The housekeeping service is excellent. Environment in the hotel room is very comfortable. The price is not that cheap but considering all the amenities the hotel is one of the convenient ones.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent!
desc: Excellent hotel, located in the heart of Singapore (close to restaurants, bars, shops and MRT) and very friendly staff. Amazing and diverse breakfast with very good coffee. Nice, sunny pool. The whole hotel is also very clean.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good hotel centrally located
desc: The hotel is very well located, in orchard street and very close to Somerset station mrt. The rooms are well entertained, comfortably furnished and noiseless. The breakfast is very correct with a choice of eastern and western dishes. This is our second stay with two kids at this place and we recommend it.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore stop over
desc: Lovely hotel with spacious rooms. Friendly and helpful staff. Excellent roof top spa and pool. Buffet breakfast with an excellent selection of foods. Central location minutes walk from Orchard Road shopping. A very pleasant stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel in great location
desc: Room had everything we needed, even chamomile tea I like to have before going to bed. Location was good, restaurants and shops near by. One minus was that the breakfast room was too small and in one morning we had to wait about 15 minutes to get a table.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Hotel ok for room and service
desc: The hotel is good, I put 3 stars just because in the morning for breakfast I had to wait in the queue for a long times. I never find a similar thing on all hotel that I have visited till now and also making a comparison with this same hotel but in with past years, I am seeing that this problem there wasn't some year ago.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent experience
desc: The experience right frim Check in to check out was smooth. Mr Timothy ( spelling may be wrong) at the rexeption welcomed us with warm smile. He allowed us an hour before check in whichbwas very needed bybus after a night flight. The room was clean and the room service was prompt.Lication is very nice so is the Breakfast.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel, amazing breakfast. Only downside is that they got rid of smoking rooms last year. Great pool, nice friendly staff. Love the location of this property. Rooms are spacious and clean, nice amenities. I would highly recommend this place for business travel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent and relaxing stay
desc: Hotel is well located by the lively Orchard Road where you can find shopping in streets various shopping malls and specialty stores. If you don’t want to use hotels good restaurants, food court is just around the corner. Also 7-Eleven is nearby. Room was comfortable and clean!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent location
desc: Great location on few meters from Orchard road and Somerset MRT.Nice property and service provided during our stay. We stay with Kids, it was convenient and we were looked after well. Clean comfortable and spacious room. Recommended for people who would like MRT connectivity and lot of shopping mall in vicinity.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good
desc: Old hotel but goodCleanliness is ok but the carpet need to be vacuumedSpacious room5-10 minutes to MRT station Close to foods aroundLove the bathtub Noise at night as the place next to late night cafe

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family holiday
desc: As usual, the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre, has once again lives up to my expectation. Clean and spacious room, friendly staff at the Executive Lounge, tasty food for all the palates at the buffet...

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel
desc: Excellent service and facilities. Our room was cleaned and tidied everyday to perfection. Breakfast was awesome and the staff always very friendly and helpful. The hotel is just a short walk away from the MRT and an easy taxi ride from the airport

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel with great location!!
desc: Great hotel, staff are so lovely and it’s a really relaxing place. We used this as a base for seeing all the sights in Singapore which was great, transport links are wonderful and there is an abundance of outstanding places to eat, food is great here with influences from all over the world x

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Trip to Singapore
desc: Wonderful serice. Friendly and accommodating staff. Room well kept every day and the pool area excellant. Hotel is next to all major shopping precincts and train station. Could walk to the main areas for restaurants and pubs and also the tourist attractions such as the Singapore national museum.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location and excellent staff
desc: Short walking distance to shopping centers, MRT and restaurants. They have a pretty good breakfast buffet featuring International food and a noodle/ omelet cooking section. Staff are very helpful and accommodating especially to the Head Concierge Irwan and Front Desk personnel Elaine.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place to stay
desc: Just got back from spending 10 nights here could not fault the place the staff were very freindly and made every effort to see your stay with them was great. The hotel is located close to shops and hawker markets and the public transport stops are all very close by as well.The breakfast buffet was very good with the seafood buffet of a night time was of a very high standed.The pool area is a great place with the kids having their own pool and the wifi in the hotel was one of the best I have used.Can not recommend this place more highly

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Beautiful experience warmth all around
desc: Great staff always courteous and helpful...pool was great ...food was good ... from front desk to house keeping to executive lounge staff everyone greeted with a smile and always listened and solved the problem if any Great ..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Not your Normal Holiday Inn
desc: Whoa, Holiday Inn...what is going on here in Singapore? This was more of a 5 Star Upscale Resort Hotel, than the usual American Holiday Inn. The United States need to take notice of this Amazing Hotel. I guess I have a few complaints though...the down side are the single/twin/what they call double/ beds. VERY small, but comfortable. The bathroom floor was bigger than the mattress! Very small for 2 average size American people. And the carpet needs to be replaced/updated. The rest of the room was very nice. The shower/bath/toilet area was clean, the amenities very nice & replaced daily, nice closet with safe, a water pot for instant coffee or tea. We ordered room service, and it was delicious. The pool was amazing, free-flowing and on the top floor. Hot tub, smaller pool for the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Service and Location
desc: I am staying this hotel with my daughters. Although I am not good at locating attractions, it is relatively easier to spot famous buildings such as center point, orchard . central and 313@somerset. Additionally, the hotel assigned a attentive and kind korean manager. He is doing his best to provide a comfortable stay for me and my daughters. Furthermore, according to my prior request, they lent a microwave as a service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place to stay
desc: Its in the shopping precinct of orchard road with many food halls of those shopping areas. Some of these places will be expensive to eat so shop around. Breakfast is available at the hotel but doe a continental itll cost u $25pp. Im a cereal person so i opted to head to cold storage and buy milk and cereal. Cold storage is in the central point and orchard city shopping centre. Husband used the sauna and pool as the air con got a bit too much. Daily service of rooms was very good. The rooms were large. The staff helpful and in general a great place to stay. Our room had two double beds which were comfortable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Enjoying the best of life
desc: I stayed on this hotel on a business trip. More than saying the rooms were clean and comfortable, let me just tell you that I felt at home, with everyone working there friendly and ready to help to make your stay memorable. The location is perfect, with plenty of taxis, and public transportation nearby. You will be two blocks away from the center of the famous Orchard Road, the Singapore equivalent to 5th Avenue in New York. This is an annual business trip that I will always look forward to because of this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Luxury hotel in Singapore
desc: Beautiful hotel in Singapore city. Very near to market places. Easy accessible to public transport. Rooms are big and with all amenities. Breakfast is nice with lots of variety. Staffs are supportive and helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Happy to stay here..
desc: - Great location for travelling around, especially if you love shopping in the city centre. - Easy to find good places for food / drink / snack etc. - Professional staffs both at the check-in counter and concierge counter.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Central location, amazing service, great lounge
desc: Singapore is a big city with lots of great hotels. This may not be the best hotel in the city, but is a sure thing when it comes to location and service. Families and business travelers a like would enjoy their stay. It's a 2 minute walk from The Centrepoint mall which has lots of shoping and food/beverage options. This is our first choice when traveling to Singapore. If you decide to stay here, I highly recommend spending a little more to get a room with access to the executive lounge. You get breakfast in the morning, afternoon tea, and evening hors d'oeuvres. Kids are welcome for breakfast and afternoon tea, but for evening hors d'oeuvres, families with children are directed to the bar in the lobby where they will give you a menu of kid-friendly items to choose from.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent as always
desc: Great service and very courteous front liners. She greeted me by name and always welcoming back. Room upgraded to a one bedroom suite. Spacious and clean. Always wonderful to come back to this hotel. Location wise, great.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best place to stay
desc: I was on a business trip that had me there in Singapore for almost two months. The staff at the hotel were incredibly professional. Especially in the Executive Lounge, Marjo Entico and her colleague Tim were always so welcoming when me and my colleague came in. They made us feel welcome and always were able to bring good conversations to us when we came in. They made us forget about our long days. The best time there was being able to fit down at the end of the day, and when they came by had the time to treat us well and we'd all be able to have a moment to laugh. Really a very nice please. I really appreciate all that they had done during my long stay there. Next time I have to travel to Singapore, Ill be staying there again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Orchard Road Accessible Hotel
desc: I have stayed twice in this hotel. In my first visit I had stayed for a week and in next visit chosen this hotel again for 2 weeks. My first preference was to stay on Orchard road or very close to Orchard road due to my old memories. I found this hotel very suitable as per my requirement. it is hardly 100 steps away from Orchard road which is easily accessible.You can go to the orchard road for hang out even after your dinner and enjoy the pomp and show of the road. Let me write some good facts of the hotel. The standard room size is very huge and one side room is giving view of main road with some show plant. In my second visit the hotel staff provided me same room in which I stayed earlier and allowed for early check in. The reception lobby is huge and it gives palatial look.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Such a servic should be in all hotels
desc: Holiday inn in Singapore proves that all details of excellent services can be imbeded in the design project. In addition, a proper management chooses a good staff.. People are friendly and demonstrate their desire to help.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Hotel and Location
desc: Conveniently located for food and shopping. Excellent room amenities, service staff and cleanliness. Breakfast has great variety and excellent quality. Ease of access to taxis. Plenty of space in the room and the beds were comfortable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lovely hotel
desc: This a great hotel with friendly staff in a good location. The hotel is in a good location with good choice of local bars and restaurants along with easy access to MRT and tourist bus. Go for Executive Lounge access if you can as good and drink options are good.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: holiday inn review singapore
desc: excellent staff all over. food is basic. apparently award winning Indian restaurant downstairs... we never quite got there. Suggest you upgrade to executive service..... brilliant and not too expensive

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful Hotel, Great Deal!
desc: I stayed one week at the Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre taking advantage of the "Executive Club" rate that included an extensive, tasty breakfast buffet; a "snack" which was actually lunch, and "cocktail time" which was for me dinner with drinks. The room was spacious and beautiful with 2 doubles, on the 7th floor, small frig and safe, away from elevators but convenient enough to get to the rooftop pool. The pool is large (for doing laps) with lovely flowering plants and comfy lounges and chairs–plenty of room, not many guests. The staff was extremely helpful and courteous. The hotel is a short walk to the closest MRT (clean, efficient subway) station (Somerset). This hotel contributed to an amazing visit to Singapore before I left on a 10-day cruise.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location but room is in need of renovation
desc: The location is great being next to Orchard Road and major shopping malls. However, the room is in need of dire renovation as the decor are mostly out of date and the TV / DVD player does not work with current age portable media. The bed feels a bit firmer than other IHG i.e. intercontinental which is surprising as Holiday Inn. The restaurant is suitable but over the 5 nights that I stayed, the food selection are the same every day. A bit of variety can be refreshing.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: the location is fabulous... staff friendly... good swimming pool. overall is value for money. overall would recommend staying at this hotel. breakfast spread is also l good.what we liked best was it's location.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great, friendly hotel but ripped off by IHG!
desc: What really annoyed me before I even began my stay is that I paid about 15% more on the IHG website. I emailed the hotel with a screenshot of the price on hotels.com but their reply was around “prices are subject to vary…. this booking is not refundable”, etc. If anything, IHG should have been cheaper as they claim to be. Their “best price guarantee” doesn’t seem to hold or there’s enough fine print which makes the claim misleading. Also, the loyalty points are worth little. For example, by the end of my stay, I’d accrued 12 nights with Holiday Inn (over a 6 month period) but couldn’t redeem anything. On hotels.com, I’d have got a free night after 10 nights stay. Otherwise, this is an excellent hotel maintained to a high standard. Staff are professional, helpful and incredibly

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good stay but Disappointed about lost Ring
desc: My stay in overall was fine, in fact we didn't stay in room much but room was good.The down part was when I accidentally forgot my Ruby and Diamond ring in the bathroom, next to basin upon check out. I sent email to hotel website email straight away but no one bother to reply even after few days, and I had to chase them. In fact I trusted that it wouldn't happen in a big chain like Holiday Inn but its a shame that your housekeeping team can't be trusted. Really Disappointed!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: thank you for upgrade
desc: The room was a sweet type and both the living room and the bedroom were large and comfortable.However, it was regrettable that the stopper of the bath was broken. It was difficult to adjust the amount of shower water.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very comfortable stay
desc: Checked in on 23/2 into room 504. Process to check in was quick and smooth. Very professional. Once enter the room, it looks very cozy. Good space for the bathroom. The twin beds are large size. Breakfast was great with sufficient variety. Checkout was smooth as well.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel !
desc: Clean rooms, enough bath room amenities, quite floor, good location to Changi airport and Orchard Road, good staff response ... everything perfect for me 8 floor, premier room( near swimming pool ) is nice ! I hope to stay here next time.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Birthday Trip
desc: Stayed here for four nights before boarding the Queen Mary 2. Overall we had a great stay. Staff were friendly. Rooms were clean and a good size. Close to restaurants, shopping centres and train station.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Is not really bad and not really good
desc: I like the room the place, but the thing is about the late check out have to pay 30sgd per hour is not reasonable for the guest it’s feel unfair for us...thank you hopefully will fix about it thank you and good luck cheeers

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Service is impeccable.
desc: Speedy room check-in and service is impeccable. Requested for additional toiletries and they were delivered promptly with a smile and was even more than what was requested for. Loved the breakfast buffet spread too. Would love to stay here again. :)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfy in a nice location
desc: Comfy room in the heart of the city Close to subway (take around 5 min walk) and surround with many small bars and restaurants ... I reccomend bar name “Number 5” very nice bar and martini :) Good location for shoppers, shop along orchard road

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant place to stay
desc: Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre's location is very strategic and very close to Sommerset MRT Station. Close to lots of restaurant and shopping centre and easy to go anywhere by mass transportation. Clean and convinient to stay. We shall come and stay again...

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Short Trip to Singapore
desc: Excellent stay at the HISOCC. We had an Executive Room with two double beds which, although a bit dated, was kept tidy and clean by the staff. The Executive lounge facilities and staff were first class. Staff very friendly and attentive. Lounge comfortable. Choice of food and beverage at breakfast and cocktails excellent. This is the second time we've stayed at this hotel and would not hesitate to recommend it. The Executive package very good value for money!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Holiday Inn we've ever stayed in!
desc: We always try to stay at Holiday Inn when we can so we have been to many locations. This Holiday Inn is the best one we have ever stayed at! The entire hotel was amazing and clean. The location is great for shopping, with many restaurants near by and close to 2 MRT stations. I also love that the rooms come with a smart phone to use. Even before we arrived to the hotel the staff was amazing. Chef Concierge Irwan Suraji arranged pick up for us from the airport to the hotel, from the hotel to our cruise port and back to the airport when we left. He was also very helpful when giving us directions to places we wanted to visit. We were traveling with 4 adults and 2 kids so this helped u a lot. We stayed here twice while we wre in Singapore and the front desk staff at check

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: More than a perfect stay
desc: Excellent location. Been there twice in 3 months for my short staycation. Wonderful service rendered by the staff. Stayed in club level, spacious and clean. Nothing short of perfect 2/2. Jacuzzi, gym and a nice swimming pool. Hungry at night, do try their room service if u are lazy to get out. So many wonderful things to talk about. The only down side is the hotel is quiet old but in mint condition. Can't wait for my 3rd staycation! Oh yah there is a club lounge that provides a great place to chill and dine as well. 👍👍

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Weekend in Orchard Rd
desc: Orchard Rd is a must go place for me every time visit Singapore. The Holiday inn is a nice hotel with reasonable price and walking distance to many main shopping attractions along the road. The room is quite spacious and clean. The breakfast is not bad, too.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel
desc: Room tidy. Services ok , it is understating to request early check in but room not ready ,but please be nice to told us. I found hair in bathroom and room has bad smell , I did not report to reception as it is very late .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic family hotel
desc: My kids and i had the pleasure of spending 8 nights here on a recent trip to Singapore. From the moment we arrived, we were all made to feel very welcome and the staff were all so friendly. We arrived early at 11am and to our surprise, the reception staff went out of their way to find us a room that was available to have straight away. The room was of good size, clean and had all the facilities we needed. The beds and pillows were extremely comfortable. We used the pool and spa facilities everyday and it was a fantastic area to relax and have fun. The bar downstairs had delicious drinks and food and we were very happy with the buffet breakfasts when we had them. Special thanks to Irwan from Concierge, who went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. We look forward to

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: March 2019 trip
desc: the service from staff was very good at all times. Were allowed a late checkout which was appreciated. The room itself was good but there was issues with the lower Shower head. Maintenance can reasonably quickly to repair but there were still issues with it after this. The location of this hotel is excellent, being only a 2 minute walk from Orchard Road and mega shopping.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: My Stay at the Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
desc: This was the most elegant Holiday Inn I have ever stayed at! The facility was clean and well kept, and the staff was courteous and eager to assist. The hotel's location was well-situated for walking and access to local Christian churches and public transportation.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Top service. Nice suite
desc: Club lounge nice for breakfast. Deluxe suite with double baths was a treat. Unfortunately for families, the evening cocktail hour is off limits for kids. Good location, near Orchard Road. Professional service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: i will be back
desc: nice trip in holiday the room is clean & big enough ,staff is kindly & helpful ,i will choose this hotel again. very good location beside the downtown & high way . barstreet near by ,many food .store u just walk in 3 minutes

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent again!
desc: This is my 4th stay at this hotel.. Always a great feeling to be back again. Well location is great and hotel staff, breakfast and tandoor restaurant continues to provide best service over the past 2 years. Thanks management to maintaining world class top notch service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location, old hotel
desc: Hotel is located very near Orchard Road and is just a few minutes away from a subway stop. Hotel is a bit old, but still well maintained. Staff are friendly and accommodating. Great value for money. My go to hotel in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome service and efficiency
desc: I was on my business trip here very happy on their readiness to help on safe box issue I had encountered and the free hand phone and free local and international call service provided. The dinner and lunch at executive lounge also make me want to return here again. Thanks to floor manage on duty Mr. Vignas.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Property!
desc: Very nice Holiday Inn. Rooms were spacious and extremely clean. Great location and excellent service. Orchard Road with endless shopping and dining is a 5-minute walk. Breakfast was very nice with a great selection and helpful staff. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Still Ok.
desc: The hotel is the same when I last visited this place last November 2018. Very helpful and friendly crew, especially the front desk and concierge. My only issue was the internet access. I could connect using my mobile phone, but my laptop cant (I could access my laptop when I was here last Nov 2018). Not sure what the issue was, but I'm pretty sure its not related to the security features of my laptop.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Dirty windows
desc: I always stay at this holiday inn because of it’s location on Orchard road. The staff are efficient and friendly and everything works. However the large window that looks out into the street was murky and dirty. You can hardly see what was happening in the street below

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Executive Club Room - Only Way to Go
desc: Back in Singapore for the first time in 10 years, but just for 3 nights. We stayed here on the recommendation of friends and were absolutely delighted with the service we received from all staff. An Executive room is the only way to go in Singapore if you enjoy a drink - from 6-8pm each night, complimentary drinks are served with snacks (enough for dinner) in the Executive lounge. Breakfast is also here as is coffee all day and afternoon tea snacks from 1-4pm. We didn't need to buy any other food or drinks while in Singapore! It was all fantastic. The staff are so pleasant and helpful, they are very informative. They also have 'handy phones' in the rooms which are mobile phones with data for wifi and complimentary phone calls. You can also call friends that are staying

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent stay!
desc: My 4th visit here & I wasn't disappointed. Hotel very comfortable & located close to Orchard Rd. Staff all smiles & very efficient. Room/bathroom clean, bed comfortable. Room lighting ,shower good, AC working to perfection. Daily housekeeping prompt & efficient. Breakfast had good variety in both restaurants. Evening service in the executive lounge was super. It's nice to see smiles on the faces of staff at all times of the day. Very comfortable & relaxing holiday. Keep it up!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great time
desc: We only stay one night as we came off a ship. The room assigned was hot and would not cool down. They were right on top of it and moved us to another room. The way that issue was handled was impressive and would easily recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel on Orchard Road
desc: We visited Singapore early March and thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Holiday Inn. The breakfast was very good and there was a nice bar where we enjoyed a few drinks with good service from the staff. We had a late check in and the service from the staff was excellent on arrival and on providing information on getting to the nearest MRT station. The room was very good with a comfortable bed. We would stay here again in the future when we visit Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great welcome - made to feel special
desc: All staff welcomed us on arrival and some special requests, made when we booked, were all fulfilled. We felt treated as “special”. All the staff have been friendly and helpful. Managers reading this review should note such a positive attitude from staff doesn’t happen by accident.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location and a really nice hotel
desc: Although it's a little old this hotel has a lot of plus points with a really nice ambience, good sized rooms and a very pleasant swimming pool. On top of that there is a great food market behind it with some nice restaurants (I recommend Curry Culture highly) and a couple of decent pubs. It's also a stone's throw from Orchard Road malls and the MRT. The staff are really helpful and there is a large seating area for chilling out as well as a passable bar for a hotel. The only downside is the taxi situation - it's tucked away a little so taxis do not automatically come there, so you sometimes have to wait a while. I would definitely stay here again though. It may need a slight renovation in the next couple of years but for now it's fine.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre delivers again
desc: everyone at the hotel is so willing to help. seamless check in and check out process, cant fault the team at the hotel. the room was spacious and clean. hotel is in a great location near the shopping area on orchard road. thank you again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Just what we needed
desc: We stayed here for the last 3 nights of a 5 week Asian holiday. We wanted a reliable, comfortable hotel near to shopping and other Singapore attractions. We got just what we wanted. My Aspire Elite status in Priority Club entitles me to a room upgrade if one is available. Our check-in lady was very apologetic that she couldn’t provide an upgrade but solved the problem by offering the two of us with free breakfasts for all 3 mornings we would be there. Perfect and professional solution. I will admit that our room was a little small, rather dated and a bit dark. But it served it’s purpose. The breakfast was extremely good. The swimming pool was much better than we had expected so close to Orchard Road. And the location was very suitable for our needs. After several near successes

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice choice!
desc: It was my first time to go to singapore with my child, and we enjoyed our stay at holiday inn. The room was clean, big, and has everything that we need. We booked a premium double room which has 2 big beds and can accomodate me, my son, and 2 other companions. The breakfast at window cafe has a lot of selections! From american breakfast, chinese, japanese, and indian cuisine. The staffs were friendly and helpful. Will definitely comeback and stay at holiday inn singapore orchard city center!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderfully spaced
desc: The space is just right for a small family of 3. The toilet is of the right size and this is one of the thing we consider because we spend more time in the room than the toilet. Swimming pool is good.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Over charged
desc: I was informed that there will be free laundry every day for 2 pieces. However when I came back and checked that my credit card was charged for laundry. So next time, better not too trust the all the information

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Disappointed.... Again
desc: Had visited in Mar 2016 which i had posted a review then. Decided to have another try 3 years later, and it did not fail to diappoint, yet again. We stayed in a Club Room with 2 double beds between 22-24 Mar 2019. The staff inside the Executive Lounge were discourteous, and did not inform of any last serving of breakfast. What's worse was the cleaner would use a blue cloth to wipe the dining table top, and then wipe the bottom of the table stand which we would place our shoes on! Imagine the hygiene! And he practically did that to all the tables! Pls view the CCTV to verify my claim. Evening time, as my kids were below 12 yrs old, they were not allowed to enter the Executive Lounge between 6pm-8pm. So we had our food and drinks at the Lobby Bar, where again, the attendants

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Peaceful stay
desc: I have been on a business trip for around 20 days, the rooms are quite spacious I am in standard room which costed me flat 250 exclusive of taxes etc. it's a corporate rate. Only one thing if Holiday INN Can be improved would be is breakfast need to be changed. for a longer stay customers like us it would become the routine stuff you are going to eat all the time. Very new to MRT which is well connected to the city parts, City center and other shopping nearby attractions are also available.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location and nice hotel, but my experience was different ! (a very bad)
desc: On arrival we noted room is not what we requested i.e. two queen bed; it was king. Out of offered three option to move room we opted two bed with bathtub room. There was fresh paint smell which they acknowledged and spayed fragrance. As we arrived late, we inquired for dinner and we were told to go before 10 pm to Indian restaurant they have. however only to realize when we went there that they only do room service that day. To me this should have been avoided by telling us when we inquired that we should do room service order. Now the room service, new surprise, great food but delivered without utensils or plates! Not sure if that is their standard. On day two we spotted a cockroach in room! The guest service sent a person who came and to our surprise he first took photo of

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Business Trip to Singapore
desc: Our company had its annual general meeting in this hotel. The officers from countries outside Singapore were booked in this hotel. Being an officer, I was given a single room. I was pleased to have stayed in the hotel which is located at the city center . The hotel affords a convenient location, had hospitable staff, excellent facilities and efficient services in all departments that we have run into. I will not hesitate to use this hotel in my next trip to Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very nice indeed
desc: Stayed three nights 23/4. This is an older hotel in a good position for MRT, although we used taxis everywhere as cheap. Lovely big reception area with very good bar. Pleasant decor. Friendly check in by Ais and very friendly checkout on Friday 26/4 6am by the overnight lady. Concierge are excellent, ready and willing to help, whipping out the map and showing you where to go, getting taxis and giving advice, great. A mention to Thiru and Hamzuh. They had good knowledge. No sooner had we arrived and opened doors of taxi, porter took our luggage. Given room 557. Two doubles as requested. More than large enough. View of street. Very comfortable beds. Spotlessly clean room. Furniture IS old and scratched but was fine, as expected as old hotel. All areas of hotel are spotless.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Just passing through for a day
desc: Always good to stay here as handy to shops, pubs and restaurants. Front end staff are very good, friendly and helpful. Rooms clean and pool a bit of a haven. Easy to get a taxi to other areas of Singapore or walk straight up the lane to orchard Road.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good experience
desc: Great location, quiet and clean rooms, very decent sized. Hotel is within walking distance to malls and places to eat. The executive rooms worth it, good selection of food for breakfast and afternoon snacks and drinks.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service as always.
desc: Love this hotel, great service every time. I travel for work and stay there twice a year and always immaculate. The staff are always friendly and willing to help. Executive Lounge is excellent and ideal for a quiet work space plus food refreshments!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: An Average hotel on Orchard Street!
desc: This hotel is located in a good location however I feel it’s outdated they need to modernize and refurbish their rooms and bathrooms they remind me the hotels of 1980s. Other than that I had a credit balance with this hotel ie. Money was taken out of my account a year before on which they agreed to let me use their facilities but they let me down as they couldn’t refund me back. The spa they claim that is downstairs isn’t even owned by hotel hence I couldn’t even use my extra credit of 295 Dollars. I requested them if I could use their car service to take me to excursions etc and amount to be deducted from my credit balance they simply refused. I was very disgusted and disappointed. I asked for the manager he too couldn’t assist me in anything and refused

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family holiday
desc: We booked 2 rooms for 7 days and found the hotel to be perfectly located with excellent facilities. Orchard Rd is a 2 minute walk to the best shopping and restaurants in the world. The rooms were standard but exceptionally clean. Excellent value for a family stay. Highlights were the rooftop pool which was surrounded by sun lounges for relaxing in the afternoon and happy hour every evening in the bar. Staff were friendly and we were welcomed each time we returned from sightseeing. We would gladly return.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Not what I expected!
desc: Everytime I visit Singapore I usually stay in this hotel. I'm so impress of the service and facilities of this hotel before. but unfortunately this time I've noticed of so many changes. The fresh orange juice that they used to serve during breakfast now comes with a price. You don't get a weighing scale in the bathroom. They don't give you extra laundry bags not unless you ask for it. They don't have much choices in their fresh fruits. The rooms don;t smell nice.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice location
desc: We arrived early before check in time but the hotel reception was kind enough to accord us early reception, which we greatly appreciated. My kids could take a rest after a long journey. Thank you. The room we stayed in was spacious and facilities were upto standard. The bed was particularly comfortable. We appreciate the high hospitality accorded.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family friendly escape in the city
desc: We had a family room, two double beds, which was plenty of space for a short stay with two young children. The roof top pool was a welcome spot to cool off after a day in the city. Short walk to MRT or inexpensive taxis from the lobby. Friendly staff.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Charged twice!
desc: We had a lovely stay at this hotel. The location is excellent but despite having pre paid we were charged again for our stay on my credit card without any authorisation from me. This put a dampener on our stay. I phoned the same day to tell them of their error but it took 13 days to reverse and I was charged an international transaction fee which the hotel has not reimbursed me for. Poor service Holiday Inn.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One Amazing Hotel !
desc: Loved the hotel, and I really believe it was great value for money. Nice architecture, plush, and had all the facilities I required. Service was up to the mark, and it is very near(walking distance) to Orchard road, so you can roam around whenever you want to!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very nice hotel
desc: very nice hotel and staffs is friendly... the hotel surrounds with shopping mall easy access and easy to get taxi fromthe hotel.. overall have no problem.. will come back again..thank you for your service

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: My rating for this place is 2 stars.
desc: 1 is for very kind employee, second for location. All the other - worst. Terrible humidity level at the room. Bugs, crashed tile, old technics. EMPTY MINI-BAR for a 250$/night room number?! Seriously?

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Location, Hospitable Staff
desc: Our family of four stayed for two nights on points. I am an IHG Spire Ambassador. The hotels location is right off of Orchard Road, an excellent location for shopping and food. Checkin frontdesk staff were very helpful and went out of their way to make sure we had connecting rooms and that our other requests were taken care of! The swimming pool and fitness facilities are lovely. Hotel rooms are clean and well taken care of. My only minor complaint is that the breakfast buffet isn’t particularly appealing. Most of the “hot” foods were served cold and the selection is heavily Asian/Indian focused. That aside I highly recommend this hotel for families and those looking for a location close to Orchard Road!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: DISAPOINTED WITH JUNIOR SUITE
desc: We had to decline the Jounior Suite due to the shower was only accessable via a bath tube and the wife was unable to step over the side as it was to high. Only one TV which favoured the lounge area of the suite not the bedroom section

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellence in a tactic position
desc: This hotel has all comforts for who is traveling alone or with family. Fantastic breakfast buffet, nice swimming pool and gym. The most interesting thing is the position at the end of Orchard road, near MRT Station and with all the Orchard mall very near.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Poor In-room Facility
desc: The TV is old and shows no clear pictures for almost all channels... imagine you work tired whole day and when you do not want to do anything but just to have some random movies or shows to kill the time and you found the shows are so blur with poor signal... this is very sad and disappointed.... The room light is dim and dark.... There is improvement on the breakfast served and this encouraging.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Spotless & clean
desc: Stayed at this hotel, with my family (Brown) Should be a 10 star hotel, very clean, staff attentive, would stay at this hotel again, and recommend anyone who is visiting Singapore. Room was great, with 2 lovely double beds. Breakfast buffet was amazing.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: City centre, very helpful staff
desc: We stayed for one night (stopover on the way from Australia to Europe) in a family room. The boys were very happy about the pool (kiddie pool available as well), and we were happy about the location and the closeness to everything around Orchard Rd. Staff were very friendly and granted us an extension to checkout time, which allowed our youngest one an extra nap - very much appreciated as our departure flight was late at night. Breakfast was great, would recommend.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Six days at The Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre Singapore
desc: It was a Great stay fro my family. The kids enjoyed the swiming pool a lot. It is a very nice hotel, and is in a very good location, close to every major attraction. The htel has extremely friendly staff, provides great food, and is also very efficient

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Long weekend
desc: Reasonable nice hotel in the mid area of Orchard road Nearby Cuppage Plaza food area offers many restaurants serving every kind of food in both an inside or outside environment . Breakfast is expensive in the hotel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: As always, perfect 👌🏽
desc: It was the eight time or so I visit this hotel, always for 2-3 days passing by on business. Nothing changed, in a good way. Clean, spacy rooms, amazing breakfast (even for a vegetarian like me...), big dream pool on the roof, great location as many other noted, and on top of all, the service. It really feels like the staff is so happy to have you, and this gives a good feel away from home😊. The breakfast room is packed in peak hours, but the staff is doing their best and the wait was never more than 5 minutes the most.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: always a treat
desc: After many stays i can say service consistently happy friendly and very efficient. food services a delight and room service always perfect. Much appreciation to all staff for an enjoyable stay. Staff in business lounge enable working ease, and very professional.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service, perfect location
desc: We have a great experience right from the moment we reached the hotel at 2 am after a late flight with very tired kids. Vignesh checked us in and suggested a room change from what we had booked to one which was much more comfortable. Breakfast included many vegetarian options, and good prompt service. Only negative was the breakfast restaurant is very small and we had to wait for 15 mins for a table on Sunday morning. Overall, service was courteous and fast. Location is perfect with easy access to Orchard Rd malls, restaurants, supermarket and laundry just across the road. Will definately stay here again the next time we are in Singapore!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Location
desc: This hotel is located close to all the shops and restaurants in Singapore. We only stayed two nights but the location enabled us to spend time shopping and was a quick taxi ride to all other interesting sights. The staff were very helpful and welcoming.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Overall acceptable
desc: Conveniently located at Orchard Road. Close to MRT and shopping malls. Rooms ok. Staff very nice. Ventilation so so. Forgot to provide some items at first, but upon request able to replenish. Buffet breakfast of good quality, but inadequate seating on Sunday.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Location, location and location
desc: This hotel is nicely located just few steps away from orchard road. However if traveling during rush hour - even with taxi - it can be challenging due to one way streets around the hotel. Somerset MRT station is just around the corner.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel with excellent location
desc: Hotel has extremely good location right nex to the Cuppage Plaza, a nice terrace area with dozens of restaurants with good food. Hotel is also located just a block away from Orchard road shopping area. What can you request more? The breakfast was really good but nothing especially worth to point out. Staff is friendly and helpful with a good service attitude.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location
desc: Hotel is close to shopping centres on Orchard Road and there are many restaurants & eateries nearby. Somerset MRT is 5-10 minutes walk from hotel. There is a supermarket less than 5 minutes walk from the hotel. Room is clean and bed is comfortable with choice of pillows. All the staff we dealt with were friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location but needs work on some important customer issues
desc: I've stayed before both for business and pleasure. I usually have nothing but compliments for this location as I stay in their group hotels worldwide. This time however, something was most certainly off. I had also prompted the location that this stay was for a milestone birthday (for my wife) and as a Spire Ambassador member, I expected something special. First, at check in, we did not receive the usual upgrade for their highest ranked members. OK, this occasionally happens die to overbooking but overbooking is not my problem. Always, previously in such cases, we at least get access to the club breakfast area and lounge. Not this time. Regardless of my loyalty status or the special occasion. They had deeply overbooked the property as the breakfast area was completely, and

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Recommended!
desc: Had my wedding at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City centre on 25 May 2019. It was a great experience and a memorable one. My husband and I would like to say a big thank you especially to Michelle Lim (Business Development Executive) who was attended to us, from planning to execution of our wedding. Holiday Inn staff from other departments (from AV, reception, housekeeping etc) were also polite and respectful to us. Bridal suite was also nicely decorated. 2 nights stay at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City centre was a great one; accessible location; within walking distance from Somerset train station. Buffet breakfast was also delicious and had a wide variety of food selection. Thank you Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City centre! Keep up the good work!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Location in Orchard
desc: The Hotel was so clean. The location is practical especially if you love to do shopping, if you love to experience the Singaporean cuisine at the nearby restaurant and if you just wanted to feel the beauty of Orchard Road. I would like to commend also the delicious breakfast the hotel offers for the guest. I will certainly recommend this hotel for those people who not only loves to travel but also those who love to be relaxed from their work.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very nice Hotel, very friendly people
desc: This is a very beautiful hotel with very friendly people. Nice rooftop pool (it can use a bar of some kind). Nice gym and good breakfast. Hotel is very clean and has a cozy bar. Good situated in the center next to the Emperor's palace. Many restaurants in the neighborhood.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Business stay in Holiday Inn
desc: Hotel is located very centrally. Rooms very clean and convenient. Superb service and program of Executive Club. Swimming pool and fitness equipment of the highest standard. I very much enjoyed every second of my stay there.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good family hotel
desc: It's great that it has two double beds in some rooms, very family friendly. The staff were all terrific. Our room smelt a little musty, but our friends room smelt fine, so it wasn't the aircon. Go and give your room a sniff before you unpack, incase there is an issue. Pool is terrific!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Dream Stay
desc: It was a wonderful, relaxing and memorable stay. It was like a dream stay which we were waiting for quite sometime. We enjoyed it thoroughly. Rooms are spacious, perfectly clean and tidy with all the amenities just in their place. The complimentary buffet breakfast was really a treat with a wide range of delicious Indian and Continental dishes. The staff are very helpful and courteous. We are very happy and thankful for the same.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect accomodation
desc: The were very lovely ! The rooms were really nice and absolut clean! The hotel is in very good place in heart of Singapore in heart of Shopping center ! If I come next time in Singapore I’ll be choose again this hotel! Thank you

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: 4 days family trip to Singapore
desc: Excellent customer service and a beautiful location Location was good making it easily accessible to metro stations and taxis. Their Customer service was also very good and helpful. Surroundings were very clean . l

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: poor experience
desc: It's quite unpleasant experience! never try this hotel anymore. the staff quite unhonestly and unfriendly to the customer.  never feed back any your words and ignord your any request! the first night we complain the room arrangements and the staff's service attitude. the assistance manager Mr James Png promise us will feed back us at check out time next morning, but next morning when we at check out counter , He Completely ignore our existence as blank air! it's quite irony！ 非常一般的住宿体验，在处理顾客建议的流程方面非常脱节，甚至是完全无视！大堂经理装模作样到房间来了解情况，说是会给予回复，然后就没有然后了，纯属来取笑顾客！

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: May visit
desc: This hotel is centrally located to excellant shops and trasport. Staff are always friendly and willing to help where they can. The conceiage staff also are willing to go ouf their way to help you get where you are going or if you want something they can help you get it

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: My favourite hotel at Orchard, The heart of Singapore
desc: First time arrived at this hotel and I fell in love at the first sight! From the warm welcome at the reception, seamless check-in, tasty breakfast and also the luxury ambience around the hotel. I did have a great experience staying at their suite at the highest floor. Their luxurious spacious suite with separate living, working and dining area. It has 2 bathrooms & 2 Flat TV Screens! What makes it special, this hotel provides unique selection of pillows that you can choose to suit your needs, for me I like the extra firm pillow that gives me extra support. As I travel for business, this hotel has lots to offer, from handy Smartphone with unlimited internet access and international calls to 10 countries, to its executive lounge and 24 hours business centre. The executive lounge

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Mostly great experience
desc: This is a very nice hotel, and overall I'd highly recommend it. The location is great, food is outstanding, and all of the staff were friendly, helpful, polite, and a real pleasure to deal with. The pool and exercise room are really nice. My only complaints were these: 1. The hotel room (#514) had a strong musty, mildewy smell. I know that's more common in a tropical climate, but I've stayed in two other Singapore hotels (including a much cheaper one on this same trip) that didn't have that problem. 2. The alarm clock in the room was terrible! First time I've ever met a clock I couldn't figure out how to use. And when it went off (earlier than desired) it sounded like a fire alarm--very loud and obnoxious. Bad way to start the day! I had to unplug it. 3. Noise issues.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing stay with family
desc: Wonderful experience with my family here. The size of room and location of the hotel is the unbeatable advantage of the hotel in comparison with others in Singapore. Staffs are super friendly and attentive.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel
desc: Have stayed here a few times for both business and leisure trips. A convenient central location just off Orchard Road. Good rooms, reasonable rates, good breakfast, clean pool and great staff. Many thanks.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great room and well looked after
desc: Hotel was great and the staff looked after us. The rooms were well maintained and clean. The service was very good and would recommend and would stay again as it was in a great location for shopping and food

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A Very Nice and Helpful Staff ... And also great location ...
desc: The staff are very helpful, everyone is willing to help. They have a jacuzi in the 8th floor, that was a plus too. The food for breakfast is also good. Have a lot of kind of it. Near from the hotel there are a lot of restaurant and shopping mall. Not too far from the sommerset mrt station. If you bring a children this hotel is a good choice.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pretty Good
desc: We stayed here for two nights after landing in Singapore after a 10.5 hour flight with our two young boys. Hotel were obliging with a slightly early checkin. Room was comfortable, albeit small (although this is Singapore so hotel rooms are never that large. Wifi was good. The rooftop pool was great, well kept, with plenty of towels. They had a small pool great for younger kids and a full size lap pool. It could do with some shade but this isn't a major..... Close to Somerset MRT and Dhoby Ghaut MRT which is a major interchange station. Orchard Rd and Orchard Central mall nearby. Only real complaint was that the sheets had blood spots on them which was gross. When advised they came immediately to fix.. Would stay again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful stay
desc: From now on when we travel to Singapore this is our hotel. The rooms are very very nice, spacious and clean and the beds and pillows you sink into. Breakfast was one of the best we came across, love the smoke salmon! A big thank you to the Duty Manager for accommodating our needs and a big thank you to the lovely Helena helping our daughter at breakfast. See you next time, Annette, Ken and MELANIE Jones

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel in Singapore with reasonable price
desc: Very good location, close to the orchard centre and lots of shops around, Hotel rooms are always clean & tidy, staffs are very friendly and courteous. Felt like living in my own home. I would like to recommend this hotel for family holiday or business purpose as well.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great room
desc: Comfortable room and great location. Walking distance to plaza singapura where we found many good places to eat. Walk in the opposite direction and you’re at the paragon and takashimaya. Hotel staff were very friendly too!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Does Not Justify a Brand
desc: The water glasses were not changed for 5 days of our stay. We had to often ask for removing used cups. Housekeeping staff didnt understand English. Buffet Breakfast had very few options for vegetarians. And menu is unchanged every day. Plumbing is below average.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Centrally located and short walk from orchard
