desc: If you have shopping as a big part of your agenda this hotel makes sense , it's conveniently located in one of the by lanes of orchard. The breakfast was so so , had a bit of indian variety however so that was nice. Rooms need refurbishing due to the outdated design not because it's run down or anything. Pro tip : If shopping is not a major part of your agenda and you're looking for convenience , goto jewel at changi . You won't be disappointed

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great experience
desc: The best this is that everything is nearby. amazing ambience with amazing service. Rooms are cleaned, well maintained. food quality was too good with variety. overall this is good hotel with best location with good staff.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location, great family stay
desc: We were a family of 4 and stayed at this hotel for 4 nights at the end of June 2019. The rooms was quite spacious with two large double beds which were very comfortable. There was still plenty space to move around the room comfortably, we didn't feel in any way cramped when we were all in the room together. Housekeeping - the rooms were cleaned to a good standard and soap, towels, tea, coffee, water were all adequately stocked. This hotel is well located, just a short walk to some lovely restaurants and shops. An abundance of great places to eat nearby. We used the swimming pool on the roof also, was very pleasant and the area is well maintained. Just a few guests there using the pool and the hot tub. We enjoyed it very much. We didn't eat in the restaurant except for

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Another excellent stay
desc: We always stay at this hotel whenever we visit Singapore because of its excellent location, clean and spacious room, and excellent service. A special thanks to Yati for making our every visit a memorable one.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good location and very clean
desc: good location and nice parking and comfortable when u stay. feel like your own home nice pool and very cleans xx but people from club lounge was talking too loud this stay I am not ok with that but everything was good

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Close to Orchard Road
desc: Location is excellent for food and shopping. Room slightly dated but adequate and comfortable. Reception and concierge are efficient and friendly. Lounge bar section is relaxing. Will stay there again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Clean and convenient
desc: The Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre is so conveniently placed for walking to shopping or eating is grabbing a cab and getting right on the highway. The staff is quite nice. The business lounge is best for breakfast due to the noise in the hotel breakfast room, even though the food choices are less. It is hard to have a conversation in the main breakfast room with all the people. The room itself was good, quiet and comfortable. The pool seemed very empty and not as friendly as other pools in Singapore, you have to call up for poolside service if you want any food or drink.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: shopping in Singapore
desc: this was our 3rd time in this hotel we love the location on orchad Rd and near all the shopping centers and some nice restaurants/bars Breakfast is good but was to crowded in the morning check in and out was fast and we received our room on time

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel
desc: We visited the hotel as a family in June and we were very pleased about the hotel . Hotel is situated near the Orchard Road close to all shops , malls , metro , you name it . Room was clean and pretty spacious , furniture a bit dated but that's alright after all , bathroom clean , free amenities , free daily bottled water . Kids loved the roof top pool which was excellent . Thumbs up for the stuff , very polite and helpful, including lobby , concierge and pool stuff . We shall defintely come again here in case we visit again Singapore . Thank you,

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location
desc: Excellent hotel great pool areal, 2 minute wall to Orchard Road and next door to all the great restaurants at Cuppage Terrace. Large rooms and fantastic service from the staff. Only there for 1 night on our way home. Could have stayed forever

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great family choice
desc: (Review + hotel local area tips) Stayed here twice now to break up NZ-UK flights with kids. It’s a great option - kids stay and eat free with adults; rooftop pool; rooms big enough for a family of four if you’re happy to share beds. The rooms feel a little tired in the decoration, but that’s being a little picky really - it depends on what your expectations are. I’m happier with that than less substantially built modern style of hotels. Staff are really great, as is the breakfast (so many different food styles at the buffet from Indian to Malay to Japanese to continental to English). The hotel rooms also come with an Android phone set up as a local guide - but you can also take them out with you during the day and they have data included free. Really great! Device is a bit

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very Welcoming and Friendly
desc: We stayed here for recently and we were welcomed back as soon as we arrived in the taxi from the airport. We had booked the Executive Club room and it didn't take long before we were in our room on the 7th. floor quickly followed by our luggage. I would like to mention the very friendly welcomed my husband received when we arrived it was like we were coming home. Our room was very cool and we noticed that the Television had been upgraded from the last time we had stayed. We went down to the Executive Club and had something to eat and drink and we were made very welcome. A special thank you to all the staff in the Executive Club especially Linl (Hope I have spelt your name right) also Marjo who looked after us as well as the other staff especially the cup of tea in

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: One of the best hotel I stay in Singapore in term of friendly staff, easy access to shop and mrt, and variety of restaurant nearby. The room is a bit old, but nothing to complaint. Good place for client meeting in the lobby lounge.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: WORTHLESS HOTEL - Don't book Club rooms
desc: Being here with family booked 2 club rooms with 2 double bed each. The experience here was not at all satisfying. We traveled with an infant and have already conveyed to hotel for an early check-in. When we reached hotel the staff offered us a lower category room for early check-in and told we can not change rooms and have to stay in lower category room for the complete period but when we told "no we want our booked rooms" he said to wait till 2 PM for check-in. After calling our travel agent and a long discussion they agreed to change our rooms to booked rooms on the next day if we take lower category room today or asked us to pay SGD 100 per room for getting our rooms on the same day itself. The Double Bed Room is a marketing gimmick as the beds are smaller than the queen

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Hotel
desc: Very good service & Great location...I am going to visit with my family again in February 2020..loved to stay there...Best of luck to all Staff especially Manpreet(Bar)of Holiday Inn Orchard city center, see u guys again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location
desc: It was convenience for those who intend to shop day & night. Walking less than 2 mins to shopping malls. Surrounded by eateries and 7-Eleven all around. The only setback was the room temperatures bit warm. We did tried to adjust the temperature but it does not reduce. It stays as it is. Apart from that, everything is superb!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: This is a really good hotel at the very centre of Singapore and is a great place to stay for lots of reasons. I stayed in an executive room, which gave me access to the lounge for breakfast. The room was clean, comfortable, well equipped and everything worked as it should, the shower was perfect with instant hot water on demand and the beds were super comfortable. Breakfast in the executive lounge catered for almost all tastes and was of consistently high quality, the staff were polite and helpful at all times. I had room service on two occasions and the food was also of a very good standard. Checking in and out was fast and efficient and the staff were always pleasant and very professional during my stay. The hotel is located just off Orchard Road for those of you who are

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice place
desc: Staff very friendly good location great breakfast would come back again a little dated now could do with a revamp. Out door pool was good with a lot of other families swimming also which gave a nice atmosphere

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Scammed by taxi driver
desc: I am an Australian who visited Singapore to meet my relatives. I stayed at Holiday Inn City Centre Orchard. The hotel staff helped me to catch a taxi to 14 Jalan Kelempong. however the taxi took me 5 times around the house saying that the does n't know GPS or Google maps. The first time the taxi fare showed$18.20 but after making 5 rounds it came $30.70.He said no receipt. REGO SHC 5937.How can Singapore allow this type of scamming????

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Orchard City Center HI
desc: Very nice hotel. Clean rooms. Very friendly staff. Good location in city. We used the executive lounge extensively and it was a nice place to go for snacks and cocktails. The staff was very attentive to our needs and were very accommodating.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good hotel
desc: very good location.very near to orchard central.rooms were good, spacious. staff was courteous breakfast layout is good.overall very good hotel with great location, good ambience,good pool,good food.....

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good solid accommodation
desc: Stayed 2 nights. Arrived early one morning so they stored our bags and placed in our room when it was ready so when we wandered back in the afternoon it was all done. Helpful courteous staff. Great breakfast with lots of options. Room was clean and tidy. Bathroom a little dated but was ok. Bed very comfortable and a quiet location also. Happily stay again. Close to Somerset mrt.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location with luxury
desc: We stayed at the Holiday Inn for 3 nights. The hotel is well located near Orchard street and about 100 m from Orchard Central Mall. The room had comfy beds. The mini bar is empty so you can restock it yourself, which is better as the hotel drinks are more expensive. The staff is friendly and very helpful. The breakfast had a decent selection and variety. Check in and check out was seamless. Thank you for a great stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: ......Competent property
desc: Location is at on end of the orchard road and is reasonably okay. They have lots of eateries 10 steps from the hotel at cuppage plaza and that’s a plus. The hotel when you enter doesn’t scream Luxury but overall is a competent property. Rooms are nice and spacious and very clean. Check in was smooth and well handled by Jason . The Indian restaurant in the hotel spoiled our mood because of the snobbish attitude by their local staff. The pool area though small but is nice.Breakfast was also well provided with good service. Will I stay here again , only if I get a killer deal

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome hotel with excellent location & friendly staff
desc: The hotel is conveniently located off Orchard Road with good connection to MRT just 5-7 minutes away from the hotel. The rooms were spacious & very clean. On request we got connecting rooms as we were a family of 6. Sophie Osman - Director of Rooms was very very helpful. We would like to thank her and also Eve who checked us in. Breakfast was good and had Indian options too so my sister really enjoyed. The executive club lounge also is very nice with a good layout of snacks and drinks in the evening time. Would definitely recommend this hotel and will definitely stay here when we are back in Singapore. Kudos to the friendliest staff I have ever come across in so many years of my travel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Orchard Singapore
desc: Excellent location, staff friendly and very helpful. Room was clean and comfortable. Would definitely use this hotel again. Pool area was lovely, very relaxing and added bonus that food could be ordered and had around the poolside.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice one
desc: Really nice hotel. Couldn’t fault it. Service was great and it’s in a decent location. Good dining facilities. Didn’t use the fitness centre but it was well equipped, I would stay at this hotel again. Concierge was particularly helpful

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Hotel on ORCHARD ROAD
desc: decent hotel with energetic & helpfull staff centrally located opp.cuppage center surrounded by number of eateries & bars .it has one good restaurant serving excellent break fast & coffee.they have a bar located on lobby floor

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Good value hotel in a strategic location just off Orchard Rd . Check in was efficient . Staff were very polite and helpful and the room spacious and well fitted . They accommodated some additional request well. Recommended .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Location
desc: The hotel has a great location with a lot of dinning and shopping options nearby. The hotel staff is polite and welcoming. Checkin was efficient and quick. Breakfast is excellent with lots of choice. However, the capacity of the restaurant is a question as sometimes one needs to wait to be seated. The Indian restaurant inside the hotel is just too good. One must try a meal there.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant stay
desc: We had booked 2 rooms as a family in mid July. Both the rooms were at extreme ends of the floor which was discomforting. The breakfast spread was good but the eggs were of such a quality that it gave us all indigestion. Seems they were serving duck eggs instead of normal eggs (which if true should be specified). The South Indian food is hopeless.The restaurant also is not fully geared to serve food when required . The ground floor lobby bar has only one lady attendant who seems to be overburdened. The quality of services should be far better considering that this is an expensive property to stay in. Rooms are very comfortable & location of the property is good. Staff are courteous & helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place with amazing staff
desc: We enjoyed our stay here. Short walk to Orchard street and had several places to eat close by. Staff were amazing and very helpful at the concierge.Rooms are spacious and clean. Overall a great place!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Service and Great hospitality
desc: I have started staying in this Hotel for a week every month as I am head of Asia and meed to travel Every month to Singapore. Good to see that they keep my room ready for early morning check in as i reach at around 6 in the morning. Their hospitality is great. Well located hotel!!!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: excellent
desc: very convenient place to move and dine outside. Comfortable and best price at this area. Most of the tourist attraction are accessible. top floor swimming pool is fine. buffet breakfast is wonderful at lowest price.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lovely Hotel in great location
desc: We spent 3 days in Singapore in Holiday Inn Orchard City. The room was comfortable, clean and big enough for the 3 of us. 2 queen size beds and nice bathroom. We were on the end of the building so had a partial view of a park. We were particularly impressed with the staff who were polite and helpful at all times. Always checking if you needed anything. Our room included access to the executive club lounge. This was fabulous as we had complimentary evening cocktails and snacks in the downstairs lounge as we had an under 12 with us. We only had come cocktail each but were offered more and the snacks were substantial particularly is you aren’t vegetarian. We really enjoyed this perk and even returned slightly early from Universal Studios to enjoy it! There were other advantages too

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nightswimming.
desc: Splendid hotel and friendly staff. We ate at Wine Connection just around corner (see review) but learned (from Grab taxi driver) this hotel has the best Indian food in town. Swimming pool on 8th floor is open until 11pm and any evening swim will of course avoid children.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Service and Value.
desc: We recently stayed at this hotel for 3 nights with access to the executive lounge. This added feature is well worth the money as it includes breakfast a access to the lounge where they serve cocktails and provide finger food in the evenings. Overall the hotel was very good with exceptional service from check-in to check-out.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Located nearby some of the best shopping in Singapore, as well as the MRT being close, this property doesn’t disappoint. All the team I came across were both friendly and efficient - even a 2am checkin. Was pleasantly upgraded to a junior suite, which was spacious and clean. Sure, a little aged, but well-appointed for this brand. I’ll be back!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Closet to Orchard Road, Good Size Clean Rooms
desc: ->Area and Surroundings: The hotel is very well and centrally located. It’s just a 2 min walk from Orchard Road. People looking for good open-air bars and restraint can enjoy drinks and tapas at “Cuppage Terrace” just next to the hotel. The hotel reception was very inviting and they were quick to check us in. They also had a great bar with Live screen (as the Cricket World Cup was going on) ->Room: We opted for a Premier King Room. The room was very well laid out with all things placed to comfort. The view was of the road (not of the other side hotel or back side at least). The bed was King size and we all has a comfortable sleep. The room also had a good size working desk, a sofa with footrest and table chair setup near the window to give the preferred kind of sitting

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent customer service
desc: Winnie at the front desk was extremely helpful in getting us an early check in after a overnight flight. Thanks so much. The rooms are very spacious & clean. The bed is very comfortable. We will definitely stay here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: Great location in the heart of Orchard Road, close to MRT and restaurants. The room was standard hotel type but comfortable. The pool area was great with a separate toddler pool, jacuzzi and good sized lap pool.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay, excellent location
desc: Hotels in Singapore are generally pricey, what more around the Orchard Road area. If you should need to stay in this area, the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre is your best best! Room rates are considerably reasonable compared to other properties in the same class along the shopping belt but the rooms are clean, well kept and in good shape. Staff are wonderful right from the doorman at arrival to check in and check out. They offered great direction when asked and made special effort to show us short cuts to reduce walking ourdoors uneccessarily. The hotel is surrounded by lots of eateries in the neighbouring Cuppage Plaza, with 7eleven and several 24 hour outlets within a 3 minute walk. The Centrepoint Shopping Centre is a 5 minute walk away and 95% of the trip is through a

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Hotel Near Orchard, Luxury and Comfortable
desc: Just found that the hotel has very large room around 35m2 that has very good view. This is luxury hotel and good environment. Near orchard shopping street and near MRT Somerset around 300m-400m. The staff is helpful and believe that this luxury room and bathroom make you feel like home....

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfort is the key of happiness
desc: I'm really satisfied to stay at HI City Center. All the staffs were really friendly and helpful. This is my second stay at HI CC, will stay here again if I go to Sg. Thumbs up! Keep up the good works!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Ray W Review
desc: Overall a pleasant and enjoyable stay. We enjoyed the Executive Lounge and the staff there immensely. The training room I taught my class in was excessively cold and uncomfortable for everyone most of the time.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Superb family stay at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
desc: Stayed for just under a week, and whole experience was excellent. Housekeeping was very efficient and quick even when we'd only popped out for under 30 mins our room was cleaned to a very high standard. 6 year old daughter enjoyed the roof top pool which she had to herself most of the time. Staff were friendly, knowledgeable and made my daughter's 1st trip to Singapore a positively memorable one; concierge were great in helping us choose and organise our trips which made life easier. I have stayed here before and more than likely this will be our 1st choice whenever we return to Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic
desc: Our daughter was unwell on arrival. We were allowed to book in early and the care they showed our daughter was exceptional. Customer care beats customer service everyday. Breakfast each morning set us up for a great day in an amazing city

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Choice for numerous reasons
desc: Staff, Location, Nice Appearance, Great Rooms Staff: So many staff members were helpful, yet I'd like to give special recognition to "Eve" who helped me find a pharmacy with a specific over the counter medication. Also "Erra" who spent extra time with me to arrange a future booking for my relatives(family of 5) to stay at this property. Location: The Hotel has a 7-Eleven that is a 90 second walk from the lobby. This IS more important than you might think because they accept credit cards and have handy the basic needs for your hunger or thirst. Yes, for sure, the high end shopping is just 1 minute further. Most importantly, the Mass Rapid Transit...the MRT entrance is a 5 minute walk from the lobby. It's even closer than a Google Search might make you think. The MRT that is

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic
desc: We had a delightful 4 night stay in an executive club room so we could fit in our family. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly making you feel extremely welcome and safe. The club room was fantastic and the food/drinks included are extremely generous. Great position also. Highly recommend staying here!! Thank you!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The heart of Singapore
desc: With its pefect location, just off OrchardRoad, close MRT Somerset, adjacent to Centrepoint with its Cold Storage supermarket and a dazzling array of restaurants within walking distance, Holidat Inn Orchard City Centre ticks every box. Add the courteous and knowledgable staff and you have everything the traveller could wish.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: AWESOME STAY!
desc: Stayed here for the first time for 2 nights in July 2019. Made our reservations on line for a room with 3 guests. Upon check in, all the rooms with double beds have been taken. However, the hotel provided us with an extra bed to accommodate our 3rd person at no additional charge. We were very pleased, thank you very much! We were very happy with our room....the amenities provided and also with the housekeeping services. The room was provided with an ironing board and a steam iron as well, which to us was most convenient. Breakfast selection at the coffee house was good. The service provided by the staff was also good. I was happy to find out that their meat supplies came from Halal certified vendors, and they have separate kitchens for the non-Halal meats. Hence, a wider

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family visit at this great location
desc: Stay at the hotel for 3-nights with my family of 2 young children. Although the hotel is a little outdated however the staff compensate all the disadvantage. Staff very accommodating, from front desk, concierge and housekeeping. They are all very warm toward my family. Open air swimming pool on level 8 is not really for young kids but good enough to make my kids excited and want to swim and play there,

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Indian at heart!!
desc: We chose the Holiday Inn at Cavenagh Road, near popular Orchard Road, primarily because of their in-house Indian restaurant Tandoor. Both my boys can't do without their Indian dal-chawal and roti-sabzi. And it was a good six-night long stay. I would say, it was as totally worth the money we paid. To begin with, the location of the hotel is awesome. You can just walk down to the ever-bustling Orchard Road. Replete with malls and all the big brands, it is a heaven for a shopaholic traveller. The next highlight of the stay was the food at Tandoor. Authentic flavours and very warm staff, I would especially like to mention both their Indian staff, they were very helpful. The only flipside that I can point out is the hotel building, it seems like a very old construction, hence feels

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent stay
desc: Great short trip passing through singapore. Hotel at central location handy for shops, food and local transport. Located just off orchard road the hotel was very clean and staff very helpful and pleasant, all round a very nice stay was had by all. Family room was big enough with two double beds.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel, good location
desc: The hotel is very nice, and located close to Orchard road, Singapore main Street. Rooms are large and modern, but a little bit noisy. Cleaning is made every day. Breakfast is good : many different choices for typical continental or local breakfast.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location
desc: Travel with 2 young kids and very practical location. Staff was friendly and helpful. The room was spacious for extra bed. The hotel provide hard and soft pillow so It was helpful for our young kids. Will definitely come back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Definitely Declining
desc: We have stayed in this hotel yearly for quite a number of years... . We stayed twice for this trip between our travel BKK/BKI/BKK... The check in was done efficiently and smoothly.. The room we got has a mouldy smell... The maintenance of the bathroom is very poor, with the bathroom phone coming off the wall and one could see the wires behind. The tile grouting work are of very poor workmanship. The wash basin was blocked & I could see a tea spoon in the pipe. Its ashame that Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre has slipped to accepting such shoddy workmanship. The Wifi speed was ok but much higher if logged in as member... I sat at the lounge on the ground floor one evening and for about 10 minutes no one came to ask if I want to order anything.... the staff were more

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family stay
desc: Staff great and hotel located very close to Orchard Rd and the MRT. The hotel was great with young children and very helpful in booking days out. The only downside is the breakfast gets very busy and although the business lounge is quiet it does not have the same selection as the main restaurant.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: perfect location in singapore
desc: I am client of this hotel for many years due to different reasons : the perfect location just 100 meters from Orchard road, rooms that are confortable and clean, the very nice swimming-pool on the top and the staff that is normally friendly and efficient. suitable for business and leisure

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Crazy 50th birthday celebration!
desc: Booking at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard was easy! Thats the start. Going to Singapore is the 1st family vacation we have. It was a very memorable vacation. Its the 50th birthday of my love. Once we arrived in the hotel, we were accomodated very well. As a member, i was given a chance to pick a prize. Yehey! I won the highest point and was added to my points. Not only that, we were able to check in early. Perefect! We were able to rest for awhile coz we had a very early flight. And one more thing, they even lend us a portable wifi which we can use it while roaming around Singapore🤗. Room was perfect! I love it. And when we checked out, fast process and they even offered coffee and croissant before leaving. I will be back soon because of the wonderful experience i had. I give

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Visita Singapure
desc: The room is nice and clean but they have a real problem with the breakfast capacity. We have to wait more than 15min to having breakfast because they don’t have enough space. Yo can see the queue in the photo. it is a pity to lose so much time trying to breakfast instead of doing tourism in this great city.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Friendly, clean and convenient
desc: Great hotel, centrally located to shopping and restaurants. Also friendly and courteous staff, always greeted with a smile and ready to assist. Easy access to different modes of transportation. Food was my least favorite part of my stay. The breakfast buffet was pricey for what you got. But plenty of options within a 3-10 minute walk.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Everything was Great.
desc: This hotel is perfect for families and had a good time. I would recommend this hotel if you are from India and as they have Indian food options in their Menu. I have stayed here for 5 nights and they had decent indian veg options in their breakfast menu like idli, poha, upma, aloo parathas etc. The location of the hotel is awesome as you are near lot of shopping centers, restaurants etc. Just outside the hotel you will also find a couple of restaurants incase if you want to eat out and also you will find indian food options for vegetarians and non vegetarians. I would certainly stay here if I am again visiting Singapore. The check in was very smooth and infact I was given an early checkin as i had requested for early check in in my preferences. Hospitality was great and they

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: So consistent
desc: I hsve stayed here over the last decade Or so The property amazes me for the delivery of service thats so consistent. Good rooms. Good service and best location above all bang in the heart of orchard street.this place is just great.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family vacation
desc: Recently visited singapore for a family vacation. Stayed there for a week. We were early for checkin as our flight landed early. Front office receptionist Eve was very helpful and kind enough to check us in early. She was always courteous and genuinely happy to help. Housekeeping staffs were also amazing. Everytime I called to get any amenities,they were on spot and very helpful. I would like to highlight a feature they present, which I really liked was their opting out from daily housekeeping. Which they even appreciate by giving either 10$ voucher or ihg points. This is not about money.. this is a thinking which needs to be appreciated. Also the food selection in their restaurants are amazing. However in the executive lounge, it would be advisable to increase the staff

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect
desc: This hotel is perfect. There was an issue with my booking on the first night and manager was excellent. He took care of everything. The location is great and ambiance perfect. The pool is particularly relaxing.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Kudos!!!
desc: Very professional staff and polite. Been staying in this hotel several times in the last 18 years for long periods of time (60 to 75 days) and always been very happy with everything! Very happy. Thank you!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very central
desc: Friendly helpful staff, very convenient location near Orchard Rd area and trains, comfortable rooms. Small well equipped gym, great pool area and a very enjoyable breakfast buffet. Would stay here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good experience in Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
desc: The people in the hotel are kind and diligent, The room is rather clean The location of the hotel is excellent. It is near the center of Orchard street, which is convenient for taking MRT, shopping and enjoy the beautiful and fancy construction along the Orchard street

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Outstanding service and location
desc: We prepaid for three nights at Holiday Inn City Centre, and upon check-in we were upgraded to a suite because we were Platinum elite members. We also received 20% discount on in-house restaurants and room service. We had dinner at Tandoor restaurant which we felt was a bargain with the discount. Our room 622 on the atrium was clean, comfortable, and convenient with no neighbor noise. We usually avoid rooms on the atrium because children use the atrium halls as a playground, but we were set back quite far from the hall in the suite so we could barely hear them. All of the staff were helpful. The concierge froze our ice packs and retrieved them without a problem. We had an excellent stay, and we highly recommend Holiday Inn City Centre for outstanding service, room, and location

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice Staycay
desc: Had 2 nights here, swift check-in, however, staff was not quite aware of the Weekend Special rate which includes a late check-out of 4pm (which we understood that it is subject to availability). Room was spacious, cold toilet flooring and a water heater that wasn’t working really well (too hot). Windows are too tainted to enjoy any views. A very nice gesture done for my birthday; fruits platter, popcorn snack and a medium sized red velvet cake. Location is of course, convenient and easy to access. Thank you to every staff, we may return again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location!
desc: It was my first stay at this hotel and I didn’t expect it to be very close to Orchard Central, Orchard Gateway and 313@Somerset. I love that their breakfast hours start at 5:30am. It was actually quite early for me, but convenient, as I had time to do a bit of shopping at the nearby 24-hour Don Don Donki (on the 2nd time I was there, I had the store all to myself!). It was a pleasurable 3-night stay - kudos to the staff at the front desk (Kristina), housekeeping, breakfast, concierge!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Five Star Service
desc: All staff at the hotel were very friendly and always more than happy to help in any way they could. Lovely rooms, Lobby and pool area. Executive Lounge was very peaceful and conducive to our breakfast meetings.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Well located hotel at a reasonable price
desc: We booked into the Hotel Inn for two nights as part of a stop-over coming back from Australia. Oddly on their web site they wouldn't let us book 2 adults and 2 children in the same room but when my wife called them we were able to do this (two double beds). The hotel is well appointed with an outdoor swimming pool, restaurants, a bar and other amenities. My children enjoyed playing in the pool while we relaxed in the nice shady area on a sun-lounger. We didn't eat the hotel as there are a vast number of choices just outside the door including a street of restaurants and a shopping mall food court. The MRT is around 5-10 minutes walk away through the shopping centre and provides direct access to the downtown area via Marina bay. My only slight niggle with the hotel were a few

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A convenient and efficient hotel
desc: I just spent three nights at this hotel for a meeting that we organized there. The staff was efficient and the meeting facilities very good. The room was well designed and had all of the usual amenities. The public facilities are very good and the staff were great. It is very conveniently located for shopping on Orchard Road and for getting around the city. Good stuff.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Singapore stopover
desc: Excellent location with lots of food options, and plenty of shopping on nearby orchard road. Only a short taxi ride to anywhere. The hotel is well managed and very clean, with great facilities. Good value for money!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location near the shopping malls
desc: One of the few hotels with 2 double beds in a room. Breakfast was relatively basic. Good internet speed. The room was clean albeit with a slight musty smell. The pool was large and very nice. The location was awesome - ample of food options countless shops.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: great Hotel , Great location
desc: I can highly recommend this hotel , the staff are so friendly and helpful. the rooms are perfect and the business lounge and the quality of food and drinks are exceptional. i will defiantly stay here again on my next trip to Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Staycation
desc: Excellent location in the heart of Orchard minutes walk to Mrt and restaurants. Room was nice and comfortable and I’ve enjoy my in room dinning experience. Pool was great with jacuzzi. Front office and concierge team was succeeded beyond all expectations. Thanks to you Mr. Jason Samuel and Mr. Kanasan and those in the lobby bar. Nithya and Dorothy. Would definitely recommend this hotel to every one. Till next time

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Stay For Business or Leisure
desc: I stayed at this property for 10 days. The staff is outstanding. The property offers all the amenities expected from a top notch hotel. The morning breakfast buffet was very good and the executive lounge was above average for this level of hotel. The bar area is open and welcoming offering a great place to relax after work or meet with colleagues. The rooms are well appointed and very comfortable. Thank you to the management, front desk personnel and all the food and beverage staff for making my stay exceptional. You truly make the difference in making this hotel far above average. The hotel is only steps away from several nearby restaurants and a short walk to all the shopping and dining on Orchid Street. The hotel is only about 5 minutes walk to the Sunset Subway/Train

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great welcome
desc: The staff is very welcoming, everything is cared for in the smallest details!I'm 100% met! I Hope to come back very soon! It is always a pleasure to stay at this hotel. The location is excellentI'm very pleased!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Choice!
desc: Stayed for 5 nights on the 7th floor with family. The view from the room is very good. Great location with money changer and general store like 7 Eleven, just at the backside of the hotel. Plenty of Good eating joints and the best Shopping Malls, MRT station located within 10 mins walking distance from the hotel. Overall, had a comfortable stay at the hotel with excellent staff and buffet breakfast Would surely like to stay here, whenever we visit Singapore again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place to visit
desc: Great location good clean rooms staff friendly close to orchard road and excellent shopping and food courts good public transport with excellent train and bus service. We travelled to Singapore to go to the Grand Prix the hotel was an excellent with only two train stops right outside gate 3. Would recommend this hotel on its great location

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very Good Hotel
desc: My stay here was excellent. Will stay here again. The staff is always friendly and helpful. Only downside was no more cell phones. Will let others no how well this hotel is. say to get to and still easy to get to anywhere you want.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent!
desc: We enjoy each and every stay at The Holiday Inn Orchard Road! Location is great for shopping and access to the metro. Hotel staff are friendly and helpful. We especially enjoy the Executive Lounge - amazing staff, great ambiance and delicious food offerings. We’ll definitely stay at this property whenever we visit Singapore!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best place in orchard!
desc: * Very nice location on orchard street near shopping malls, metro station, varsity of restaurants. * Very helpful staff. * Good value for money. * Very nice view of park from 8th floor * Excellent Coffe!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hospitality
desc: 2 thumbs UP... - porter (old man pakcik) was very helpful.. carried our bags around - Guest Relationship officer from Klang was kind enough to show us the makan place behind the hotel. - every morning for breakfast, the waitress will always ask us what type of coffee we drink and she will prepare it accordingly.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very pleasant stay.
desc: Amazing hotel! Buffet brekky has everything you could ever want at brekky and more. Even dinner... the amount of food was full on. Gertrude (and all the other staff) at brekky were so lovely, even giving us places we should see etc. and always made sure everything was ok. Ida (housekeeping) was lovely and helpful. Rooms clean, neat and bed is comfortable. Housekeeping staff were very friendly lovely to deal with, one lady didn’t speak English but nothing google translate couldn’t fix. (Love google translate as we used it in Italy and Paris) All staff were friendly and lovely, reception, restaurant, bar, housekeeping, concierge etc. The pool, spa and sauna on the top floor of the hotel was so relaxing! If we were ever to return to Singapore we would definitely stay

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very nice hotel and customer service
desc: The hotel is very conveniently located in Orchard city center. There is a city shuttle arrives from airport to the hotel front door. $9/person，even available at 3am. We arrived hotel around 4am. All the hotel staffs are very nice and made us feel at home. They also made great effort so that we could do early check in shortly after 7am. We appreciate it very much! They also provided us great resources in tour packages. Nice service and nice facility! I am very glad that we booked it. This is our first trip to Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay
desc: Nice location 3 minutes from the MRT. Really great roof top environment with a nice pool and fitness facilities. Nice breakfirst with various cousines fitting every need and taste. They missed some small things but still great value for the money.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: All request met..
desc: Stay in this hotel was exemplary. They went everytime an extra mile to make it most comfortable stay. Some offerings came along without asking and no request was put down. Location is fantastic, pool & gym are best. In room food service was good. No complains at all.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Hotel and location
desc: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre is a great Hotel. Speedy check in and check out process, and friendly staff who ensured we had a great stay! The location is perfect with a short walk to 2 MTR stations and bus stops and a huge number of shopping centres!! The room we stayed in was a great size for two adults and 1 teenager. Would highly recommend staying at this hotel for the room size and also location.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: My family had a great time!
desc: Traveled with family (daddy, mommy, toddler and nanny)... asked for room with connection and was accommodated. :-) Excellent breakfast choices too. Location to city and expressway. Great value and will definitely come back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent customer service!
desc: We had a great stay here! Very good customer service from the doorman, front desk, housekeeping and dining! Good job! 👍 Few improvements can be made on the breakfast selection though. Great service from Chandra, Gertrude, Elizabeth and Chef Michael! 😊

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very clean & luxurious
desc: I liked the hotel very much, the rooms are very clean and the staff is very attentive. Being from a different culture what I realised is that their restaurants are very multicultural and I was always able to find something to eat. I would stay there again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: What an excellent place this is!
desc: I had the pleasure of staying with my family at holiday inn in October 2019. It was a great experience right from the ease of check in to the location of the hotel. The staff is ever helpful to guide you. The rooms are big and I mean really big compared to Asian room standards. Love the fact that they have kept the international traveller in mind and installed plug points for us according to our country’s electrical sockets. That’s a big plus point in their favour. The location is so convenient being on Orchard Road. A minute away from all the big malls. There’s a Starbucks right behind it. It was a v pleasant stay and I will definitely be back here.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: One of the best stay in SG
desc: We had our wedding banquet in Holiday Inn Orchard Singapore and it was very well organised. The exterior of the hotel and the interior may appear antique but the ambience and smell are fantastic, it certainly makes us really relaxed and comfortable. In addition, it is surprising clean and service is amazing. The rooms are spacious and the beds are huge. Looking forward to another staycation in December this year.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Old favourite
desc: Efficient, friendly and very helpful staff at reception and concierge. Great location, always a pleasant stay. Spacious, comfortable room. Nice firm bed. The room, bathroom in particular, is a little old style and could do with an upgrade. Cheap local food outlets and supermarket next door. Lots of food courts, restaurants and MRT station across Orchard Road or within easy walking distance, much of it underground and air conditioned.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location
desc: For us the location of this Hotel was important. Located just off Orchard Road it was a short walk to the shops and the metro which enabled us to get to just about the major places we wanted to see. The hotel had all the facilities you would want, including a rooftop pool that was a great place to cool off. As with all Holiday Inns the breakfast was amazing and all the staff were very friendly, professional and helpful. As hotel laundry costs can be expensive, it was useful to find a self service launderette just on the next corner! Our bedroom was large and had everything we needed, very clean and the housekeeping staff were excellent. Great hotel and would thoroughly recommend it.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent for a family trip
desc: We have booked a room with two double beds for us and our 2 kinds (8 and 13). The room was large enough for us and the hotel and surroundings are very safe a rather quiet. The location is excellent being 3 minutes walk from the Orchard Road and 30 minutes walk to Marina Bay. We haven't used any MRT because grab/taxi price for 4 was the same as for the MRT. The hotel is only little old but very well maintained. As an advantage for us the building is only 8 stories high and there is an very nice pool and jacuzzi on the rooftop (almost empty all the time we were there), The breakfast could be improved from my point of view but it was reasonable. Coffee was decent and the european options were good enough if you are not very picky (lie our older son). I would definitely book again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location
desc: This was our 3 stay at the hotel in recent times. It's certainly consistent - staff are reasonably friendly for a city hotel. rooms are clean and comfortable, breakfast is good, pool area is ok but I'm convinced the water needs a better filtration system (looked a bit murky to me) and the location is terrific. However, the gym area and some of the equipment is laughable - I was attempting to use the pin loaded machine but had to leave as 2 other guys turned up. There simply wasn't enough room for 3 people. Also, I'm convinced that their queen sized beds are doubles. I could be wrong of course but they seem mighty small to me Value for money.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Holiday Inn on Orchard Road Singapore
desc: Stayed here with the family (with 2 small kids) on a Holiday.. amazing hotel and a great team that are very responsive and highly service oriented. The Indian Restaurant in the basement Tandoor serves authentic Indian cuisine. The roof top pool and Jacuzzi are spot on for a relaxing swim and soak..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: 3 night stopover
desc: Good four star hotel. Excellent service. Pool and hot tub great. Staff were helpful with late check out and airport transfer. Decent size family room, good location. Minor gripes - room a little dark and (odd for Singapore) the TV reception not great. Would definitely go back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: very comfortable and convient
desc: very comfortable and convient clearn and good service.but .expensive . it is located in centre of singapore ,there are restruant ,cafe ,mall and shop around the hotel,Trffic is easy and you can show around the city

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel with poor service
desc: We were here for a bday . The hotel has very good location . Rooms are spacious and good too . The guest service sucks - very late , not abiding , rooms were not cleaned properly. They don’t have a travel desk . They were not able to arrange a bday can too 😡

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Musty
desc: Upon entering the room there was a very heavy musty smell - reported to staff and they sent a house keeper with a bottle of spray which I think was just a cleaning product rather than a air freshener. After that the hotel sent a plug in atomiser which did the trick. Staff were friendly and helpful.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel with good location
desc: Spended 5 nights there to explore Singapore. Very polite and nice personnel with good service. Big swimming pool with gym and a really Finish style sauna with Helo heater (Made in Finland). Good location. Big breakfast with a lot of choices.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice and comfortable hotel
desc: Friendly receptionist, consierge, and all staff, We have a good experience when we check in, we got complete all information about this hotel, from receptionist. The entire contents of the room are clean, comfortable room conditions Comfortable air conditioner, bed sheets. Good amenities, good mini bar Good breakfast

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Paradise lost
desc: I had been frequently staying in this hotel for nearly 10 years and also introduced 3 new customers. All was good until July 2019, when someone became too greedy. The benefits in the business lounge have been totally downgraded and removed - for example, no salad / no soup . no nothing from 1 to 1 pm only biscuits and coffee/tea. The decent scotch after a day's hard work has been withdrawn - black label has been replaced with Dewar's. No handy phones - no free calls now available. Gym is absolute crap for a 4 start hotel - couple of outdated tread mills with some weights. And to top it al, rates have gone up. I escalated these issues to Sophie, the director, but her explanations were even worse. She says Dewar's is more expensive than black label. 1 to 4 pm lounge menu was

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Place
desc: We chose this hotel because of the good reviews and we were not let down. We chose a Club Room, the food and drinks in the Club Lounge were more than we expected. We found that we did not have to eat anywhere else. The hotel was exceptional clean and all staff were very friendly and obliging.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Property with excellent service
desc: After a long flight from the UK the Holiday Inn was the perfect place to stay. The service was impeccable from the moment we stepped out of the taxi to the moment we left. We arrived from the airport at 9am and they made sure there was a room available for us as our two kids were so tired. The location is wonderful - right on Orchard Road. Highly recommend this hotel

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent
desc: Wow, what a wonderful service from you people, thanks a lot for caring your guests from entrance to exit it was a great experience , very near to orchard road ove to stay again and again if in Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lost its touch
desc: Stayed at this hotel a few times over the years and booked it again as a loyal IHG , Spire and Ambassador member. Booked an Executive room with club acess. Upon check in was thanked for been a member etc and then advised that they could not upgrade the room as the hotel was full and that was the end of it. The following day, after writing direct to IHG and not the hotel we where informed that we will be upgraded. My issue which seemed lost with the front desk team is one of expectations. The IHG web site says guaranteed room upgrade for platinum/ ambassador members, am sure that there is small print below but the thing is, if there is no upgrade available then why not offer a dinner or additional points in its place. The hotel in general is in a good location and its

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: I definitely recommend holiday inn city centre
desc: I already stay holiday inn city centre twice.so far everything are okay and accommodating staff. nice rooms and delicious buffet breakfast are served. the only thing I.guess they should check is some minor broken tiles or edges of thier room but aside of that I definitely recommend this hotel.especially the city centre orchard it very convenient for travellers like me. I brought my whole family with me, we are 10 people in the group and they accommodate us. I definitely comeback and stay with them.😊👍👍👍

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Stay at Holiday inn
desc: We liked the location of this hotel very close to the Somerset station. Its very easy to move to the orchard road malls from here. Service was good and we got good help from the front desk. I also liked the layout of the room compact with all facilities.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Not what we expected
desc: Stayed last week at this hotel, after having booked and paid 10 months in advance. It was our wedding Anniversary and our travel agent asked for a twin room high floor facing the park. She sent subsequent emails during that 10 months, and we sent a couple our selves. Each time we were assured that our request was noted, but at check in there were no rooms ready, and the clerk couldn't say when one would be , could be several hours. We were shown 2 rooms, on the opposite side of the hotel , and after a long flight we were tired and just took one of them. Unfortunately a series of bars and night venues was underneath our window, and an incredible racked ensued till the early hours. I was very disappointed not to get the park view that we have had in the past,

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very nice in all respects
desc: Very good hotel. Service and staff are excellent. Location is close to shopping area. Restaurants are close and subway in near. Exercise room is small so equipment is adequate but limited. Only thing missing is for some reason BBC is no longer on TV. Insipid CNN is there. Need BBC and FOX.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome
desc: Front Desk Kathrina is very efficient.She try to accommodate to all our request.Concierge staff has always put up a smile even though the flow of guests are crowded. Thumbs up for the smooth check in We will be back soon.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Birthday Party at Holiday Inn - Maharajah Suite
desc: I had a lovely experience hosting my sons 3rd birthday party for about 50 guests at Maharajah Suite of Holiday Inn singapore . The staff and service was TOP notch . Special mention to Michelle who helped me throughout the quote to agreement process and Mr. Ananth who was the banquet manager on the day of the event. They ensured that everything was in order from banquet hall layout, menu, beverages , dinner etc. The birthday package which included Photobooth service and Popcorn and candy floss was such a hit with my party guests. The food was also very well appreciated as they had food to suit kids and a nice Indian buffet spread as well. Overall I am extremely happy I chose Holiday Inn for my sons birthday party and cannot thank you guys enough for making it a huge success.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Mixed feelings
desc: The location of the hotel cannot be beaten and this hotels offers very competitive room rates and good amenities. However, it does not come without some flaws. The room first offered to us had a very strong moldy smell and we had to change rooms. Our new room was slightly better, though not entirely without smells or major signs of aging. The property needs a thorough renovation soon. With a few exceptions, service was not particularly friendly or warm, and some of the staff members seemed to need some extra training. Travelling with two small kids, we did not always feel welcome in the hotel's club lounge or lobby bar due to the attitude of the staff. They never automatically offered us a high chair or a menu card for example - we always had to ask for it separately. Also,

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Executive Lounge Service
desc: I have used this hotel for my business trips to Singapore for the last 5 years and each time the service is excellent. In this review I would especially like to note the recent service I received in the Executive lounge from Marjo Entico and Marge Sotto. These ladies took the time to get to know each guest and were always on point with every detail. I hope to see them again on my return.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Short stay
desc: A strategic place to stay for your short business trip, located at the center of orchard road. Easy to access and the staffs really helpful. I found the room very clean and comfort. I had not pleasant experience at breakfast, i had found lipstick stain on my cup and i did not put any.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Overall good place to stay
desc: Big spacious room. Some details need renovation. Some lightbulbs would be nice to have replaced. Not much light in the room. Breakfast have a good selection of food, but not so western oriented.......................................................................................................................................................................

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent place to stay in Singapour
desc: I stayed 5 nights there last November. Particularly well located. 5-10 minutes walk from metro station. Very nice experience with very professional and efficient staff. Nice, spacious and well insulated room. Comfortable bed. I appreciated the inroom choice between soft and hard pillow. Breakfast is quite comprehensive with wide choice and gluten free bread. Nice sized pool outside. Highly recommended and to my point of view higher standard than most of IHG Crowne Plaza where I have been staying at !

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location. Superb hotel
desc: Always nice to stay at this hotel located in the heart of the shopping district in orchid road. All staff very polite and helpful. Rooms clean and tidy. Very fast wifi. Executive lounge is worth every dollar. Lovely pool. Ideal for a stay. 20 minutes from airport for 18 SGD. Shuttle bus available.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Visit cw 49
desc: Lounge services were excellent as well as top floor gym, sauna and swimming pool. Small remark is coming from the services in the lobby bar, actual service was somewhat slow and also the prices are remarkably high in the lobby bar.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent for business trip or family tour
desc: Nice hotel, nice service, and nice location. The facilities inside the hotel can meet all kinds of the traveler. Don’t miss this hotel when travel to Singapore. The breakfast is also nice with all kinds of food from different regions.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Home at the center of the Orchard Road
desc: Excellent service! Located very near good restaurants and shopping area. Very close to many interesting attractions mostly with 15 - 20 mins driving distance. They have free parking for guest. In case you are too tired to drive the Somersett Station is just a 5 mins walk.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday inn orchard
desc: staffs are very friendly,cleaning and service perfect , location is great,cleanliness is perfect,I recommend this hotel for those people who attention the discipline ,I enjoyed my time there and would come again next time

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Home Away from Home
desc: Stayed in this hotel whenever i am in Singapore, the staff are always nice, room are big and is always clean, bed always comfortable and no requests are too much for them. The food and drinks in their executive lounge are great, would recommend.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Location near Local food and Global Brands
desc: Holiday Inn Orchard City Center have always been a good destination for business travels looking for both the comfort of the city, where shopping for Global brands never stops and great coffee are available to walking distance local hawker areas. You can also visit the wide choices of food hall and food courts atop Somerset 313, Wisma and at the basement of Ion Shopping Plaza. The location is a crossroad for those travelers looking for local experiences but with modern feel of a cosmopolitan living at the center of town.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lovely hotel in central location
desc: Lovely hotel in a very central location just off Orchard Road. 7 eleven across the road was also very handy. Large rooms which were kept very clean. Staff were friendly. Rooftop pool was great to relax after long day sightseeing.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel with lovely staff
desc: I have really enjoyed my trip and the staff have been lovely, nothing is a problem and they handle everything with a smile. The breakfast has plenty of variety and is tasty. The room is of a good size, the pool lovely and the air con works well. Good location close to Orchard Road

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great place to stay, very close to Orchard Road for shopping
desc: My daughters and I stayed at the Holiday Inn for 6 wonderful nights. The staff are wonderful and able to answer any questions we had. They arranged taxis any time we needed them all with a smile. The pool area is awesome 😎 and always kept clean and tidy. The rooms were a good size and again kept clean. If you want to be really close to Orchard Road shopping then this is the place for you. Starbucks, 24 hour 711 and another coffee shop are less than 200m as well as an great area for lots of restaurants and cafes. Fabulous Indian restaurant really close as well. Highly recommended.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice and friendly stay in Holiday Inn City Center
desc: Stayed in my preferred hotel in Singapore and as always the stay was pleasant and the staff of the hotel goes the extra mile to make your feel welcome The check in and out was easy and speedy the room was perfect and the breakfast delicious

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Stay comfy
desc: I like to stay here, because i have 2 young children, its comfy, i always stay here if i go to singapore , i think everything okay in here, near shoping center, near MRT, you can walk to orchard shoping center. I like this place

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: The staff and service throughout the Hotel was to an excellent standard. Could not fault the rooms, breakfast was brilliant and to a high standard. The lobby bar where we chilled also performed to a high standard, on our second night bar staff remembered you and your previous order from the night before, excellent

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Few days
desc: Booked an Executive Club room bu disappointed with the small size, however everything else about the room was good. Had an issue connecting my laptop to the hotel wifi. Had breakfast daily in the club lounge, good variety of food, but the hash browns were inedible and the fried eggs were not cooked well - both of these issues are common with many hotels. Gerald in the club lounge needs to be highlighted for his excellent work and helped me get my laptop connected to the hotel wifi. He tried his best first but still had issues, but called the hotel IT guy who fixed the issues very quickly and no more issues thereafter. Gerald was very much in touch with all guests - excellent employee. A very pleasant stay, have stayed here many many times, always recognised as a Gold Elite

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Ideal hotel
desc: Very nice property and ideal location, staff very friendly and efficient especially Marg and Gerard in the 3rd floor loungs. It’s easy to have access to MRT and all major shopping centers along Orchatd road,.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service
desc: Best service, helpful, polite. The breakfast was excellent. The front office team was very helpful and got early checkin. Room service quick. Bathroom is slightly small. Located centrally. Room size is good. Loved their service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service
desc: Would like to bring attention to a particular staff operator, Mary who undoubtedly went above and beyond her duties by assisting my party of 4 with queries on Window in the Park restaurant. Very helpful and gracious, thank you for making our day. All the best...

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Outstanding service
desc: I stayed at the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre last week with my husband, 17m old daughter, parents and aunt and uncle. We had 3 rooms and lounge access. I wanted to write this review to express my appreciate and recognition for the fabulous team we encountered. Right from the arrival through to departure, we were greeted with warm and gracious service staff. Of particular mention, the team in housekeeping who called my father to notify him that his wallet had been recovered from the clothes he sent for drycleaning. It was safely returned and untouched. My father is unsteady on his feet using a walking stick to help him - he accidentally fell in the lobby on the day of his departure and the concierge team was immediately at his side to help him up effortlessly. We found

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Harry M.
desc: My experience at the Holiday Inn was made exceptional by the warm and friendly staff. I've been there only a couple of times for business trips and the staff remembered me like I was a frequent guest. The crew at the executive lounge went out of their way to ensure I was treated with great service: from Nahyun's delicious omelettes; to Marjo making sure my room was attended to when there was an issue and her delicious Singapore Slings; and finally to Marge who was able to extend my room reservation after talking with her about how my job might be extended and giving great advice for holiday shopping and festivities while traveling to Manila from Singapore. I look forward to reserving a stay there again when I return to beautiful Singapore. Top notch staff at a great location.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: This place needs to rethink hospitality...
desc: This was my second visit to this hotel in last 4 years but for sure I was more than disappointed this time around. Rooms need upgrade, breakfast service and the area needs overhaul including the assortments - cold food, not so friendly staff at the breakfast. In general overall service is lousy. Some staff members did go above and beyond reason for my 3 star rating.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family get together in Singapore
desc: The staff are excellent and always very attentive to your needs Irwan (head concierge is a GEM - he organised NYEve celebration at 1Altitude with one days notice - thanks Irwan All staff greeted you wherever and whenever you passed them in corridor or met them in lift

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: overnight stay
desc: We stayed at The Holiday Inn for one night . Booked a room with 2 double beds for our family of 3. The room was clean & to our satisfaction.The room had a musty smell but i think that this is from the Humidity in Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The Executive Lounge Service Makes this Hotel Perfect
desc: We stayed in a large suite for 9 nights over Christmas and New Year and despite being sick for most of our stay, had a truly wonderful time. We arrived very early and took the risk that no room would be available... and it wasn't, but Gerald, Marjo and Marge took care of us straight away and settled us into the Executive Lounge where we were even able to nap on a sofa. The executive lounge service never faltered from that point on. We were always greeted in a very friendly manner by whoever was on at the time... Gerald, Erra, Marjo and Marge stand out big time here... and Aaron (he has a Chinese name too) on eggs was brilliant every day. My partner was very ill and was served a ginger, lemon and honey tea every morning to help her get her voice back. The food for breakfast in

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Comfortable Stay in the heart of Singapore
desc: I stayed in this hotel with my family during December 2019 Christmas time. It was an excellent stay with spacoius room and all essential amenties. The break fast spread was well spread out and quite a few Indian vegetarian items included. The only drawback i find that menu is repeated every alternative day. The charges are afforable considering the plush location if you book well in advance. The nearest MRT is Somerset only a few blocks away. The hotel has swimming pool and gym on the 8th floor. You could well cover Singapore with Ezee Link card availing services of MRT and buses which spread accross Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Thank You!
desc: Great placed hotel - a little ‘tired’ perhaps compared to when we last visited 10 yrs back - but the staff and the facilities are still fantastic. Special mention for the rooftop pool and the great team in the executive lounge - Gerald and his colleagues Marge and Marjo! Thx once again!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Hotel is very well located very close to Orchad road. Property very well managed. Room are quite spacious. I have been there two times and I would go again for sure. Plenty of eateries around the place and shop are not far at all.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A bit old but great location of you get a good rate
desc: Great location here for walking out, MRT access, and wide range of food for all tastes and budgets. Keep an eye out for promos and rates. This can be popular in holiday perdiods and the prices then are too much ans there are better value hotels just a short MRT out.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Old is gold
desc: Stayed at a Deluxe Suite for a short staycation. It was spacious, clean and comfortable, totally no complaints. The service at the reception and restaurants is generally good, although I could tell the staff are slightly stretched during this festive / holiday season. Location wise, it’s a clear winner. Minutes walk to great shopping and food options, but tucked away in a quite corner of Orchard Road. Overall, while Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre is showing some signs of age, it retains a certain charm, and remains an excellent and comfortable option for travelers looking to stay along Orchard Road, without the need to pay exorbitant prices. Well done guys =)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday
desc: We have just spent 8 nights here and have had the best time. A special shout out to Gerald and his staff in the clubroom. They go above and beyond to provide the best service and genuinely care about their patrons. Can't wait to come back to our home away from home

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Place to Stay In and Relax
desc: My family and I stayed for 7 days and 6 nights. We really enjoyed our stay at our club room which was upgraded to a junior suite. The staff there was really nice and welcoming. Even the staff members that help make up the rooms would greet us when we pass by them. We would like to commend on the staff at the executive lounge for being very accommodating and caring. A big thank you to Erra and Gerald for making our stay an enjoyable one.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Compliment for Holiday Inn hotel staff
desc: I would like to feedback on club lounge staff Gerald,, Marjo, Era & Nahyun for the exceptional and attentive service by your club staff. Keep up the good work. Also to compliment Vasanthi for the good service on my daugther 1st birthday celebration event.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent and attentive service throughout
desc: The hotel staff could not have done more for us during our short stay, attentive, considerate and courteous throughout. Although the hotel is now relatively old it has been very well maintained and the location is excellent for tourists and business travellers wanting good value and convenient accommodation.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
desc: The room is clean, wide and has all amenities. The hotel location is excellent in the middle of the orchard road. All services are around the hotel with a walking distance. All hotel staff are very cooperative and friendly.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Business Trip
desc: Very nice hotel. Great location next to Orchard road. Business lounge on 3rd floor is great for lunches and drinks. Pool and Gym on upper floor as well. I decided to go with a room away from the highway, for the view. It is still pretty quiet even on the highway side

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent
desc: Very pleasant stay with a very good location. My very first stay was in 1987, at that time this hotel was called Holiday Park View. From 2012 to 2015, every month I visited Singapore, I stay in Holiday Inn. So Orchard road is like my 2nd home.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good experience
desc: Stayed at the hotel for a week. Location was good (is located next to Orchard Road and connected via nearby metro and bus stops). Overall service and experience was very good. No complaints at all. Will definitely book again if i go to Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Hotel, great location and food..
desc: Rooms were spacious, helpful staff and most of all, great location. Malls and restaurants nearby and MRT station is about 300 mts walk. There is water offered in the room and all the amenities of a good hotel are present. Hotel has an Indian restaurant named Tandoor as well which was a delight. Good vegetarian options as well thought not many in number. Overall, good stay and would recommend.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Bad experience for high tea on 21 Dec 19.
desc: Visited the hotel for the high tea set. Ordered a extra Intercontinental breakfast together with the two high tea set and it took 40min to arrive.
