By the time, the rest of my family have almost finished their food while my poor relative waits for her food. Staff appears nonchalant and explains as a matter of factly that the food is prepared from another kitchen and that there is nothing they can do. If this is the standard of the holiday inn brand, we would definitely rethink before booking Holiday Inn express Taichung for my Taiwan trip this upcoming Feb.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Maintain the excellence
desc: After so many years of my stay at Holiday Inn Orchard, I would say the hotel is able to maintain their excellence. The room is well maintained and regularly refreshed new. Staffs is also doing great job to serve the guest well. Breakfast is also excellent. The quality of the food is excellent and the variety is also adequate enough. Room is two double beds which is perfect for family vacation. Bathroom is clean and well maintained. Even though the hotel design is 80's with atrium style but they are able to keep the service and excellence all these years compared to new hotels in town.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Loved the Location!
desc: So close to The Cuppage, MRT line and various shopping areas! So happy we stayed here! Great breakfast selection. Friendly and efficient staff. Older hotel but clean and well maintained. Would definitely recommend.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A week in Singapore to celebrate our anniversary!
desc: Delightful stay, comfort room. Location ideal for touring. Staff went above and beyond. I left sunglasses at a restaurant and after locating them, the concierge, Issac, offered to drive across town to retrieve them for me! The Executive Lounge staff could not have been more helpful and hospitable. Ellie, Nahyun and Rayne allows went above and beyond to provide us with the best of service and courtesy in a joyful manner. Will highly recommend this location. Look forward to a return visit.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: By far the best Holiday Inn I’ve stayed anywhere
desc: I can’t say enough good things about this hotel. Beautiful property, excellent staff, great location, and good food. I’d recommend spending the extra money for lounge access. I’ve stayed in a number of the IHG properties in Singapore including the Hotel Indigo and Intercontinentals. Definitely the best value for the money.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Uncontactable and irresponsive behaviour
desc: I booked two room for my family a month before and get charged right away. However when the Corona virus spread out i decided to email them that we will not able to make it to Singapore because we were afraid that our little son will get infected. I emailed the hotel twice to ask for free cancellation and some sympathy whether they can refund some amount for us but indeed i received no reply no call back from them. I even called them to check out and they promised to call me back but still no answer. I have paid lots of money for the room but what even worse were their attitude from a big brand hotel. Very disapointed and when i have chance to come to Singapore i will never book in this place

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic Visit in 2020
desc: We had the best visit. The guys at the front desk were awesome, James and Jason. In the Exec Lounge Gerald is 1st class. Our family loved the excellent attention from Ellie, Marge, Margo and everyone else. Thanks for a great time in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday
desc: Recently stayed here with 2 friends ; and couldn’t fault this hotel at all : room was good ; shower had great water pressure . Breakfast was buffet style and although same thing every day there was something for everyone . The pool was a good size and plenty of shade to sit under if needed ; which I did : all the staff were lovely : although we had what I can only think of as the American that gives all Americans a bad name ; we saw her a few times and seemed to think all the staff should have to bow and grace to her ; she was very loud and obnoxious but the staff took it all in their stride . If I returned to Singapore I would definitely stay at this hotel again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A very good surprise
desc: We came to Singapore as part of our 20th wedding anniversary celebration. It was my husband’s first trip to Asia and we just wanted to relax and enjoy this fascinating place. I am not a fan of Holiday Inns, but the hotel is very well located, a few steps from Orchard Road and between two metro stations. It also offered a good deal for rooms with access to the Executive Lounge. We decided to give it a try and we are happy we did. First, my IHG Platinum status was recognized and we were upgraded to a junior suite. Second, the Executive Lounge is among the best I have ever been to in terms of service, quality of meals and availability of drinks. It is open throughout the day with breakfast (6 to 10am), afternoon tea (1 to 4pm) and cocktails (6 to 8pm). Breakfast at the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good
desc: We visited HI as part of Asian trip to celebrate my birthday and our wedding anniversary, tbh we tried to cancel Singapore trip due to the spread of the Covid -19 , however it proved to be costly as difficult and costly, we were checked in by Jason who was very professional and efficient in doing his job, hotel is nice but needs a face lift which didn’t affect our stay in any way. In my opinion the asset of this hotel is the free Mobile WIFI device in the room. Breakfast is average and you won’t loose by missing it, Sarinah from the breakfast restaurant was very pleasant with the kids. In summary you will get what you paid for and what to expect from a four star hotel. Will stay there again for the right price.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome wedding experience!
desc: My wedding was held in Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre, and it was awesome experience with no regrets! Definitely recommending others! I would like to thank Geraldine and Vasanthi for all the support. They helped us with a lot of stuffs and was amazing in flexibility. Not going by the book but instead understood the situations and solve it with amazing ways! Answering to my enquires regardless the time and heavy load they were settling. My husband and I both think that holding our wedding at with this hotel is one of the best choice we made. Everything about the wedding is lovely, especially the food & decorations and the staff (Geraldine, Vasanthi & Sufian) have been really accommodating. Will definitely recommend to any couple who need to hold weddings 👍🏻

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Long Stay Guest (2 Months)
desc: Great Staff, Great Location, Great Room... Add Executive Lounge Access For Open Bar (It Will Save You Money On Drinks) And The Executive Lounge Staff Are Always Providing An Excellent Service. Good Size Pool For Laps... Gym Is Good For Cardio.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location
desc: A very nice location short walk to Orchard street, especially with kids. This was our second time staying there. We were disappointed with the food at breakfast this time. The room bathroom sink was block and air con did not work well but was promptly fixed once we called the room service. Overall value for money

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent
desc: Everything was great! :-) We had a modern, clean and big rooms. The staff on reception was very friendly and keen. I have gluten free diet and after I mentioned it on the breakfast they were prepared and had a glutenfree options and very friendly chef. Hotel have very good location- shops, restaurants, close to centre. I definitely recommend this hotel. :-)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service
desc: Staff was very patient and accommodating! Great service and exquisite array of food :) Room was clean and spacious, was great that they had a variety of shampoo and soap to choose from! Would definitely come back again!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfect location next to Orchard road
desc: We stayed three persons three nights at this hotel. We chose the hotel mainly for its proximity to Orchard road and the SMRT. The room was large with two very comfortable beds. Our room, on the top floor, was facing a large road but since the room was well isolated there were no noise from the road. The pool is situated at the top floor and that was convenient since our room was on that floor. It is an excellent pool with plenty of sun beds and tables where you can enjoy a drink and a light meal. There is also a jacuzzi and a gym. There are plenty of restaurants near the hotel. Since our flight departed late at night the hotel staff was kind enough to offer us a late check out which we greatly appreciated.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Customer Service, location and big room
desc: We had an enjoyable stay in the hotel with access to the Executive Lounge. The service at the lounge are first class. The Guest Experience Manager Gerald and his team were attentive and warm. The lounge is filled with sun light from the roof during the day and the feeling is great. The hotel is also well located with lots of great food round the corner. For those who jogs, Fort Canning hill, and Botanical garden can be reached from the hotel. My room has great view of greenery, really refreshing. The sales Manager Shannen is also very helpful. Overall good hotel with great people.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful stay
desc: Everything in this hotel was good. My room was cool and clean very well maintained. Service was personalise and beyond other hotels. I would like to thank Mr. Rarge for accommodating my needs. And to alex of in room dinning. Thanks for your prompt service towards your guest. Would come back and recommend to all.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Service
desc: Excellent service and friendly staff. Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a place to stay! The staff in the executive club lounge is very professional and friendly, and provided great service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing service!
desc: cleanliness of the room was good, staff were friendly, helpful and approachable. The breakfast and cocktail served tasted really good and was worth the price. Will be sure to come by again during visit!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: WORST HOTEL EVER
desc: Literally the WORST hotel customer service experience I have ever encountered. Booked 2 rooms from 2 Oct to 5 Oct for my sis's 21st birthday staycation through hotel.com. Received an email after from Holiday Inn that they received a government extension, thus unable to accommodate us. Gave us 2 options which were to either cancel and receive a refund or to rebook through them with Intercontinental Hotel at the same rates. We chose the latter option. After a few days, they cancelled our reservation with Intercontinental without our knowledge nor approval. Worse of all, we did not receive a refund for the cancellation. Instead, they gave us a coupon which we can use in future but only with their hotel. Problem was we needed a hotel in that time period (2 Oct to 5 Oct) and not in

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent and thoughtful service by Banquet Operation Staff
desc: I have resumed the delivery of face-to-face training since September 2020 with the opening of Phase 2 in Singapore. I am pleased that my training partner has selected Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre as the venue to run our public programs. In my first 2 trips in September, I received excellent service from Baron and Anantha Krishnan, the Banquet Operations Staff. They always made sure that everything is well taken care of in terms of the room set up, meals and logistics. I would like to specially commend Anantha who noticed that I was looking tired during lunch break today. He arranged for a special room for me to enjoy my packed lunch and eat in private and rest. He is constantly checking in to make sure that I have everything I need. This is very much appreciated

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: High Tea @ Window on the Park
desc: I can honestly reproduce similar standard high tea from a mediocre bakery. At $55++ for two pax. I will say not worth it at all. The service however is good. Staff are friendly and responsive to request.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good deal
desc: I saw the advertisement on Facebook for 1-1 dinner promotion. I decided to try with my friend. Food was great, service was good. Due to covid 19, they serve all food to the table. Quite a lot of food on menu. We could not taste all. Because we were too full. Will visit again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wedding banquet 20 Dec 2020
desc: I would like to compliment Michelle, Leroy, Mr Anand and Mr Steven for the excellent service since the planning phase to the actual wedding itself. I signed up with HIO after visiting several hotels after considering its location, budget and ballroom. Michelle was very prompt with all the queries we raised, especially so as we asked many queries due to the Covid situation. Due to her maternity leave, Leroy stepped in to assist with the coordination. Like Michelle, Leroy is prompt with his replies and helped us finalize our wedding programme, seating arrangements and plans. During the actual day, my wife and I were very pleased with the services provided by Mr Anand, Mr Steven and their team. Mr Anand and Mr Steven were also very assuring, telling us not to worry and enjoy the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good place
desc: The place very nice and good..the view of hotel good..the staff very friendly and humble..the food very delicious and provide good service.this place very silence even in city area.the room very comfortable n clean..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Highly approachable and kind staff
desc: Recently was being quarantine there, the duty manager and service staff was very hospitable and patient with me... Being quarantine alone 24/7 for days was no joke... And yet the service staff whice I keep calling, they have a kind and approachable voice, they don't blame you for keep calling and try to help you as much as possible... Definitely highly recommend to stay and if covid is over, will definitely stay there again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service rendered by outlet manager
desc: I have the last min errands and need to purchase the mooncakes and that was nicely arranged by the Outlet Manager-Sufian. He recommend me the mooncake which my family and relatives loves a lot. All info and needs were well take care. Thanks for the great service and he is really efficient! Will strongly recommend to my friends next time!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Commendable job done by Ms Erra.
desc: I would to appreciate Ms Erra for the commendable service. She’s very proactive and intuitively thoughtful while handling the guest and very quick in helping the guests. I called the reception and asked for a praying Matt within few minutes the Matt was delivered to the room not just this she herself came and guided me with qiblat and handed me a paper in which all the prayer times were mentioned. I really hope to visit the hotel again and meet this wonderful lady as she’s truly a gem of a person who understands guests need and she guides them very well with her soft and polite language. She’s been very supportive and very soft spoken and humble.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Poor housekeeping - But the rest of the staffs balanced with their lovely approach and wonderful service
desc: This was the first holiday with our 3 year old son. We stayed there for 5 nights. The Positives : 1. The main reason to choose this hotel was the location - which was excellent. 2. Wonderful staffs - Especially in the restaurants. There are so many wonderful people to name and on top of this was Ms. Helena. She was absolutely adorable especially with our little son. 3. The rooms were spacious. The negatives : 1. The Housekeeping was really not on point. We left every morning after breakfast and returned only late evening. Still the rooms service would not be done. we had to call and remind them. All we wanted was the bed to be made so that we can come back to a cozy room. But Every day we will have to call and remind. This was very frustrating. 2. No gym / was under

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel
desc: Stayed seven nights in an executive room with extra space and was very happy with just about everything. Excellent location just off Orchard Rd and an easy walk to nearby MRT. Surrounded by restaurants, food halls and shopping. Seems very popular with airline crew as saw them checking in and out every day. The Lounge itself wasn't open but we were well looked after for coffee, drinks and canapes by the staff in the lobby bar. My only criticism is the buffet breakfast is clearly aimed towards moslem clients with no pork anywhere, meaning a simple western breakfast of bacon and eggs couldn't be had (unless you enjoy turkey bacon, which I don't). It's odd because I have stayed at other hotels with similar clientele and nobody had any problems. Good sized swimming pool was also a

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful and magical wedding
desc: We held our wedding at Holiday Inn Orchard, it was such a wonderful experience! We love the services and meticulousness by the wedding coordinator and banquet manager! Big thanks to our wedding coordinator, Moe! We understood from our emcee that there was a period where Holiday Inn was down in manpower, and that she had to takeover many last minute's projects/events, yet she has been responsive in addressing our queries/requests. She has been really helpful and guided us well in our wedding planning. We are thankful that she had acceded to our many last minute requests. The dinner banquet package was very value for money, and the food was good! The whole wedding went very smoothly! Truly a blessing for us to have Holiday Inn as our wedding venue! Thank you!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent and first-class service 🤩🤩🤩
desc: My family and I enjoyed our stay at Holiday in Orchard in Singapore. It was Mr. Viknesh and his team that always went the extra mile to make our holiday memorable, who always greeted us a good morning and asked how we were, who is the most polite and kind member of the staff. I appreciated his politeness and the recommendations he made about where to go in Singapore. We greatly appreciate your hard work and service.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Does not meet the 5 star standards
desc: This is my 7th or 8th visit to Singapore. I have booked the stay for four nights at Holiday Inn Orchard Road city centre for first time but not a very pleasant experience. Instead of booking premier room, was allocated a room which is of lower category and do not even have a sofa/chair (only study chair was there) and was told as I have booked two rooms so if I want adjacent rooms this is the available option otherwise two rooms will be far away from each other. The room is of the premier category only and the size is small as it’s a corner room. However later on after a lot of hassles got shifted to room which was of premier category. I really wonder why the earlier room was kept in premier category. Pros. Only one - Location is excellent as on Orchard Road. Cons-

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Always excellent
desc: We have stayed here many times over the years and the experience never disappoints. Convenient location near Orchard Rd with shops, restaurants, Food Republic nearby, and a short taxi ride to most places. For eating in, the breakfast buffet is excellent and the room service is always faster than they say. However the outstanding thing that keeps us coming back is the caring, friendly, smiling staff who go out of their way to make you feel welcome. I hope they see this review because they make this hotel as special as it is.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Sad
desc: For thirty years I have been staying at this hotel. From the days it was known as Park View. It was sad to return to the hotel after the pandemic to see it so run down and in such poor condition. My room smelt old and very mouldy. The ceiling cornice has mould in the corners. The cabinets are seriously filthy with spray marks all over them. The pool area is really run down and very old looking. The breakfast room is half of what it was as far as choice and then everything is cold. After thirty years it’s time to make this my last visit.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Avoid...
desc: Hotel is ran down and not well maintained. Very old and not renovated for a while. Rooms has awful smell of dampness. Mold in the shower around the silicon sealers. Low pressure of shower. And here is the worst part. I noted others complained about the same thing, yet Hotel management does not take that into consideration. I would expect out of Holiday Inn, 4 star hotel, that by evening (6 pm) my room will be made up, so after a long day at work I can enjoy a tidy room and hot shower. Well, the room was not made at all. Had to call 3 times to beg to get at least soap and clean towels. Despite not cleaning up the room the whole day, it took them half an hour to provide them to me....not sure if this is their strategy to same money or simply out of poor management. Make your

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Room Cleaning
desc: We are a family of 5 staying at Room 803 and 822 since 26th July morning. One room will be checking out on 31st morning and the other on 4th of Aug. When we came to the room this evening, they have not cleaned or cleared the rooms and when enquired they say they clean only on alternate days. We don't pay them less for these days right? Or was that mentioned in the website? Leaving that aside, the guest services asked us what we would require for the day as they wouldn't clean or replenish!! We asked them for coffee sachets, bath towels, hand towels. He came with few tea sachets, bath towels and no hand towels and coffee sachets. I don't know what to say. We are paying 350 SGD (Approx. ₹22,000) for this per night! And, lastely, there were termites in the room. I think this is

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service
desc: We are there for a corporate event. The service staff especially Rashid, Anand , and Barom provided us excellent and prompt service. Not to mention our event planner, Ms Shannon was prompt and always able to accommodate to our last minute request. The food was delicious too. Thank you and well done

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hotel for a mini break
desc: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for a week in Aug. We were rather surprised to find that the rooms for loyalty club members are located on the 3rd floor. We requested a one bedroom suite and our room overlooked the dining precinct behind the hotel. There were nights where the noise of diners and passerby's below kept you awake. With regards to the room, the main bathroom is small with little to no possibility of two people being in there at the same time. Unfortunately the door to the shower did not seal properly either with water leaking out onto the main floor. In addition, there were no power points located in the main bathroom or the toilet/2nd vanity room. The remainder of the suite was acceptable. The 'team' that attended to our daily needs were very kind and

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good enugh
desc: Spent 3 days with my family at this hotel at the end of August. Loved the lobby, the location and the staff availability and courtesy. Concierge was extremely helpful, used their services quite a lot. Rooms are a bit worn, definitely need renovation as well as the bathrooms. Wi fi is stable and included in the price, AC works well. Did not had the chance to use the pool, Gym was closed when we were there.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Filthy bathroom’s floor, heavy on dust
desc: Me and my 8 year old son stayed in this hotel for 9 days. Bathroom’s floor is filthy, looks like they never mop it. Room is heavy with dust, no matter how many times I have asked, they would dust one table and leave one or the other dirty. Airconditioner’s at 24.5 celcius and still hot, although they bring it to 23. The only thing I like is the location. Staff are nice but this doesn’t mean I will recommend this hotel to traveller’s. Look somewhere else. Room #547

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: AMAZING STAFF
desc: We stay in this hotel for 4 days and 3 nights . Would like to thanks the staff the housekeeping team for keeping our room clean and refilling everything we need and mr zainal for helping us for the luggage . We really appreciate the special touch for my friend birthday .I just get disappointed about the breakfast inquiry in the restaurant (Window on the park ) because no one seems to know what is the answer to my questions . The guy i forget his name but he’s just on the phone while Im waiting for the answer and he past me to other person and again one more person came but no one knows i just give up cause I’m in a rush and decided to just have a breakfast outside the whole stay .But all in all we really have a great stay . Especial mention To Ms.Lylian & Mr Hou Kwang for their

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Badly maintained, poor hygiene standards. Do not stay here !
desc: Checked into the property on 20th Aug'22 and am scheduled to stay here until 26th Aug---something that i am dreading. This property charges nearly $300+++ but is more like a poorly maintained 2 star property at a good location. I have already written a poor rating feedback against my stay in 2018 and despite assurances see that the hotel standards have only deteriorated. Few pointers (1) Lobby is shabby with mould visible around the air-conditioning ducts (refer photograph). (2) Poor implementation of Covid safety protocols : No sanitizers in the lift or other public areas on each floor. (3) Rooms smell of mould and have a poor upkeep standard. Refer photo of badly maintained table with polish chipping out. (4) Air-conditioning makes heavy noise---much like a washing machine

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Fantastic Location in the Heart of the City!
desc: I am grateful to all the staff at Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre, Singapore for making my family's stay truly memorable. Especially Dorothy and Lillian for going out of their way to ensure that my family was comfortable throughout our stay at the hotel. For the first two nights, we had some issues with the air-conditioning in our room. When we addressed this to the hotel team, they were very proactive in upgrading our room to a bigger category with fantastic air conditioning. We have pleasant memories of the hotel, where my kids enjoying swimming in the swimming pool at the terrace. We also had a great time during the complimentary evening snacks with lounge access, where we greeted by smiling faces and warm hospitality every evening at the hotel lobby. The breakfast spread was

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good stay. Great location
desc: Great stay, clean rooms and efficient service by hotel staff, specially the reception. Good location and we could walk across to the malls and other places. Orchard street is great for shopping and endless dining options. Had a great time in Singapore. Thank you Holiday Inn.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Needs work to rooms
desc: We booked in on the 17 August and stayed 6 nights. When I first walked in I could smell the dust I started feeling anxious as this bothers my asthma. I cannot fault the staff they are all very good and amazing people. Our room was clean but very dusty. I decided to move the curtains and I was horrified when I saw the place falling apart. Maybe they are renovating but why put tourists in awful rooms that are falling apart. This should never have happened. I feel that we paid too much for the room that looked the way it did. Rooms like this should be closed and not used.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Does not deliver international standards
desc: This hotel does not maintain international standards. Out hotel door was left open one day after cleaning. The only restaurant is halal and does not serve beer or other alcohol. Neither would you get bacon for breakfast. Staff is friendly and try to do their best though.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice Hotel, Good Location
desc: We stayed for 4 nights and it was family holiday in Singapore. The hotel's location is good with Orchard road close-by and a nice food joint just behind. The rooms are clean and cozy and staff is very humble. Overall gr8 stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Staycation at Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre
desc: It has been years before coming back here for a stay. Delighted to be upgraded to suite. Staffs are friendly n room is clean. Gals enjoyed the ample sample space to play n sleep in. We even play hide and seek in the room. Enjoyable n memorable one for this sept sch holiday since we have no plan for overseas vacation yet. Thank u Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre💕

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Outstanding stay
desc: I have stayed in this hotel for a week, it has been amazing experience with outstanding service, kind team and great food. I will for sure be back and can only recommend this hotel in the heart of Sgp!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice ambience and excellent service by supportive staff at corporate event
desc: We held our staff lunch at the Orchid Room. Very cosy and nice ambience. The manager Moe was very helpful and advised me on the planning of the event. The duty manager Steven was very attentive to our requests and was so supportive of the whole event, from PA system to service crew. The staff really had a good time enjoying the food and ambience, and the programme ran very smoothly. Thank you for a wonderful time there.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Thanks wedding banquets team
desc: We held a solemnisation and weddding ceremony in Crystal ball room in Holiday Inn Orchard. They gave us a very good service with affordable price. During our ceremony , they make ourselves and our guests comfortable. Thank you so much !

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Older and worn hotel but great location
desc: Great location but rather old and worn hotel. Clear visible signs of wear and tear. Pool closed for days due to technical issues. Location is great but nightclub next door is very noisy in the weekend for the lower floors. Great staff and extended checkout time by 2 hours at no extra cost Breakfast buffet was standard with nothing special to mention

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A great staycation!
desc: Stayed at this Holiday Inn Hotel for the 2nd time this year to have a nice break with my husband and my 4 year old son. Experience is great for both occasions and the sincerity can be felt from all crew members, be it in the restaurant, lobby lounge, front desk or housekeeping. Prices at restaurant and lobby lounge are very reasonable for hotel standard. Would love to go back again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Service by Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre
desc: We had our wedding at the Hotel Ballroom and stayed over at the Bridal Suite, their service was impeccable and the staff showed a high level of attentiveness to all the small details Kudos to the Moe, Steven and team, keep up the good work

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great hospitality and service!
desc: Thanks to Moe, Baharom and team, we hosted a very successful event with our customers. They are dedicated, proactive and willing to go the extra mile to assist us. Kudos and we hope to engage with you in future!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Thank you for this lovely experience
desc: An absolutely lovely experience. Extremely friendly staff, great breakfast, clean and friendly. Located in the core of Orchard. Great access with a public transport both from the airport and to the attractions. For sure a place to visit again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Thank you for a Great Service
desc: An outstanding experience. We had a few days stop over in Singapore. The Holiday inn Orchard was recommended and did not fail to deliver. It is in a perfect location to access the Orchard street shopping district and many restaurants, bars. The staff were excellent in their professionalism and friendly care. The young man on the front desk was a treat. There is a great restaurant and bar and the rooms were of a high standard.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Impeccable venue and team
desc: Just completed a 250 strong business event. The service team was excellent. They were non intrusive but appear when help was needed. Last minute requests were also handled professionally. Positive comments received from the attending guests as well. Kudos to the team especially Audrey, Eunice, Shannen and Baharom. Will be our ‘go to’ venue in future!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best hospitality service ever!
desc: As an IHG member, I have experienced great staycation at local hotels. Good food, hotel room cleanliness, ambience and good staff service have always been our top priorities. Holiday Inn Orchard CC exceeds all these in particular the staff service at Concierge, Windows at the Park restaurant and Executive Lounge. In particular, Firdaus, Logesh and Pravin were very attentive, polite and friendly in serving us while we dined for cocktails and breakfast. My 82 year old mother sang praises for Vik who is so approachable and friendly. She was grateful to Dorothea for acting promptly on her request to change our room to one that is close to the elevator.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great restaurant
desc: This hotel is top notch. The restaurant staff are the best. Breakfast was included in our reservation. Great Breakfast with lots of local selections. The most important part was that we were treated like royalties. Thanks to the entire restaurant staff. Special shout out to Vik and Sasi. You guys made our vacation memorable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service
desc: A big shoutout to the front desk Asian male staff who served us on 11/06/2022 in the morning. We were so tired from a long flight and came for an early check-in. He was really efficient and arrange a comfortable room for us to rest. In the afternoon we had enough rest and decided to went out for shopping. When we went back to our room, there were a card, a beautiful cake, a box of chocolate, a plate of fresh fruits and a bottle of wine!!! The staff set it up as our honeymoon surprise. What a surprise!!! This is the best surprise and service that I received as a Diamond Elite member during my honeymoon in various IHG hotels. Thank you so much and we would definitely recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn
desc: We had a really good experience in Holiday Inn Hotel. The staff there are very friendly and helpful. We enjoy our time in the Executive Lounge, the food is fantastic and service is excellent. Mr. Sasi is really professional and extremely helpful. We definitely will comeback to visit the city and stay in Holiday Inn again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfecr getaway from work
desc: We are here for 2 night, stayed in the Premium room for 2 adults and 2 children. The executive lounge offered a variety of sushi, continental delicacies. Their deserts are to die for. I loved the cocktails here. Singapore sling n Berry Beam was excellent Very child friendly too. The lounge executives were very kind... Jason, Sasi and Gloria. The hotel brought back fond memories for my hubby as he graduated in the hotels ballroom many moons ago,,,,, blast from the past!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn Orchard City Center
desc: We stayed about 3 weeks for business and the experience are great. Besides breakfast, we almost visited the executive lounge at night everyday to get some beer/wine and chat about the day. All the people in the hotel are extremely nice and give great service! 99.9% we will come back again next time while visiting Singapore

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family friendly
desc: Staff are very helpful Provided very good service .Buffet has different choices and kids loved the food Executive Lounge staff are very helpful and catered for the needs Checkin and check out was smooth no hassles and the hotel is in a great location with different restaurants very close

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Enjoyable Stay Holiday Inn
desc: We had a pleasant stay. Guest services over the phone are very prompt in responding, such as Dorothea. Your staff are very welcoming and we enjoyed our stay and meals at the executive lounge. We’d like to thank specially Sasi, whose welcoming demeanour exhibits great warmth and attentiveness in connecting with us and other hotel guests. He showed thoughtful attention the minute we walked in. Thanks very much.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Ideal Place
desc: A very ideal place around Orchard Road. It is close enough to the malls and the nearest MRT station as well. Thank you also to the staff who were courteous and made our stay comfortable from check-in to check-out. Would definitely recommend the place.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Outstanding family stay at holiday inn singapore
desc: Outstanding service at Holiday inn. We loved being here. Sasi and Zhi took great care of us at the exec lounge brekkie. Kids found the whole experience awesome. Simply loved it! Thanks for everything!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wedding
desc: Me and my wife experienced wonderful wedding celebration with holiday inn Singapore Orchard City Centre Thank you so much for everyone who helped us to celebrate memorable wedding Wish you all the best ♥️♥️♥️♥️

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good Hotel close to CBD
desc: Holiday Inn orchard City Centre is a good hotel close to Singapore's CBD, the best part of this hotel is the proximity to a whole slew of eateries very close it so finding something yummy to eat, whether, Indian, Chinese or Thai was never a problem. The rooms are decent nothing great, they could definitely amp up the luxury quotient a bit, price wise it was ok we got a good deal. The breakfast spread was also nice we enjoyed it though its in a compact space and the crowd was a bit much for my liking. Overall I would recommend Holiday Inn City Centre.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Service.
desc: This is the 3rd time we stayed at the Holiday Inn orchard Road City centre. Each time the service keeps getting better and we keep coming back. Very close to good shopping, lots of eatery near by, which is converted travelling with kids. A good selection of food at the hotel morning buffet. We had the add on evening cocktail and enjoyed the relaxed ambiance at the executive lounge. The hospitality at the hotel is 5 star. We were very impressed by Jason, Firdous and Sasi at the executive lounge and Pruthvi at the concierge. We received a lot of attention and care. We were given complimentary meals. They were all warm and considerate of us travelling with children and elders. We cannot thank the staff enough for making our stay very pleasant and comfortable. We hope to come

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Average hotel
desc: I had a great check in at the HI Singapore and was kindly upgraded to a corner room. However the room is pretty dated and drab, and overall the hotel feels in need of renovation. The lobby, floors and rooms have a 90s hotel vibe. Checkout was very slow with only one person at the desk who was doing his best to deal with a queue of 4 - 5 waiting check-in / check-outs, and it took about 20 minutes.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great time at the inn
desc: Very good service and staff were extremely friendly. Would recommend to anyone who wants good service. The food was very tasteful and the alcohol was great, they make the drinks beautifully. Great hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A very enjoyable experience at the Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre
desc: The Executive Lounge was amazing - food, beverages and service excellent. However, we booked a city view and high floor room and were allocated a mid floor room facing a brick wall, so rather disappointing not to see the city sights, particularly at night, from our window. Room service was very prompt and all staff were very friendly and helpful. The location was great - very close to public transport systems. A very enjoyable stay, thank you.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Horrendous and horrible hotel
desc: There is no called 4 star about this hotel or to justify anything near to the price they charge . Early check in and late checkouts both charged at 150 dollars plus tax which is still ok , but the device I received for 5 days I was here was simply of 1 or 0 star standard . At front desk while a lady executive was polite and courteous , other 2 male ones were simply rude and unresponsive especially a tall guy named Imiaaz or so ( don’t remember his name exactly ) . I booked a double bed room and the room was old , smelly and outdated . It was a struggle to get basic amenities changed . The front desk was so rude that my constant requests to talk to their GM were turned down and I was pointed to a guy at front desk again and yet again . Breakfast is ok but be ready to face some

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Service and Staff - Love the lounge
desc: Been coming here for many years and will the hotel at this stage is a little dated the staff are amazing. Love the executive lounge and the staff - especially Sasi are very professional and attentive.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Another great stay.
desc: We have stayed here for 3 nights on two occasions recently and enjoyed both occasions. The location is ideal, being almost on Orchard Road and with easy access to many shops, bars and restaurants including a supermarket in Centrepoint. The staff at the hotel were all friendly and helpful, especially Helena at the restaurant who looked after us so well, and also the chef who sorted out gluten free breakfast items for my coeliac husband (I'm sorry, I didn't get his name) and Vik who also helped us. We also loved seeing the resident robot, Kettybot, delivering the egg dishes to the tables!! Zainal and his colleagues were also excellent on the concierge desk, not only getting us taxis promptly at busy times, but also cheerful, always ready with a smile. Although we experienced some

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Perfectly situated
desc: We had a lovely 2 night stay in this hotel. The customer service by all staff was outstanding. The hotel in situated very close to the centre of Orchard Rd. There are numerous restaurants and supermarkets situated nearby. The room itself was very comfortable and had all the amenities that one requires. The only bad thing for me is that we couldn't stay any longer but will return hopefully in the near future.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Staff Experience and I couldn't Ask for More.
desc: The staff in HI Orchard were nothing short of amazing! They pretty much went to the ends of the earth to make sure I had a comfortable stay. A huge shout out to everyone in the Guest Relations team who was beyond helpful and resourceful. Many thanks to everyone involved!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Memories that Last
desc: Our daughter got married at this hotel. It was such a memorable event. The event manager, Ms Vasanthi, was kind and patient. She and her team were efficient in ensuring the smooth flow of the event. We booked 4 rooms for our guests and all of them were pleased with the hotel stay. Thank you for making this such a joyous occasion for my family and guests.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday inn orchard city centre: a nice place to stay
desc: Have stayed here for past so many years The hotel provides consistent service.located conviniently next to the orchard road with shopping pubs and s great food court Has a fabulous indian restaurant too! The staff is effecient and ensure your requests are honoured timely

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Hotel is in the heart of where you want to be
desc: Nice modern hotel. Wifi is slower than others in the area. There are banquet rooms for weddings. Nice lobby bar area. Quick efficient check-in. Staff spoke english well. Rooms were modern and clean. We were upgraded based on our status. Unfortunelty, the AC unit started running water into our living room. It would run hard for 5 or so minute. This all started at 2am and it would run hard for 5 min every hour for at least 6 hours. I had to get up and wring our towels numerous times during the night. When we discussed with staff in the morning, they said they would take care of it. When we got back around 3:30 p.m., the room still had a huge pile of stinky wet towels lying on the wet spot on the floor. We were assured it was fixed, but we had to leave the room again so it

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: It’s a Holiday In itself.
desc: Surrounded by busy streets – but you would never know it once you are securely ensconced in your room at the Holiday Inn. The rooms are quiet, the beds comfortable and there are a good selection of pillows to choose from. On the top floor, the pool and sauna are the go-to places when getting over jet lag . . . . we always have a stop over here in Singapore when travelling between NZ and the EU. The buffet breakfast is yum. Staff are attentive, friendly and customer focused; look for Robin at the Lobby Bar – he is the best. The location is great. Not because it is close to Orchard Rd, but because of the Cuppage Centre across the road – excellent locals’ cafes, launderettes, night clubs and wellness centre. We will be back. Kate

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: It’s an ok hotel by orchard road. Clean and nice staff. Breakfast was crazy with steaming kids…
desc: The staff is very nice and rooms are clean. However if the breakfast is very load and coffe machines takes forever to make one cup. If you are traveling without children don’t do breakfast it is like a kindergarten… upgrade to lounge or go out.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday Inn weekend getaway
desc: Went to Holiday Inn Orchard for weekend gateway Lobby is large and nice Check in at 2pm , get the key and went to room at 3rd floor Room is nice Inspect the room , and found that safe is not working Toilet is small Went to 8 floor for gym and swim Gym is nice Swimming pool is of various dept , 0.9 m , 1.2 m, 2 m and 2.4 m Evening, Going to lobby bar for fruit platter , 2 scoops of ice cream and Bailey Coffee This lobby bar is impressive. Holiday Inn Atrium got Chinese theme lobby bar , which sell some dim sum dishes Holiday Inn Little India got Thai theme lobby bar , which sell Thai food I am impressed with information which is available on Holiday Inn website I hope another Holiday Inn hotel set up with Japanese restaurant which sell Japanese snack in lobby

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Could have been better
desc: We stayed here for just one night for a staycation. Check in unfortunately was not a pleasant experience and did not set the tone right for the stay. The staff checking us in was cold and unfriendly. She wanted to see our son’s identification but who brings their kid’s identification for a short stay within the country itself? She could have offered alternatives but did not and there were several uncomfortable minutes where nobody knew what to do. Finally she asked for just the number and she could have done that from the start when we told her we didn’t have it! Room was a comfortable size but the view was of the back of another building. The pool and gym area seemed small, tired and could use a refurbish. Other than the location within Orchard area, it would be hard to

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Becoming 3 STAR..
desc: Getting fatigued and run down. Same decor and old room design since 2012 when I first started coming here. Needs a refurbishment throughout to refresh and replace it amongst the 4 star hotels. Quality has been reduced, especially at breakfast. The food quality has been reduced, used to salmon and pork bacon but replaced with cheap chicken sausages and poor quality turkey bacon. Feels like an Express Hotel. Rooms clean and tidy but old design doesn't feel refreshing.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Clean, great location and wonderful staffs
desc: One of the best experiences, me and my family had. The staffs are very helpful. Met with one of the staff, miss Felicia, she is quite easy going and friendly. She recommended me places to go and eat. They are delicious and fun places to go. Thank you. We had an amazing short time in SG.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great experience, lovely hotel and staff
desc: Lovely holiday in an excellent location. Staff were amazing and super helpful. Rooms and all areas were clean and well presented. Quiet rooms with comfy beds. Requests made for extra pillows and towels were actioned within 10 minutes Will definitely be back.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wedding and two night stay
desc: Had my wedding at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre recently and stayed for two nights. My wife and I were very glad to have our wedding hosted in the hotel and had a great stay in the hotel too. The hotel room was spacious and comfortable. Both the food for wedding dinner and room service was amazing as well.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent first trip to Singapore
desc: FANTASTIC service from the staff all across the services used from the Lounge on L3, check in and check out, room service and concierge!! My only negative is the variety of cocktails at the cocktail lounge and No Sparkling Wine on offer, hence the 4 stars

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Holiday in Singapore
desc: Very Central location. Hotel clean and neat. Rooms a good size. Allow time for breakfast as it gets very busy and you might have to queue. Staff very friendly and work extremely hard and long hours. A shoutout to Lisa (Room attendant on 5th floor) and Helena (in the restaurant).

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Place to Hold Your Meetings
desc: I would like to give a shout out to the banquet staffs manning the B1 meeting and function rooms - Anand, Baharom and Rashid. Notwithstanding are the other staffs who help with the cleaning and miscellaneous matters. I regularly conducts workshops there. On the mornings that I arrive at the hotel, without fail, I will be greeted by their warm greetings - as in I can feel the genuine warmth in our interactions. One can't help but feel not just welcomed, but as if one belongs. Whenever I need assistance - be it for extra materials or the projector is not working well enough or my participants have a special request; anything - these staffs NEVER SAY NO. They will try their best to accommodate and will always come up with an alternative if the need be. I was never disappointed.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Super service
desc: We were regulars but after a bad experience we shifted our allegiance. After 7 yrs we stayed here for 3 days and were very pleased we did. The front office staff were exceedingly helpful esp. Ms.Aera( i hope spelling is correct) and the staff of executive lounge were EXCEPTIONAL. The suite was very spacious and comfortable. The only thing lacking because we had a 18month baby was a microwave. Will definitely go back and not to Mandarin turned Hilton.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent staff and very comfortable stay
desc: The staff has been excellent and has gone above and beyond to help us with our needs. The location was excellent for us, just off orchard road but near enough for a casual stroll. The room is larger than usual for Singapore. Definitely a good place to stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Centrally located, convenient
desc: Good Hotel, centrally located, guest friendly, comfortable. House keeping not up to the mark, multiple reminders needed each time. Stayed for 4 nights with kids. Around the hotel many shopping and eating joints, so it saves time. Recommended to stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good location, spacious room, unhelpful checkin staff, horrible room allotment.
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights and booked two rooms in total. Rooms - 1 x Standard King Room, and 1 x Standard Two Double Bed Room. In my honest opinion, I would not advise you to stay there if you are looking for a comfortable and luxurious stay. They have falsified information all throughout. We had booked directly through our IHG Rewards membership. (1 night was through Agoda). PROS- 1. The hotel location is good, very close to the main Orchard Road. It was only a 2-3 mins walk to reach Orchard Central Mall, and around 4-5 mins to reach 313@Somerset Mall / MRT. 2. The room is clean and very very spacious. The reason I selected this hotel was because of the huge size of the rooms. The bathroom has a good size as well. 3. Staff are very polite, and hospitable. 4. Breakfast

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Convenient in the heart of Orchard
desc: Firstly a big thank you to Mr Raven who took my call at IHG hotline on 2nd June evening to secure a stay cation from 4th to 7th June for my family. Initially, I tried to book online but had some questions and decided to call in. His patience and professionalism enable me to book a stay cation for my family. Reception upon checked in was very friendly. Pleasant and everything was perfect for us. Less than 5 minutes walk to Centre point and Orchard Central. A good 10 minutes walk to Plaza Singapura. Convenient !! A Big shout out to Ms Lisa of housekeeping. Very cheerful and hardworking!! Ms Mina, a very sweet young lady at dinning for dinner . Definitely recommendable was their Pan Fried Salmon and Nasi Lemak ( chilli was fiery hot ) My boys had a splendid time at the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Ok experience
desc: The lounge is cool. They need to pay them more. The lounge has too many kids after six pm. The food and service was ok at best. Fiona is very good at her job. She is an asset to the company. I like the lounge.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Helpful Staff for 1st Visit to Singapore
desc: Stayed here 12 days for business. The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. Easily extended my stay and the manager gave me a late checkout of 6:00pm at no charge for an 11:00pm flight. The Concierge was very helpful arranging a taxi everyday.. There is a very nice pool on the roof and used their fitness 6 of the days. The fitness center is small but it fit my needs. Bartenders at the Lobby Bar were very friendly and the food menu met my needs. Just across the street is a canopied area with 10+ outdoor restaurants. I ate many times at one of the restaurants, The Curry Culture. I should be back in Singapore within a year and expect I will stay here again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lunch at Window At The Park
desc: Yummy dishes salmon, beef, chicken, salads. Wide variety to choose from. Endless supply of dishes. Most of us stayed almost 2 hrs just to enjoy the food and salads and desserts. I loved the salmon and chicken teriyaki.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: I love holidays
desc: The rooms are spacious and the housekeepers are excellent. The staff are always responsive and respectful, I wish hotels in the states where as accommodating to the clients, when I can I will stay at this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Experience
desc: Executive lounge experience was amazing. Attentive and friendly staff makes the whole ambience so relaxing. Thanks to Fiona Gan for an engaging experience. I would recommend anyone who wants a fuss-free stay with Lounge experience.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service
desc: Everything is impeccable. Great customer service. Amazing breakfast. Close connection to everyway means you get the best out of and its surroundings. Will definitely stay here again. Special mention to Fiona who was super attentive during my visits to the lounge Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed They were so hospitable that it makes you forget that the rooms were outdated

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service by Ali and Fizdous in the Executive Lounge
desc: Excellent service was provided by Ali and Fizdous in the executive lounge. They are true professionals and provided exceptional support and service throughout our stay. I enjoyed the time I spent at the hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lobby Bar
desc: The lobby bar is very pleasant and the staff is always friendly. Ash is exceptionally good. Very friendly and always professional. A very accommodating stay from check in to check out. The club level check in was very convenient and accommodating, Fiona and the staff are always a pleasure.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: I Feel at Home in this Hotel
desc: Ali is wonderful in the lounge! Always attentive with a great attitude. The drinks are good too. In fact, the entire lounge staff is great as well. Kudos to them. Keep up the good work. I travel to Singapore for work a lot and we always stay at Holiday Inn Orchard City Center because we receive great service. The entire staff from the lobby, bar, lounge, restaurant, to housekeeping - etc everyone is amazing and kind. I feel at home at this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service at lounge at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Center
desc: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Center is a great hotel. Executive lounge at hotel is amazing!! Thank you Ali, Firdaus, and Salman , excellent service , staff very friendly, food , and drinks Good . It was so nice surprise birthday with cake., You guys made for my son. We had a lot of fun.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: front office manager
desc: I want to thank Holliday Inn for the best front office manager (Darren Chan) that i met in the hotel, he helps us a lot in kindly way and let us be happy in our stay. He gives us a great service at the hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent service
desc: The staff made me feel welcomed and valued stay. They went above and beyond to ensure that I had everything I needed to make my experience unforgettable. What stood out to me the most was the genuine interest they showed in my satisfaction. Throughout my stay, they regularly checked on me to see if I needed anything else or if there was anything they could assist with. It made me feel like a VIP guest! Their warm and professional demeanor was a clear reflection of their dedication to providing exceptional customer service. Their attentiveness was not intrusive, but rather, it enhanced the overall enjoyment of my time at the lounge. I want to extend my heartfelt gratitude to the entire staff at the lounge for making my stay memorable. Their efforts truly made a difference, and

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Rest stop after a long European vacation
desc: They have done quit a lot of work around the hotel since the last time we were here. The club lounge is now fully operational on the 3rd floor with fantastic staff such as Ali and Fizdous attending to all your needs. We were even given a room upgrade to a junior suite fantastic. Keep up the great work.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Memorable time in Holiday Inn Orchard
desc: I stayed here for 5 nights and I must say I had the best time especially because I was welcomed to the Executive Lounge. I really enjoyed the Evening Cocktails (yummy cakes & sweets....and wine!). Most importanty, I really appreciate the sincerety of the staff. Shout out to the housekeeping department and the Executive Lounge morning & evening staff (esp. Pak Salman, Fiona, Khan, and Seow Ling). Will seriously consider staying here again next time I'm back in Singapore.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: 1st time in Singapore
desc: We spent 5 nights at this property. The check-in process was seamless. The lady at the front desk (Unfortunately I can't remember her name) who checked us in was very efficient, kind, friendly & welcoming. When we got to our room, it wasn't impressive, meaning, we weren't WOWED, (in fact, far from it & quite the opposite), though it was clean & had all the amenities. We weren't impressed by the ambience or the size of the room. It seemed mighty small, especially with the addition of an extra bed. Our travel agent informed us that it was a room with 2 double beds. But this was not so. When we were checking in, we were told it was 1 bed & they would bring an extra bed for my teenaged daughter. I told her what we were told & she advised us otherwise. We were given a room on the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing staffs!
desc: The staffs (Fiona, Firdaus, Salman & Ali) at the executive lounge was amazing! It was my youngest birthday and they decorated our room with balloons and towel birthday cake and a chocolate cake in the room! They definitely made her day. We will be heading back to Singapore soon and I ask my 7yo girl where she wanna stay and she said here because there are really nice people there and they are very friendly! They will go an extra mile just to make you feel welcome. Will definitely go back soon!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good
desc: I'd like to call attention to the young man named Robin, who worked the lobby bar area on weekends. I found Robin to be very conscientious and attentive to the needs of his customers, including me. Robin was enthusiastic and motivated to excel in the hotel industry.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Unexpected arrangements from Fiona Firdaus and entire team
desc: The service at the Lounge was impeccable! From Breakfast evening drinks, I'll give the team a 5 stars. Our room have very thoughtful happy birthday deco & cakes on the table with birthday card thank you Fiona Firdaus and entire team. Very impressive!. All in all my stay at this hotel is a happy and memorable one. I will stay again in the not too distant future :-)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Memorable Singapore Journey with Salman: Outstanding Service!
desc: Salman provided an exceptional experience during my visit to Singapore. His attentive service, in-depth knowledge of the city, and genuine enthusiasm made the trip truly unforgettable. I highly recommend his services for anyone seeking a personalized and memorable journey in Singapore. Thank you, Salman, for a fantastic experience!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent
desc: Excellent service by Ali and Firdous… served us so well and made us feel like a family. Favourite vacations spot. Very good good. Comfortable environment to bring kids and elderlies. You must come with your loved ones to Crete new memories which you can cherish forever.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Brilliant Family Stay
desc: Another wonderful stay at the Holiday Inn Centre Singapore. Room was clean and most importantly- after a very long flight. Staff here are wonderful and fantastic. Especially thanks to Ms Fiona Gan, Firdaus Salmon and Wen Jun. These few staff make us feel comfortable like at home. The service at this hotel is second to none. Everyone is helpful and will go out of their way to assist. The Lounge is also to be highly recommended. Breakfast options are extensive and delicious. Centrally located to all Singapore has to offer. Swimming pool is clean as well. Thank you so much!!!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Birthday surprise 🎂🎂🎁🍾
desc: We stayed at the holiday inn singapore orchard city center for two weeks, it was my husband's birthday and when we got to the room the hotel staff prepared a beautiful surprise, they were fantastic and the service was incredible!!! thank you so much to the people who organized Ali, Salmen, Fizdona you guys were perfect! we will always come back!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lovely central place to stay
desc: Really comfy rooms. Clean, Excellent food and lovely friendly staff. Totally central location allowing you to easily visit places. We stayed for 3 nights. Only negative was the jacuzzi was not working.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A good experience
desc: A comfortable, well run, busy hotel close to Orchard Road. The staff without exception were professional and helpful. Siri in the dining room deserves a special mention. We would certainly stay here again

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Short Singapore Break!
desc: Staff were nice and helpful. The location was very convenient. We had a bit of a green view out our 4th floor window across a highway. Didn’t really notice any traffic noise though. We opted to spend our dining out instead of inside the hotel. Can’t comment on the food but there are plenty of local places to eat at. Pool is great although if you order poolside food, they take it to your room and you have to go down to your room in wet bathers, sign for it, then escort the food trolley up to the pool which was a drama. We didn’t know they were at our door as we were at the pool but the app that you have to order the food through does not allow you to put the pool as the location, only your room number. Laundry is very expensive at the hotel but there is a laundry across the

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Exellent Service from the Heart!
desc: Salmon, Ali and Firdams were great! Salmon have such welcoming attitude and great personality, he wont just make you smile but make you laugh. Ali has been attentive pouring our glasses with our drinks. These 3 gentlemen do their job with their hearts and that what makes it difference. Thank you guys and keep up the good work!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing experience
desc: Amazing experience. Very good hospitality and very kind staff. I will say it you should definitely come here. It is a good family vacation destination. And very good food. Wonderful ambience and very comfortable for a family trip.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very Convenient Location
desc: We stayed at Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre on 2/7/2023 for 1 night. The hotel building is old but well maintained, clean and tidy. The location very convenient & located at the Orchard Road. Walking distance to shopping mall & MRT station. We were attended by Ms. Fiona at check in and she very helpful & friendly. We will look forward to stay here again! Regards; Mr. Khairil Amir

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: An disappointing stay
desc: My family and I have previously stayed here a couple of times and looked forward to this stay as well as it had been some time since out last. Unfortunately we found that it was not as expected, checking in was ok but checking out took ages and very unfriendly, not sure why as I did not voice anything at the time. Breakfast was probably the worse I have experienced in Singapore, cold food and empty containers, the second morning we used the lounge area instead and found it not any better with again not very friendly staff. Using the executive lounge in the evening was again average, full of kids running around, cold food with a poor selection, I get the impression that they are trying to save expenses. The room was ok but the bed sagged in the middle All in all for the price

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The stay was comfortable with good amenities
desc: The hotel is centrally located at Orchard with access to the main Orchard road…The suite room is spacious with clean amenities..The hotel’s staff is very cordial..I extend a warm thanks to Wen Jun, Salman and Firdaus for being showing their hospitality during our stay..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Executive Lounge Service
desc: Holiday Inn @Orchard city never once failed my expectation on them. Shoutout to the Executive lounge team Fiona, Firdous, Salmon and Wei Jun for giving me a warmest welcome every time I came and this is the reason why I love to come for the cocktail session at the Executive Lounge.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Executive Lounge
desc: Our family would like to commend Manager Firdaus and Wen Jun from Holiday Inn’s Executive lounge. They are very nice, courteous, pro active and most of all very good in taking instructions. They made our family feel welcome and special. Thank you guys! Mr. Jeb Diamond Elite Member 247427014

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay at Holiday Inn City Center
desc: Good and quiet place. Very good location. Staf very friendly and always ready to help. Remember Mr Assat at he Lobby Bar, Ms. Helena at the breafast que and Ms. Lylian front desk when check out. Very professional.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location and friendly staff, but needs a renovation
desc: Friendly staff. No complaints there. Great location - in the heart of everything. Close to Orchard Rd, but not close to the metro. Not too much a problem as it's inexpensive to get around Singapore with a taxi. The hotel is dated and is in need of a renovation. You can see that paint is peeling around edges and ceiling etc. Carpets feel a little muggy and dirty. Toilet seat was loose.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Standard
desc: Good standard felt very comfortable. Kind most welcome hotel. Near by lot of big shopping centre. Hygienic room Housekeeping is very good. Delicious food can taste it. Worth for money. Good lounge service..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Location is good
desc: Location is good, surrounded by food outlets. 5 minutes walk to Orchard Rd. and 10 minutes walk to Somerset MRT station. Bedroom is clean and spacious for 3 medium size adults, using 2 double beds. It’s not a new hotel but it’s well maintained. Bathroom with bathtub is clean with ample space to maneuver, amenities is well provided. Front office staffs are friendly and working efficiently. We recommend this hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Wonderful experience at the Exec Club
desc: Wonderful set up at the lounge. Relaxed and personalized service; decent spread and good options for ordering. Staff is super responsive and welcoming. Thank you Salman and others who made our stay comfortable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Family fun in Singapore!
desc: The room was very well appointed for our family... The executive breakfast and happy hour was exactly what we all needed to start the day and recharge... Fiona was always a delight and Salman made sure we had everything we needed... Ali and Gloria were great as well... All the staff are very friendly and helpful... The location is perfect if you're someone who likes to get out on foot and use public transportation... The main MRT hub is a short walk, which makes getting around a breeze... We love it here... We came from San Francisco, so we are used to hustle and bustle and also enjoy the peace and serenity of the green space and beautiful landscapes ..

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Simply Amazing
desc: Stayed at this hotel for a week to celebrate my birthday and it was wonderful. They agreed to arrange a simple birthday surprise too! (See the pictures attached) The hotel is conveniently located near shopping malls and mrt stations making it very easy to get around the city. The room is spacious and clean and the amenities are replenished every day. Staff are extremely attentive and accommodating. Special thanks to Zainal, Fiona, Irwhan, Colin, Salman, Alee and all of the staff for making our stay comfortable and memorable. Hoping to be back here soon. Thank you!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing location and great for families
desc: Great hotel right near Orchard Rd. The kids loved the executive lounge breakfasts and drinks. Nice pool and really lovely staff. Buffet breakfast catered for everyone. Lovely bar downstairs and hundreds of restaurants just across the road

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Relaxing stop on the way home
desc: We were travelling with family and had access to the lounge facilities. Was far more relaxed for breakfast than the large restaurants elsewhere. Service by the team, Wen Jun, Fiona, and Gloria in the lounge was very good.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: August Staycation 2023
desc: Had a good staycation for 2 days 1 night. Booked a suite and had a chance to have access in executive lounge. Lovely atmosphere at the lounge, not that crowded as well. Nice food and drinks as well. Love the colours of the lounge and i like how the natural sunlight coming thru as well. Staffs : Fiona, Firdaus, Salman, Ali & Orifali served me and my friend well. Thank you Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre Team.!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Highly recommended 👍🏻
desc: 非常喜欢住在这里！位置，休息室，房间，一切！特别感谢Fiona 和她的团队成员，他们是最可爱的，一直微笑，非常注重细节，乐于助人，并且随时准备协助满足任何要求。 The room was clean and comfortable. The hotel’s facilities, such as the pool were well-maintenance and provided opportunities for relaxation and recreation.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: clean and nice city
desc: great location, easy access to public transport as bus station and MRT station within walking distance. hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. Room nice view, although high way in front of my room but excellent sound proof, can't hear the traffic noise.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best customer service
desc: Best customer services . Firdans, Salmon and Orifali have amazing customer service. Best cocktails and nice food . Family friendly and kids loved food as well. Nice ambience and variety of food and drinks to choose from

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent trip made better thank to Jorge
desc: The staff was very helpful and ensured our trip was amazing. I especially thank Jorge Kwek for helping me when my daughter got an unfortunate accident. Also the rooms were nice and the food was tasty. Will be coming back again.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Service!
desc: 5 ⭐ service ! Was attended by a young lady named 'Fiona', enthusiastic, polite and friendly person. Hassle-free, everything went smooth and easy! Fiona also recommended few places to visit, and also food. Will definitely go back soon! 🙂 Thank you Fiona!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Singapore city centre hotel
desc: Recently had a 3 night stay at the hotel and would definitely recommend it. We had a 'standard' family room (2 double beds) but this was a good quality and very clean. The rooftop pool was excellent and a nice way to cool down in the heat. Check in was good and very thorough. Breakfast very good including some decent Indian food selection. There is also a small gym next to the pool. The location is fantastic for exploring Singapore. It's a 2 minute walk to Orchard Road which has many shopping malls, and also 3 MRT stations nearby (Somerset is the closest within the mall opposite). Singapore is an expensive place to stay in and the hotel prices aren't ultra cheap but pretty reasonable for what you get. Will happily stay here again in the future.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Lounge bar service was excellent
desc: Lounge bar service was excellent, we were served by Mr Robin who provided service beyond expectations. I had two cocktails that Robin had created out of the menu and I particularly liked the Cassanova, which was a delightful mix of strawberries and gin. Robin often came by to check if everything was good or if we needed any service. Compared to previous visits, this visit was excellent. Would highly recommend others to the lounge bar! Thank you!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent as always
desc: We have been going to Holiday Inn City Centre for the past years every time we fly to Singapore and the service still same. Very reliable staff. The rooms are clean and having both the soft and firm pillows is great. The staff are so understanding and helpful, specially when traveling with a special needs child. We had lounge access and the staff are very friendly and smiling. The food is excellent and there is a variety for breakfast and in the evening.
