Special thoughts to Salman, Ali and Orifali from the lounge. Nice meeting you guys and see you next time 😊

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Mum’s Best Birthday
desc: The best customer service. Made my mum feel extra special on her birthday. Lady named Janice at the breakfast buffet made us feel welcome, made sure that we were taken care of, and spoke to us to ensure we were going to the right places.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing
desc: The service from staff was exceptionally great especially ALI orifali Salaman Firdaus were all very attentive and kind towards us making us all feel truly welcomed.An experience that felt luxury and relaxing. In addition the rooms were very spacious and comfortable as well as the facilities were very lovely and clean.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: An unforgettable Birthday experience!
desc: We would like to thanked the staff at Window on the park for the great hospitality for our little one 1st bday on the 19 Aug 2023z We would like to personally compliment ZAYED for his impeccable hospitality and we cab forsee him as a great hotelier in the future. Keep up the great work!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good~
desc: This has been the best hotel I have ever stayed in Singapore. Being to Singapore 5 times for tourism, I think this hotel's customer service is the best. Very warm and helping. Especially Fiona , whom I met at the lounge was extremely helpful. she understood everything what we required and arranged for it. Thank you Holiday Inn orchard city and Fiona for making our stay memorable. Am coming back to this hotel again. They really give you a personal service. Go for the Lounge access if your budget can stretch to it.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Stay here for 3 night and it was very incredible, all the staff was very helpful and kind, start from the front desk, do
desc: Stay here for 3 night and it was very incredible, all the staff was very helpful and kind, start from the front desk, doorman, bell boy etc, very initiative. Room facilities are very good , the location is perfect, next to orchard Breakfast also very delicious, a lot of food types. The property are mix of old Chaim era . Holiday in. orchard service are top notch! thank for lounge term for the warm welcome staff Fiona who was so lovely and helpful throughout my stay.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Staff Members
desc: The hotel has friendly staff members. Robin at the lounge was so friendly, and made my experience so pleasant. If I am visiting Singapore again, I would like to choose this hotel again. Thanks so much! :)

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A great stay
desc: We had a great stay at the Holiday Inn Orchard City. We are a family of 4 and they accommodated us all in one room with two twin beds. The room was a good size and the beds were super comfortable, the pool was great for both swimming lengths and for kids playing, there was a small but functional gym and even a sauna! Breakfast wasn't included in our room rate but the kids ate for free and it was pretty good value. The location is perfect, being close to Dhoby Gout and the Somerset MRT stations. The staff were pleasant and helpful. We will definately stay again!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great stay in Singapore
desc: We had a great time in the holiday inn orchard. Centrally located in orchard and 5 minutes walk to the Somerset mrt station. We had nice breakfast and evening drinks in the executive lounge where the staff is very friendly and helpful. Very family friendly hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Recommended accommodation!
desc: I wanted to take a moment to say how grateful I am for the outstanding experience I had during my most recent stay at the hotel. The staff is kind and accommodating, particularly Fiona and her team who provide excellent service at the Lounge during cocktail hours. She provides us with many helpful recommendations for places to explore in the area that make our stay comfortable. She really stood out and added to the quality of my trip.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: I had a wonderful stay with friendly people like Fiana Gan.I would recommend my friends from Toronto Canada to stay here
desc: Fiana Gan welcomes me and families at executive club lounge. Her pleasant and friendly attitude towards the guests especially to my families who came all the way from US and Canadain is far beyond just praise and commendable.I would like to wish her all the very best in her future endeavor in Holiday Inn. May she be able to achieve the career in Holiday Inn to the highest level of satisfaction. I would recommend her for any position in Holiday Inn as she is diligent hardworking and responsible person.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Stay
desc: Excellent hotel with even better bar at first floor where Robin is key for all the the nice tips on food and drinks. The hotel is very nicely located with lot of options around for local Singapore food. It on orchard but still quite.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great service
desc: Great hotel, every aspect surpassed expectation. for example we were served by Ali Salmen in the lounge, fantastic service. When we asked for information or advice.on items of food or drink options available he made sure we received whatever we required.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Breakfast
desc: Excellent. Breakfast is a bit crowded on 2nd floor by 9:30, so you need to plan your timing. Seowling, Salman,May ,Fali in the executive lounge is very helpful. Breakfast closes around 10.30 - 10.45. Breakfast spread is decent. Bakery items are not so great

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent Stay
desc: This review is to commend your hotel workers, particularly Daas and Hamza at IHG Orchard City Centre, for their excellent service. Thank you to Daas and Hamza for making our stay at your hotel so pleasant. I was there for ten days with my family and was treated with kindness throughout. Despite the busy season, I was impressed by the timely room service. Every requirement was met with utmost care, making us feel very special.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: The place to stay in Singapore!
desc: Caring staff and impeccable facilities! Executive Lounge had the most attentive staff! Salman, Orifali and Firdous engaged our children, met all our needs and ensured our stay was made personal! Would highly recommend to anyone.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Amazing stay!
desc: Amazing stay. Located in a very good area. Rooftop pool, and the sauna was the highlight of my stay. All kept clean and ready to use. Very courteous staff. Shoutout to Ali, Salman & Seowling at the executive lounge, the staff at the pool area, and the housekeeping. They made sure of our needs and served with a smile.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Nice hotel
desc: The holiday Inn orchard is a great place for a short stopover or long break. This was our 1st stay here and won’t be the last. Staff are so professional and friendly. Hotel is in a very convenient location right next to i orchard and the MRT station. We stayed in a Club Access Room which comes with the benefits of breakfast and Evening drinks and canapés as well as all day snacks and non alcoholic drinks. Pool, although on the small size, is a welcome relief from the hot humi . Fiona And her team is special , very kind and attentive at serving guests

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very good service and awesome food.
desc: We had good diner time in holiday inn. The staff were really welcoming and service was commendable. We have been served by Mr. Robin. He was really professional and served us well. He recommended us many promotions. Food wise portion was more than enough and food was tasty . We really enjoyed.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Hotel
desc: Great hotel with plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby. Breakfast is very good with lots of options at the main restaurant or in the lounge. Beds are extremely comfortable and rooms are spacious considering it’s Singapore and other hotels the rooms are very tight. Lounge is perfect, comfortable couches and chairs, food changes daily and a lot of variety, plenty of alcoholic and not alcoholic drinks to choose from and staff is awesome. Big shout out to Fiona, Firdaus, Salman, Orifali, and Jasur for the amazing service in the lounge. Very friendly and remember your name and drink of chose with just one visit. Top notch. Very close to MRT and bus stops and never had issue getting Taxi. Concierge and bell boys are friendly and a quick to assist with baggage. Pool is on top floor

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: A Fantastic Experience...
desc: I don't normally write a review but I just finished a stay in a 1 bed suite at this lovely hotel and felt it was right to do so. Food and location are great (my Family loved the shopping mall right next to it), but what makes it really stand out are the attentive staff. Special mention goes to Club team Fiona Salmon and Ali who really know how to make you feel welcome. You could not fault their level of service which went above and beyond anything I have experienced before, their have many alcohol for guest to choose:) This will not be my last visit.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Awesome stay
desc: The rooms were comfortable. We had problems with our air conditioning system for the room and there was prompt response to rectify it. The executive lounge staff was excellent including Fiona ,Fali and team. Food was awesome and there was a good variation.Thank you .

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great Experience👍
desc: We stay at the Holiday Inn orchard city centre and, once again, it did not disappoint. The level of comfort is as good as it gets.... The service from the staff we interacted with was beyond expectations. We had the privilege of meeting the lounge Manager Fiona who not only assisted us with directions but took the trouble to put us on the right path to our destination. We stayed in a Club Access room and every time we entered the Club Lounge we were greeted by name and welcomed with a genuine warmth. With its central location in the orchard district, the hotel is a convenient stepping off point to all the amazing attractions of Singapore. We know we will be back!

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location, Friendly and helpful staff.
desc: Great location, very friendly staff the building and rooms a little bit older, good selection of food. The club lounge a peaceful place and again Ms Fiona and the staff there has it all in grip it seems. Breakfast could improve on temperature of some items , but again that’s personal choice.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Best Hotel
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 5 days and opted for Executive lounge service. Very much impressed by their service. Special thanks to Fiona and her team. They made sure we were taken care very well during our entire stay. She even made my daughter very comfortable.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good experience. Recommended.
desc: Friendly, accommodating, genuine hospitality. Exec lounge was filled with attentive staff, Salman, Orifali and Ali. Salman further explained about the food options we would have at the lounge and the main breakfast area. Friendly and knowledgeable. Food was good, great ambience too. Love the ambience and space.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Value and great service
desc: The service was friendly and excellent, and the room was very clean and well maintained during my stay. The location of the hotel was also very convenient and the staff at the front desk as well as the front door always helpful with my needs. Great value.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Pleasant Staycation in City Center
desc: We booked a double standard room, and because of my IHG Diamond status, the friendly receptionist (Dorothea) kindly upgraded us to a lovely one bedroom suite. Our kids were loving the room so much that we extended our stay by another day vs initial plan. I don't need to talk much about the location of this hotel already, which is one of the biggest strength of this hotel. While it's a rather old hotel, it is quite well maintained. We experienced the very responsive housekeeping (which swiftly came when we needed anything). Similarly the staff at breakfast place also worked hard to clear tables and deliver orders to the tables. Breakfast menu item seems to be constant from day to day, so some variations would be good for improvement. Overall it was a very good staycation

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Very satisfied experience
desc: Our stay was exceptional! The location was fantastic, with friendly and welcoming staff. The building and rooms were impressive, and the food selection in the Club Lounge was top-notch. What truly made our experience unforgettable was the genuine warmth with which we were greeted. We must give a special mention to Fiona and her team, who were super attentive during our visits to the lounge. Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The hospitality was second to none, making it an excellent choice for a family vacation destination."

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Excellent mid-range choice
desc: Just returned from a 4 night stay - very happy with the whole experience. Spotless, comfortable room with excellent wifi, ice-cold air conditioning and a powerful walk-in shower. Rooms are well insulated from outside noise as well as sounds from other rooms. Breakfast buffet offers a wide range of choice and an egg chef for your omelettes, poachies and sunny sides up. And the hotel is well located, both for taxis to all the bits of Singapore you need to be in, and to a range of local shops (7/11, foot massage, tourist tat) and restaurants, so you won't need to wander far to find a bite to eat. Bonus kudos to the truly delightful Colin and Hairee from the concierge team, for whom nothing was too much trouble and were a smiling, exemplary example as the public face of the hotel.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Great location but needs a little TLC
desc: I don’t like leaving any negatives because my wife and I enjoyed our stay and certainly would consider returning as we just did with a 4 night stay pre cruise and then a further 4 nights post cruise . Positives- fantastic position for all Orchard Road Shopping. Cupoage plaza restaurants behind. Diamond Elite status upgrade given . We further paid on the first 4 night stay to lounge access which was very peaceful with a good breakfast and evening food. Very friendly and efficient staff throughout . Price favourable against our stay last time we here at intercontinental. Negatives / the property is dated and in need of a a major upgrade. Dining room for breakfast has a great selection but room is very tired especially the tasteless floor. Pool area is in a real need of an

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Good hotel for the family
desc: We had a lovely time at the holiday inn, the upgrade to the club was well worth it. Great pool and facilities. Staff were top class, Salman, Firdans and Orifali were gems. Recommend for families. Hotel is in a convenient place for shopping, central to everything.

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: good service
desc: Fantastic location, great service - nothing was too much trouble. We stayed in a Suite room and it was perfect for a week stay - enough room to spread out and relax in between out into the heat. The pool is good, breakfasts really lovely, and the cocktail hours which we found on our last night - amazing. Would thoroughly recommend. Big Thank you to the team Fiona, Salman firdaus and Fali

hotelname: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Convenient and in the heart of the city
desc: Excellent service at club lounge, special thanks to the staff, especially to Ali, Seow Ling who has been very attentive and helpful serving us. They have a good blue cheese & Italian biscuit, good with cocktails. Got a nice upgrade to a suite! Good to be recognised as a Diamond Elite.
